story:
Short Summary

At Zamora New York, we truly value the importance of creativity and diversity. Our goal is to raise the proposed funds to produce and market our Fall/Winter 2014 Capsule Collection. These funds will help strengthen the Zamora New York brand, expand our distribution capabilities, and reach greater audiences. As a result, our goals are to share our designs with the world in an industry where there are no restrictions and no right or wrong answers. We are reaching out to all our friends, family, and pretty much everyone who we've had the pleasure to work with in the past to support our dream and become part of something great. You have to start somewhere and for us at Zamora New York, what started as a fun idea is now becoming a true reality. Both Claudia and Pablo grew up envisioning themselves working and doing great things in fashion industry and with your help, they are one step closer to achieving these dreams. They are ready to change the "norm" of cheap overseas labor and make sure that as a New York American brand, Zamora does its part by helping revamp the historic New York City Garment District. Since many factories have closed down or have shrunken tremendously in the past years, costs of materials and labor have gone up. Every little bit counts and we are committed to being part of a greater solution and not the problem. 

What We Need & What You Get

Zamora New York needs your help to raise $20,000.00 so that we can produce  our Fall/Winter 2014 Capsule collection in New York. We are fully committed in producing our garments in the US and we look forward to bringing back jobs to the historic New York Garment District.

We’re offering unique “thank you” perks for all our backers and we hope you will enjoy them as well! Here are the “thank you” perks that you will be receiving once you’ve made a contribution to Zamora New York.

Zamora New York Thank You Perks: 



ZAMORA NEW YORK POUCH


ZAMORA NEW YORK JERSEY T-SHIRT


ZAMORA NEW YORK FALL/WINTER 2014



THE IMPACT

Zamora New York started out as a dream that both Claudia and Pablo wanted to accomplish and now they are closer than they have ever been before. Producing this collection will take Zamora New York to the next level to becoming a successful fashion brand. We look forward to your contributions and we're excited to start producing our Fall/Winter 2014 collection!

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

If you are unable to contribute, please feel free to help out by spreading the word and making some noise about our fundraiser campaign! Every little bit counts!! We thank you in advance for supporting Zamora New York.

story:
Pretty in Pynk Boutique

 

 

Hello, my name is Tanisha Edenfield and I am the owner of Pretty in Pynk, which is a boutique for little girls who love dressing up and wearing chic girly things! My journey to opening this boutique started with my two little nieces whom I love shopping for! Every time I would go out shopping for myself, I would easily find myself in all of the stores for children before I even ventured into the stores I wanted to shop in for myself. I absolutely love tutus on little girls, so that was always the first thing I looked for in any and every store I visited. To my surprise, they became harder and harder to find, and many were not as full as I preferred. Aside from tutus, I was always on the hunt for chic looking blazers and cute trendy cardigans. Every time I shopped for my nieces I had a specific vision of the look I wanted for them, but I had the hardest time finding pieces to complete that look.

 

One day I thought to myself, "I wonder how hard it would be to actually make a tutu on my own"? From there, I went to YouTube and watched several tutorials on different ways to make tutus, and after a couple of months of trial and error, and tweaking a few things here and there, I came up with the perfect technique to achieve the exact look I had in mind. I have always been a creative and entrepreneurial minded person, so naturally after I figured out how to make the perfect tutu, I said to myself,  "how can I reach people with little girls who are looking for cute clothing for their daughters, nieces, or granddaughters". I had come up with so many cute and  creative variations of tutus that I was sure there would be a huge demand for them, all I needed to do was find a way to get them to my target market.

 

I pondered for awhile and thought, "why not just go for it, create a website, and sell them on there"? That thought was always in the back of my mind, but I still was not content with the idea of only selling tutus, but at the same time, I did not know what else I could or should do.  So I decided to take a step back and ponder things a little while longer. One day I was out shopping in the mall, and I happened to walk past "Justice" which is my favorite clothing store for little girls, and all of a sudden it came to me, "in addition to offering tutus, why not offer trendy little girls clothing"? That day my vision came together full circle, I have always been creative, love styling my little nieces, and have been entrepreneurial minded for as long as I can remember. It made perfect sense to me at that point that instead of just shopping for trendy clothes for my nieces, why not start a boutique where I pick out and sell the type of trendy clothing that I am always searching for and would buy for my nieces! From there I researched different wholesalers and made my first bulk purchase of various trendy items made for little girls in May of 2013. The rest is history! :)

 

 

What We Need

Since launching Pretty in Pynk this past spring, it has taken off more then I could have ever imagined! So much so, that I became motivated to create and design my own clothing line for little girls called "PYNK".  This clothing line will carry sizes 2t-12(kids) in chic and fashion forward clothing that you would never find in your average children's franchise store or department store. For the past several months, I have worked tirelessly to create the perfect line of clothing! This line will consist of high quality fabrics, with intricate details, and fashion forward designs. It will also be produced by a manufacturer with extensive experience with producing and manufacturing children's clothing. Every last detail of this clothing line is currently in place, and ready to be produced. The only thing left to do is come up with the finances to fund the production of "PYNK" so that it can take off and bring children's fashion to another level! I am confident that this line will be a huge success, and have also put forth countless weeks and months of creating and designing every single look that will be produced. I am very proud of the results and ready to introduce "PYNK" to the world!

 

The short term goal is for "PYNK" to be offered solely through our online boutique at www.pretty-in-pynk.com. The long term goal is for Pretty in Pynk to transition from an online boutique, to a national franchise, in which our clothing line "PYNK" will be offered throughout various large cities, and will also remain available online so that it will be accessible to both national and international customers. After researching and accessing the cost of fabric, shipping supplies, clothing tags/embellishments, and production, the total amount of money we need to get "PYNK"  produced is $2,345.

 

BREAKDOWN OF COST

 

Production: $1,200

  • Ideally each design will come in all sizes, ranging from 2T-12 (kids).
  • Each design will have a quantity of 3-5 pieces per size.

 

Fabric: $745

*As many types of fabrics and patterns as possible.

  • Denim
  • Cotton
  • Cotton Blend
  • Pattern Fabric
  • Sweater Knit
  • Suede
  • Stretch Fabric
  • Tulle

 

Shipping Supplies: $200

  • Custom stickers w/ logo
  • Boxes to ship items in
  • Pink Tissue paper

 

Clothing Tags/Embellishments: $200

  • Clothing labels/tags
  • Swarovski rhinestones
  • Diamond/Silver plated studs
  • Cloth Embellishments
  • Plastic Pearls/Beads to be attached to clothing
  • Iron on glitter/rhinestone transfers

 

TOTAL COST: $2,345

(The difference left will be applied to either the 4% or 9% fee that Indiegogo charges)

 

*Line is expected to be launched on our site by January 2014!!!

 

 

What You Get

We can only make this dream a reality with your help, and any contribution that you make, no matter the dollar amount would be greatly appreciated and extremely beneficial to the production of PYNK. In addition, you are helping to create history in children's clothing!  

Please note that if for any reason we fall short of our financial goal of raising $2,345, we will evenly disburse any funds that were raised towards the cost of fabric, and the cost of production, in order to get as many pieces made as possible. We genuinely thank you in advance for any contribution that you choose to make and we look forward to building a hugely successful brand through your help and support! :)

 

 

PERKS

 

$5 - Promo code for free shipping off any one purchase.

$20 - Promo code for 25% off any one article of clothing currently on our site.

$40 - Promo code for 25% off any one tutu currently on our site. 

$60 - Promo code for 25% off any one clothing article and  25% off any one tutu currently on our site.

$100 - Receive a promo code for 50% off any one item from our new line once it is launched.

$250 - Receive one complimentary item from our new line before it goes on sale to the general public.

$500 - Permanent Acknowledgement on our website as a sponsor, help design and name one piece to be added to our new line, receive that item complimentary before it goes on sale to the general public.

 

The Impact

Pretty in Pynk is very unique in the sense that we encourage and promote individuality and self expression in the form of fashion as a means to help little girls build a positive self image and high self esteem early on in life. In a world where there are so many misconceptions about who and what is beautiful, it is so important to instill a sense of self pride and self confidence in little girls at a young age. At Pretty in Pynk, we are not only committed to helping little girls look their best on the outside, we are just as committed to helping them feel their best on the inside, so that she can stand tall and be her best out in the world! We are currently looking into different community organizations that work with children, with the intent of developing an annual event that reiterates the importance of building positive self image and self esteem in little girls.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Any way that you can help Pretty in Pynk reach the next level of success would be greatly appreciated!

  • Please share the link to this campaign with any and everyone you know using the Indiegogo share tools! :)

 

Visit Our Website!

www.pretty-in-pynk.com

 

Follow us on Instagram!

@pretty_in_pynk

story:
Earlier this year, we raised over $580,000 on Kickstarter and completed our first bulk order. Now that we have our manufacturing established and are beginning to mail out our apparel, we wanted to give back! Help us to make our second bulk order, with a portion of proceeds going directly to these worthy causes.  

Limited colorways, never before seen Radiate apparel, and increased donations will all be unveiled as key milestones are reached along our campaign. Grab your perks to unlock these new items! After 35 days, these exclusive items will no longer be available--so grab them while you can! 


Why you need this

Your body is amazing. As you work out in the gym or compete in your favorite sport, your body does incredible things to reach its maximum performance--veins expand, metabolism increases, muscles swell, and your body radiates warmth. You are an extraordinary machine. But all of this helpful information goes lost because we can only see what is happening on the outside of your body--until now. The Radiate shirt finally allows us to see calories as they burn, muscles as they reach their maximum output, vascular activation, and body temperature as it increases in key areas of your body.

Why wait and see if you will be sore the next day? You can now see the muscles you are targeting, the ones you may be neglecting, and their specific intensity level.

Why blindly work out?  You can now see your body's immediate response to your workout while you train, rather than guessing or hoping for results over time.

Any shirt you have ever worn to the gym has failed to offer you an interactive experience specific to your unique biochemistry. Until now.

What You Get & What We Need

Our Indiegogo campaign is devoted to raising proceeds for national charities that are making a huge impact in people’s lives, every day. 

     ·With the Radiate shirt’s incredible success, we immediately began developing relationships with charities that share our core values. Our mission, from the very beginning, was to create apparel that makes a difference—not only by encouraging intelligent fitness, but by giving back as well. Now that we are established, we are able to begin giving back.

     ·Even with our Indiegogo perk prices at 40% off our usual online price, we will be donating 10% of every shirt to charity, such as Toys for Tots and to Play for Pink. This amount will GO UP as our campaign reaches new milestones, so tell your friends  and help to get the word out! This money ensures that funds are going to children who need your help to feel the joy of receiving gifts, and to the research that is necessary to fight breast cancer.

Highly Reduced Prices (35 Days only)

    ·For the duration of our Indiegogo campaign, all prices will be 40% off of our online prices—so grab two shirts for nearly the price of one! Proceeds go to a good cause. We want as many people to be able to afford the Radiate shirt as possible, and to be able to make a contribution during our charitable campaign.

Limited Colorways

     ·For our Indiegogo community, we are releasing colorways that are limited and that will no longer be offered after our campaign! Only you and those who pledge during our campaign will be grabbing these limited releases before they are gone. 

Real-Time Feedback,NASA Technology 

     ·Incorporating NASA technology into our revolutionary fabric and seam-routing, alongside advanced moisture wicking and heat transfer, we have created the world’s most advanced athletic apparel—capable of changing color in real-time to reveal your athletic output. 

Fulfilling Our Second Bulk Order

     ·We are currently completing our very first bulk order, fulfilling orders for over 50,000 shirts globally. These have been the only 50,000 of their kind—until this moment on Indiegogo.

     ·With your help, we will be able to complete our second bulk order of apparel, giving everyone on Indiegogo the world’s best in athletic apparel. Without your help, our second bulk order may not come to fruition, and several charities will go without help from what could be an incredibly powerful monetary contribution. 

Using Our Collective Power for Good! 

     ·After running a very successful crowdsourcing campaign earlier this year, we can finally use the demand from thousands of people and turn that love towards the people who need it most. Check out the charities that we have partnered with, and let us know if you have nay other charities in mind that we should be giving to!  


OUR INITIAL PERK ITEMS

More will be released as we reach new milestones in our campaign! 

The Radiate Shooter's Sleeve


The Radiate T- Shirt 

Ultra-Soft w/ Color Change Logo. Logo appears with body heat.

The RADIATE SHIRT: RED-TO-WHITE

(Donates to Play for Pink/ Breast Cancer Research Foundation)

The red-to-white colorway begins as red and then changes to a light red; as you continue to push yourself, the shirt goes to pure white! Logo changes from brown to fire orange, creating a "fire" effect. LIMITED EDITION--if you can't stand the heat, stay out of the gym.

The RADIATE SHIRT: GREEN-TO-YELLOW

(Donates to Toys for Tots/ The U.S. Marines)

The green-to-yellow colorway begins as green and then changes to a lime green; as you continue to push yourself, the shirt goes to neon yellow! Logo changes from brown to fire orange, creating a "fire" effect. LIMITED EDITION--this shirt is green and ready to go! 

(We will be donating whatever we have raised partway through our Indiegogo campaign on Dec. 23rd, so that donations raised will arrive in time for this year. Donations raised after Dec. 23rd will be donated at the end of our campaign as well, in January.) 

THE MISSION

New shirts and charities will be revealed as the Indiegogo community continues to pledge for perks.  

Our Green-to-Yellow Radiate Shirt is paired with Toys for Tots, which enables U.S. Marines to deliver gifts to underprivileged children during the holiday season. www.toysfortots.org

Our Red-to-White STAR Radiate Shirt is paired with Play for Pink, which donates 100% of its funds to Breast Cancer Research Foundation.               www.playforpink.org

As we reach new milestones along our campaign, we will release additional colorways for charities, new Radiate apparel items with new charities attached to them, and incredible pricing in the spirit of giving back!

UNLOCKABLES AND MILESTONES

As you give more to our campaign, we want to give more back to you. As our campaign reaches new milestones, we will be releasing limited colorways, additional monetary donations, and new Radiate apparel that is exclusive to the Indiegogo community. If we are able to reach $600K within our campaign, every backer will receive a FREE Radiate apparel item that has yet to be released, and only attainable through Indiegogo. Our Milestone Chart will track our progress toward these goals! Additional unlockables may be released sporadically, as well, in addition to what you see here on the chart!  

THE OBSTACLE COURSE

We have pitted Radiate's Red-to-White colorway against Radiate's Green-to-Yellow colorway, in the charity showdown of a lifetime! As these two colorways are grabbed up by the Indiegogo community, each shirt will make its way down the obstacle course--until it literally passes a milestone. The first colorway to reach 100K will earn their respective charity an additional power donation. This additional sum of money will go a long way to help.

                     www.radiateathletics.com

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

FAQ: *** Extremely Important***

  1. Asking us questions
    1. We have worked out all of the kinks that we had in our kickstarter campaign, but we still know that we will be receiving thousands of emails, posts, messages, comments, etc. For the fastest response, please direct all questions to indiegogo@radiateathletics.com so that we can answer you. We expect about a 2 week turn around time on emails in the beginning.
  2. Proceed Amounts
    1. All charities will be given a minimum of 10% ($3.50 per short sleeve, $4.50 per long sleeve) of the proceeds received for the shirts they are connected with.
  3. Charity Funds
    1. Any more specific questions regarding the charities, how they spend donations, where they help specifically, etc should be directed to the charities themselves.
  4. FAQ’s
    1. FAQ's, including sizing questions, can be found here- http://www.radiateathletics.com/#!copy-of-faq/cin5
  5. Sizing
    1. These shirts fit like dry fit shirts you may be used to. They are tighter than a regular shirt (so your heat can register on the shirt), but not as tight as compression shirts. This is the best information we can provide regarding sizing. You can also find the sizing chart here - http://www.radiateathletics.com/#!sizing/cjr5
  6. Adding to your pledge
    1. DO NOT WORRY ABOUT WHICH PLEDGE YOU INITIALLY CHOOSE. You can simply add money to your pledge and at the end of the campaign, you will receive 2 surveys asking you to clarify EXACTLY what you want!
  7. Changing your order
    1. DO NOT WORRY ABOUT CHANGING YOUR ORDER. At the end of the campaign there will be a survey asking you to clarify EXACTLY what you want!
  8. Shipping questions
    1. All items will be shipped by the end of August
    2. Tracking numbers will be sent
    3. Orders will be sent USPS
    4. International orders will be sent FEDEX or UPS
  9. International Backers
    1. Just add $10 to your pledge for shipping and expect your shirts to take about 2 weeks to ship.
    2. Your orders will be sent FEDEX or UPS
      1. We cannot change the value of the packages
  10. Bulk orders of 300+ or Custom orders
    1. Please email Mike at mmanzi@radiateathletics.com, and he thanks you for your patience!
  11. Athlete/Celebrity Support
    1. If you love the project and can help us get in touch with celebrities or athletes DIRECTLY, there is a lot we can do with you and we ask that you email Mike at mmanzi@radiateathletics.com, and again, he thanks you for your patience ahead of time!
  12. Sponsorships
    1. At this point we are NOT able to give free shirts to individuals or sponsor any teams. 
  13. Other Colors and Styles
    1. During this campaign we are only offering 2 colors initially. If you would like any of the other colors or styles, you can find them at www.RadiateAthletics.com
  14. AFTER THE CAMPAIGN
    1. Make sure to use the email address that you will be checking, because after the campaign there will be a lot of communication to update you and to reconfirm the details of your order. 


The Impact

In March, we held our only prior campaign on Kickstarter.com. Within 34 short days, we had received over $580,000 in pledges, proudly becoming the 58th most successful crowdfunded campaign of all time (as reported by Entrepreneur Magazine). We originally planned to have all of our apparel out to our Kickstarter backers by July. There were several kinks in scaling our production an manufacturing, and we are just now sending out all of our goods to our faithful (and patient) Kickstarter backers. Now that we have successfully established our manufacturing, and shirts are reaching our initial backers, the hard part is out of the way—we are ready for our second bulk order, which will undoubtedly run a whole lot smoother now that all of our machines, staff, and manufacturing are in place.

Even though we expect to have all of our Indiegogo rewards fulfilled much sooner, we are promising to have them fulfilled by August, 2014. By pledging during this campaign, you will receive a 40% discount over our online pricing, you will be drastically helping charities improve the lives of people within your community, and you will be among the very few to own our exclusive colorways before they run out.
story_txt:
Earlier this year, we raised over $580,000 on Kickstarter and completed our first bulk order. Now that we have our manufacturing established and are beginning to mail out our apparel, we wanted to give back! Help us to make our second bulk order, with a portion of proceeds going directly to these worthy causes.  Limited colorways, never before seen Radiate apparel, and increased donations will all be unveiled as key milestones are reached along our campaign. Grab your perks to unlock these new items! After 35 days, these exclusive items will no longer be available--so grab them while you can! Why you need thisYour body is amazing. As you work out in the gym or compete in your favorite sport, your body does incredible things to reach its maximum performance--veins expand, metabolism increases, muscles swell, and your body radiates warmth. You are an extraordinary machine. But all of this helpful information goes lost because we can only see what is happening on the outside of your body--until now. The Radiate shirt finally allows us to see calories as they burn, muscles as they reach their maximum output, vascular activation, and body temperature as it increases in key areas of your body.Why wait and see if you will be sore the next day? You can now see the muscles you are targeting, the ones you may be neglecting, and their specific intensity level.Why blindly work out?  You can now see your body's immediate response to your workout while you train, rather than guessing or hoping for results over time.Any shirt you have ever worn to the gym has failed to offer you an interactive experience specific to your unique biochemistry. Until now.What You Get & What We NeedOur Indiegogo campaign is devoted to raising proceeds for national charities that are making a huge impact in people’s lives, every day.      ·With the Radiate shirt’s incredible success, we immediately began developing relationships with charities that share our core values. Our mission, from the very beginning, was to create apparel that makes a difference—not only by encouraging intelligent fitness, but by giving back as well. Now that we are established, we are able to begin giving back.     ·Even with our Indiegogo perk prices at 40% off our usual online price, we will be donating 10% of every shirt to charity, such as Toys for Tots and to Play for Pink. This amount will GO UP as our campaign reaches new milestones, so tell your friends  and help to get the word out! This money ensures that funds are going to children who need your help to feel the joy of receiving gifts, and to the research that is necessary to fight breast cancer.Highly Reduced Prices (35 Days only)     ·For the duration of our Indiegogo campaign, all prices will be 40% off of our online prices—so grab two shirts for nearly the price of one! Proceeds go to a good cause. We want as many people to be able to afford the Radiate shirt as possible, and to be able to make a contribution during our charitable campaign.Limited Colorways     ·For our Indiegogo community, we are releasing colorways that are limited and that will no longer be offered after our campaign! Only you and those who pledge during our campaign will be grabbing these limited releases before they are gone. Real-Time Feedback,NASA Technology      ·Incorporating NASA technology into our revolutionary fabric and seam-routing, alongside advanced moisture wicking and heat transfer, we have created the world’s most advanced athletic apparel—capable of changing color in real-time to reveal your athletic output. Fulfilling Our Second Bulk Order     ·We are currently completing our very first bulk order, fulfilling orders for over 50,000 shirts globally. These have been the only 50,000 of their kind—until this moment on Indiegogo.     ·With your help, we will be able to complete our second bulk order of apparel, giving everyone on Indiegogo the world’s best in athletic apparel. Without your help, our second bulk order may not come to fruition, and several charities will go without help from what could be an incredibly powerful monetary contribution. Using Our Collective Power for Good!      ·After running a very successful crowdsourcing campaign earlier this year, we can finally use the demand from thousands of people and turn that love towards the people who need it most. Check out the charities that we have partnered with, and let us know if you have nay other charities in mind that we should be giving to!  OUR INITIAL PERK ITEMSMore will be released as we reach new milestones in our campaign! The Radiate Shooter's SleeveThe Radiate T- Shirt Ultra-Soft w/ Color Change Logo. Logo appears with body heat.The RADIATE SHIRT: RED-TO-WHITE(Donates to Play for Pink/ Breast Cancer Research Foundation)The red-to-white colorway begins as red and then changes to a light red; as you continue to push yourself, the shirt goes to pure white! Logo changes from brown to fire orange, creating a "fire" effect. LIMITED EDITION--if you can't stand the heat, stay out of the gym.The RADIATE SHIRT: GREEN-TO-YELLOW(Donates to Toys for Tots/ The U.S. Marines)The green-to-yellow colorway begins as green and then changes to a lime green; as you continue to push yourself, the shirt goes to neon yellow! Logo changes from brown to fire orange, creating a "fire" effect. LIMITED EDITION--this shirt is green and ready to go! (We will be donating whatever we have raised partway through our Indiegogo campaign on Dec. 23rd, so that donations raised will arrive in time for this year. Donations raised after Dec. 23rd will be donated at the end of our campaign as well, in January.) THE MISSIONNew shirts and charities will be revealed as the Indiegogo community continues to pledge for perks.  Our Green-to-Yellow
Radiate Shirt is paired with Toys
for Tots, which enables U.S. Marines to deliver gifts to underprivileged
children during the holiday season. www.toysfortots.org
Our Red-to-White STAR
Radiate Shirt is paired with Play
for Pink, which donates 100% of its funds to Breast Cancer Research
Foundation.               www.playforpink.org
As we reach new
milestones along our campaign, we will release additional colorways for
charities, new Radiate apparel items with new charities attached to them, and incredible
pricing in the spirit of giving back!UNLOCKABLES AND MILESTONESAs you give more to our campaign, we want to give more back to you. As our campaign reaches new milestones, we will be releasing limited colorways, additional monetary donations, and new Radiate apparel that is exclusive to the Indiegogo community. If we are able to reach $600K within our campaign, every backer will receive a FREE Radiate apparel item that has yet to be released, and only attainable through Indiegogo. Our Milestone Chart will track our progress toward these goals! Additional unlockables may be released sporadically, as well, in addition to what you see here on the chart!  THE OBSTACLE COURSEWe have pitted Radiate's Red-to-White colorway against Radiate's Green-to-Yellow colorway, in the charity showdown of a lifetime! As these two colorways are grabbed up by the Indiegogo community, each shirt will make its way down the obstacle course--until it literally passes a milestone. The first colorway to reach 100K will earn their respective charity an additional power donation. This additional sum of money will go a long way to help.                     www.radiateathletics.com

These shirts fit like dry fit shirts you may be used to. They are tighter than a regular shirt (so your heat can register on the shirt), but not as tight as compression shirts. Orders will be sent USPS
International orders will be sent FEDEX or UPS

International Backers

Just add $10 to your pledge for shipping and expect your shirts to take about 2 weeks to ship.
Your orders will be sent FEDEX or UPS
We cannot change the value of the packages

Bulk orders of 300+ or Custom orders
Please email Mike at mmanzi@radiateathletics.com, and he thanks you for your patience!
Athlete/Celebrity Support
If you love the project and can help us get in touch with celebrities or athletes DIRECTLY, there is a lot we can do with you and we ask that you email Mike at mmanzi@radiateathletics.com, and again, he thanks you for your patience ahead of time!
Sponsorships
At this point we are NOT able to give free shirts to individuals or sponsor any teams. 
Other Colors and Styles
During this campaign we are only offering 2 colors initially. If you would like any of the other colors or styles, you can find them at www.RadiateAthletics.com

story:
Background

In the early days of my PAPPBRILLE eye glasses, friends would approach me about creating sun glasses that were stylish, comfortable, offering reliable UV protection and in a low price range. In other words, they wanted me to create a cool pair of glasses that would serve as a steady companion for urban everyday life! For the past year and a half this idea has taken hold of me and led me to develop a diverse array of PAPP UV prototypes, which have been met with great enthusiasm at design fairs and in the personal encounters. I’m now ready to develop a PAPP UV series produced in the same fashion.
 
 

PAPP UV

  • waterproof and flexible
  • flat and light
  • uv 400 polarisation (absorbs reflections) filter
  • handmade
  • new concept for sunglasses
  • two shapes in two collors (black & red)
PAPP UV are popular not only for their contemporary and minimalist design—they come  in two shapes and two different hues. They also have properties and advantages that ordinary sun glasses do not have. Made from an organic combination of wood and card board, the PAPP UV frame, is created from a single unit of material and is thus lightweight and extremely flexible and resilient. So much so, that they can easily be stored in a book or in a pant pocket without breaking. But there are also other characteristics make PAPP UV a favorite item for our times.
 
 
With regard to sun protection, UV PAPP offers a UV 400 polarization filter, which is guaranteed  by a certified optician. Another characteristic is that the glasses are coated with a hypo-allergenic and water repellent lacquer.The bendable aluminum temple tips can be easily adjusted to achieve the perfect fit. The eyeglass rims evoke classical cardboard packaging and show that PAPP UV’s conscious attitude toward its primary materials. PAPP UV takes great pride in the fact that it is both hand-crafted in Germany and a sustainable product.

What the Funds Will Go Toward

The PAPP UV frames are composed of one unit, and yet there are numerous details and single components that make it a distinctive and original pair of sunglasses. The sun filter, the hinges made of natural rubber, the aluminum temple tips, the shaping molds and the rims are  standard components that must be especially used in order to manufacture PAPP UV. These items make up the basic requirements in order to create a minimal number of the product series. The frames require that a minimal stock of the raw materials must be purchased, and then be custom cut and varnished. The rims which bear the special PAPP UV trademark will be labelled  with the brandname „PAPP UP Berlin.“ Lastly all of the single components must be assembled and the packaging must be developed. In order to be able to make this product available to the public, I need to enlist your help. Thank you very much.

Cantemir Gheorghiu

story:
Our Story

I'm a freelance Sound Designer and Composer working within the Music and Audio Post Industries. For the past 15+ years I've been making recordings and creating libraries of sounds. My experience and these recordings start with my my early days recording vintage synthesizers and drum machines at the legendary Audio Playground Synthesizer Museum to teaching Audio Post, Field Recording and Sound Design at Full Sail University to my current award winning work designing sounds for Feature Films and Hardware / Software companies like AudioSpillage's "DrumSpillage", Little Endian Ltd's. SpectrumWorx", The Dave Smith Instruments "Tempest" and beyond.


My goal over the next two months is to recover the other half of my archives from storage in Florida, get them here to Colorado and properly edit and archive these recordings and sounds to turn them into a creative commons based, royalty free sound library for use by others in their own productions. The funding helps cover storage costs, shipping, transfers, data backups, studio maintenance and the day to day costs of creating, maintaining and preparing a sound library for use. The expected release of this library is the end of February 2012.


The Impact

You will be contributing to saving a massive wealth of historical recordings of unique and rare music equipment, field recordings and designed sound libraries as well as a large chunk of my cherished memories and experiences. These sounds will then be available for others to use in helping their artistic visions flourish and hopefully make the world a more interesting sounding place. If you are a sound reseller, production company or someone seeking a unique package, there are packages available that are specifically tailored for such uses and needs and may be of interest to you as well.


The uses of a library like this are endless. Since I work as a sound designer I understand what types of sounds could make for interesting source material and what can be done with those types of sounds. Not to mention being able to provide sounds right out of the box that are ready to go. The breadth of this material is extremely broad. From Musical Content to Field Recordings that includes Foley, Ambiences, Props, Rare and Hard to Obtain Recordings, Custom Impulse Responses and loads more. It's great for a novice sound designer all the way to a master. It will also make for amazing musical source content if you're into making any type of music requiring a interesting touch, but especially more esoteric and cutting edge types of music. I'll also be including loads of oops, one shots, and sampler instruments in the packages. I might even include some custom designed hardware and/or software preset collections if all goes well!


What We Need & What You Get


My funding goal is $1,250.00 USD. A brief explanation of my expenses is already listed above.


What you get for your contribution will be a free download of a mixed sound collection of various increments based on your contribution amount. I will be sure to mix the content fairly so there's a bit of everything in every level package since I know some of this content could potentially be considered more desirable than other content.


Due to the age imposed technological limitations of a portion of this material, All content will be a MINIMUM of 48kHz/24Bit .wav file format up to 192kHz/24Bit. All files will be organized and meta-tagged using the most popular sound library formats. For example, 60 minutes or stereo audio at 48/24 = 1,012.5mb. 60 minutes of stereo audio at 192/24 = 4050mb.


The contribution reward packages are broken down as such:



$1 - $4 = My undying gratitude
$5 - $19 = 250mb Download Package - Approximately 15 Minutes of Sounds @ 48/24 stereo wav
$20 - $34 = 500mb Download Package Approximately 30 Minutes of Sounds @ 48/24 stereo wav
$35 - $49 = 750mb Download Package Approximately 45 Minutes of Sounds @ 48/24 stereo wav
$50 - $74 = 1GB Download Package - Approximately 1 Hour of Sounds @ 48/24 stereo wav
$75 - $ 999 = 1.5GB Download Package - Over 1.5 Hours of Sounds @ 48/24 stereo wav

$1,000 - $1,999. A 750mb custom one of a kind sound library delivered via insured mail on a USB Drive.

$2,000 - $2,999. A 1.5GB custom one of a kind sound library delivered via insured mail on a USB Drive.

$3,000 or more = A 3GB custom one of a kind sound library delivered via insured mail on a USB drive.


*The custom sound library packages may take additional time to create/curate and will be delivered no later than October, 31st 2012 unless specified otherwise in an custom agreement. The custom packages will be the only packages that will be legally open for direct resale without significant sonic modification from the original source sound.


During this process I will possibly be releasing videos of behind the scenes footage of how libraries like this are created and some of my adventures in creating this library, tutorials on how I created some of the sounds and tutorials on potential applications and uses.


I may also hold contests for bonus material, special exclusive content and more. I still need to work out those details though.


Regardless of whether funding is met, the library WILL be completed and delivered. As I have more than enough recordings currently accessible to make a extensive and unique library. What the library contains or whether some of my early recordings and archives are included depends if I can recover them from storage in time. There are other funding sources, beyond my own personal investments. The idea is to hopefully recover the archives that are in storage before they are lost, damaged or technologically irrecoverable and help cover the costs of archiving them for the future.\


Until I have more specific demo material posted, you can get an idea of what typos of material and sounds I produce via my vimeo and soundcloud pages.


http://vimeo.com/synsynth

http://soundcloud.com/syndicate-synthetique


Other Ways You Can Help


You can help me in my endeavor by spreading the word about what I'm doing with anyone you may think has some interest in this type of audio toolkit or the history contained within. Please be considerate and don't spam. Please follow the appropriate posting rules of anywhere you choose to help promote my project.


Check out the  "share tools" available to you underneath the promo video to help promote my project that I will update this post with shortly.

story:
What started off as a small Art AP concentration in high school, formed into a small business of creating designs and hand printing them on to pieces for sale. As Co-Owners and Creative Designers, Oru Wonodi and Alexis Michael, we were lucky enough to have hundreds of dollars in sales at our high schools and within other high schools in our area. Now in college, we are looking to the future. It has always been a dream of ours to have a fashion design firm that would consist of edgy clothing and accessory pieces. With your funding we would love to get the first leg of my dream (a successful screen printed apparel line) started and on its way to becoming a well known brand outside the community of Howard County, and now College Park, Maryland and Blacksburg, Virginia!


Currently all designs are hand printed using a series of loose screens. This makes output lag behind the orders we get and thus affects our possible profits! With your help we would like to purchase our own very own screen printing press unit as well as update our use of water-based inks to plastisol inks.


These screen printing stations are pretty pricey. In our case, we hope to raise enough funds to get a Riley Hopkins Jr. Tabletop printing station as well as the press cart that is another product that we believe will be helpful in pushing our success to the next level. The press itself will have one station (otherwise one area for shirts to lay on will they are being printed) and four screen holders. This will allow for different prints to be readily load in a precise manner, as well as designs to be more complex and have more than one colour. The press cart will allow for the storage of any extra designs under it, as well provide a sturdy work surface for the press to sit on.


Another item, or rather group of items, we would be able to buy with the help of your funding are nicer clothing pieces. Right now, we print most of my designs on Gildan brand shirts and other products. These fabric products are nice, but leave a lot to be desired in the quality department. With the money, we would be able to buy American Apparel wholesale items, thus improving the overall quality of my clothing line.

With the items listed above we would be able to create and inventory base, instead of operating on the design as orders come in basis like we do now. As well in combination with the entrepreneurship skills that Oru is learning at Robert H. Smith School of Business at the University of Maryland and the design techniques that Alexis is learning at Virginia Tech, we hope to be able to fully re-launch our brand in the years to come!

With many other screen printers in the world, there is sure to be a good amount of competition, but here at NOVA Prints we like to think that since our designs are design for a unisex audience, we will be able to reach more customers.

Another risk is obviously exposure! So please even if you can't donate please spread the word of our business, and look us up on Instagram at @shopnovaprints!


Thank you in advance for your support!
story_txt:
What started off as a small Art AP concentration in high school, formed into a small business of creating designs and hand printing them on to pieces for sale. As Co-Owners and Creative Designers, Oru Wonodi and Alexis Michael, we were lucky enough to have hundreds of dollars in sales at our high schools and within other high schools in our area. Now in college, we are looking to the future. It has always been a dream of ours to have a fashion design firm that would consist of edgy clothing and accessory pieces. With your funding we would love to get the first leg of my dream (a successful screen printed apparel line) started and on its way to becoming a well known brand outside the community of Howard County, and now College Park, Maryland and Blacksburg, Virginia!

Currently all designs are hand printed using a series of loose screens. This makes output lag behind the orders we get and thus affects our possible profits! With your help we would like to purchase our own very own screen printing press unit as well as update our use of water-based inks to plastisol inks.These screen printing stations are pretty pricey. In our case, we hope to raise enough funds to get a Riley Hopkins Jr. Tabletop printing station as well as the press cart that is another product that we believe will be helpful in pushing our success to the next level. The press itself will have one station (otherwise one area for shirts to lay on will they are being printed) and four screen holders. This will allow for different prints to be readily load in a precise manner, as well as designs to be more complex and have more than one colour. The press cart will allow for the storage of any extra designs under it, as well provide a sturdy work surface for the press to sit on.   Another item, or rather group of items, we would be able to buy with the help of your funding are nicer clothing pieces. Right now, we print most of my designs on Gildan brand shirts and other products. These fabric products are nice, but leave a lot to be desired in the quality department. With the money, we would be able to buy American Apparel wholesale items, thus improving the overall quality of my clothing line.With the items listed above we would be able to create and inventory base, instead of operating on the design as orders come in basis like we do now. As well in combination with the entrepreneurship skills that Oru is learning at Robert H. Smith School of Business at the University of Maryland and the design techniques that Alexis is learning at Virginia Tech, we hope to be able to fully re-launch our brand in the years to come!With many other screen printers in the world, there is sure to be a good amount of competition, but here at NOVA Prints we like to think that since our designs are design for a unisex audience, we will be able to reach more customers.Another risk is obviously exposure! So please even if you can't donate please spread the word of our business, and look us up on Instagram at @shopnovaprints!Thank you in advance for your support!

story:
Hello!

My name is Tom and I'm the Inventor of The Dory Hat.

I know what your thinking. It's just another Hat.

Let me explain...

This hat was designed for people who sail on the water. This Hat has a simple design feature that makes it perfect for boaters. The Dory Hat incorporates a short Visor. When sailing on the water, the sailor is constantly looking up at the sails and wind direction indicators. What happens when its windy on the water and you look up? Your favorite Hat blows off your head and ends up in the water!

Not with The Dory Hat. With its short Visor, The Dory Hat will stay firmly on your head, even in the windiest conditions. In the event The Dory Hat does fall off, no need to worry, The Dory Hat floats! In addition to keeping the sun out of your eyes, because of the short visor, The Dory Hat  increases your peripheral vision and will not obstruct your view. Although The Dory Hat was originally designed for boaters, this hat has many other uses. 

The short visor allows you to work on your favorite toys without interfering with the job at hand. Golfers and tennis players will love the short visor as it won't obstruct your view.

Another important design of The Dory Hat, is the underside of the Visor, features a dark offset color so it cuts down on the suns reflection off the water.

Last but not least, The Dory Hat has an adjustable strap, so one size fits all.

The Dory Hat will be available in Blue, White, Black, Red, Green, Tan, and Yellow.

Please specify in the notes section what color/colors you would like.

All Dory Hats will feature a hip DoryGear logo near the back of the Hat.

Funding will be used for manufacturing, distribution and building a new Website. Dory Hats will retail for $19.95. Watch for our Website in the near future! www.dorygear.com

So, What are you waiting for? Please help us make The Dory Hat a big success!

story:
We've been designing and manufacturing watches under our MINUS-8 watch brand as a passion project inside our studio for the past two years. Now, with our newest and most remarkable watch, the MINUS-8 DIVER, we're hoping the pre-sales from our first manufacturing run will give us the capital we need to spin-out and set up the company to rollout even more outstanding products.

Please join the MINUS-8 community and pre-order your DIVER today. Thank you for your support!​

Drawing from our years of experience designing watches for some of the biggest brands in the world, we refused to compromise on the functional integrity of our DIVER design or on the materials we chose, like ultra-lightweight, corrosion resistant titanium for the case and bracelet.

DIVER is a true tool for the deeper places in the world. 

Our scratch-resistant sapphire crystal lenses are second only to diamonds in terms of hardness for maximum durability. They also feature an anti-reflective coating which transmits over 98% of the available light to the watch face for maximum visibility. 

 

Our team maintained a maniacal attention to detail throughout DIVER's design process. We raised the numbering on the face and machined the numbers on the timing bezel for added contrast and readability. The deeper knurls around the timing ring also provide maximum grip in wet conditions. And for our professional divers out there, the helium release valve maintains the case's integrity and protects the timing mechanism when ascending from the deep. 

 

We use a Seiko NE15 fully automatic movement with 50+ hours of power reserve. 

 

DIVER's luminescent face elements feature Super-LumiNova for maximum brightness. This technology offers up to 10x higher brightness than previous zinc sulfide–based materials and can last for hours in the darkest conditions. 

TIP: The performance or “glow" of the Super-LumiNova indices depends on the quality of the light source used to charge. The “Lume" is charged by absorbing UV light, not visible light. The difference between sunlight and an LED bulb can be drastic. Sunlight can fully charge the Lume in less that 30 seconds, while LED blubs will not give a complete charge after 10 hours of exposure! The absolute best way to charge up your Lume is direct sunlight. In bright sun, only 30 seconds or less will give a full charge. 
There are many different types of light bulbs, so it may help to experiment with various sources to see what works best. In general, here are the charging sources we’ve discovered, ranked by effectiveness:

   #1 Sunlight- Best
   #2 Blacklight-Very Good
   #3 Florescent bulb or UV LED blubs- OK
   #4 White LED’s, Compact Fluorescent-Poor
   #5 Incandescent standard bulb-Poor
   #6 White or Blue LED- Poor

 

Both DIVER colors feature a matte finish.

 

 

READY TO SHIP

For those of you who order a MINUS-8 DIVER from our first production run of 480 units (240 Black and 240 Silver), we begin shipping MID-DECEMBER! FREE SHIPPING IN THE U.S.

11/10 Update! We just received the first 20 watches from our production run and will receive the remainder ahead of schedule! This means we will be shipping all of our early bird orders the first week of December!
 

Special thanks to our friend Jenni Wilson who's been putting our watches to the test!

"Tough, reliable, and great looking! The MINUS-8 DIVER is perfect for my work at the aquarium and in the open sea.”  - Jenni Wilson,  Photographer and AAUS Professional Diver @ Long Beach Aquarium 

 

All of our DIVER watches undergo rigorous testing before being released from the factory. Each one is pressure tested by a technician in a Winfred WF-208 water proof testing machine and pressure tested up to 30ATM ( 1016.99 feet) with 3 Bar (43.5 psi) of pressure to verify that the seals are sound and that the helium release valve is working. 

 

 

The DIVER is an ultra high-performance automatic dive watch that has a unique and versatile look. DIVER looks great with a wetsuit, a sweatsuit or a 3-piece suit. Expert watchmaking, great materials and bold design combine to create a dive watch like nothing you’ve ever seen before.

 

 

In response to some feedback we've received, we’ve developed a new line of alternate rubber dive straps in three colors as an add-on product for your MINUS-8 DIVER. These new strap designs are off to the factory for tooling and will be shipped in May of 2017. We think they are a great, wearable alternative to the titanium bracelet that comes standard with each DIVER. We hope you love it!

We began designing the DIVER over two years ago. After designing and producing two full lines of watches at MINUS-8, we wanted to make a truly ambitious timepiece. The DIVER is the result of thousands of hours of work, hundreds of sketches and renderings, and countless debates.

 

BRETT LOVELADY / CEO. As the founder of ASTRO Studios, ASTRO Gaming & MINUS-8, Brett and ASTRO have designed hundreds of products, including watches for Nike and other companies. Brett founded MINUS-8 as an original brand inspired by West Coast design culture and the love of machines.

 

KYLE SWEN / VP DESIGN. As an ASTRO partner and design leader at ASTRO Studios and MINUS-8, Kyle has designed and directed the development of many products, wearables & watches including the Nike Fuelband and Nike Triax Watch line. Kyle now directs the team for the whole MINUS-8 collection.

 

DAVID WHETSTONE / DESIGNER. As an ASTRO Design Director and lead designer at ASTRO Studios and MINUS-8, David has developed the modern vision of MINUS-8 and personally designed many of the watches. He also leads the team for the MINUS-8 collection.

* SPECIAL RECOGNITION* DANA KRIEGER / EX-ASTRO Creative Director in 2013-14, Dana initiated MINUS-8 as an original ASTRO Program, before moving on to direct design at SONOS.

 

Since launching in 1994, Astro Studios has been designing breakthrough products, brands and experiences at the intersection of technology and lifestyle for many of the best companies in the world. 

Some of our clients include:

 

FAQs

Q: Does MINUS-8 have a Warranty on the DIVER?

A: YES! MINUS-8 offers a limited warranty against defects in materials and workmanship for a period of two years following the original purchase date of your MINUS-8 watch from an authorized dealer. This warranty covers defects in materials and workmanship with your MINUS-8 watch. If you encounter either of these issues with your watch we will repair or replace it, subject to our inspection of the watch. The warranty does not cover normal wear and tear, glass, watch case, strap, bracelet, loss or theft. You will void your warranty if you open your caseback, push the buttons underwater, or forget to screw down or push in the crown and expose your watch to moisture. The foregoing does not affect your statutory rights. 

 

Q: What are the risks associated with backing the MINUS-8 DIVER?

A: None. Our watches have already gone through design, development and production. We have assembled and are ready to ship 240 Black DIVER watches and 240 Silver Diver watches to our first 480 backers in December of 2016! 

 

Q: How much does shipping cost?

A: Shipping is FREE in the US. 

 

Q: Will I receive my MINUS-8 DIVER in time for the holidays?

A: Most likely. All of our early bird backers (first 480 units) will ship mid-December and should, barring extreme weather situations, reach their destinations in time for Christmas. 

 

THE MINUS-8 DIVER REFERRAL PROGRAM

Thank you for helping us spread the word!

We’ve created a great referral program for all of our MINUS-8 DIVER watch backers.

  • Refer one (1) MINUS-8 DIVER watch backer and receive a FREE additional Rubber Strap for your DIVER in one of the available colors ($48 Value!)

 

  • Refer five (5) MINUS-8 DIVER watch backers and receive a FREE MINUS-8 DIVER or a full refund on your MINUS-8 DIVER purchase + a FREE Rubber Strap for your DIVER in a color of your choice (Up to a $636 Value!)

 

HOW DO I GET STARTED?

You must refer people using a your personal URL that is generated through your Indiegogo account. You can distribute this personal URL via social media and through email. No one will know it is your unique URL. 

 

HOW DO I FIND MY PERSONAL URL?

There are two ways.

 

FIRST METHOD: Use the links provided in your MINUS-8 DIVER purchase confirmation email.

1. Log into your Indiegogo account. If you don't have an account, you can sign up for one. Make sure to remember your username and password - you will need it later to log in and track your referrals.

2. Then visit our campaign page and purchase a Perk that includes a MINUS-8 DIVER watch.

3. A confirmation email will appear in your inbox.  Scroll down to the bottom of the email.

4. You will see these icons.

These links will share your unique URL via Facebook, Twitter, Google+ or Email.

5. Simply click on any of the links and follow the instructions.

 

SECOND METHOD: Get your personal URL from our campaign page.

1. Log into your Indiegogo account.  

2. Visit our campaign page.

3. See the BACK IT button next to our campaign video? Find the “hyperlink” button to  create your own personal referral link to our campaign.

4. Click on the link icon to generate your unique URL.

5. Share it via social media and email and Indiegogo will keep track of all of the traffic you generate and the successful referrals you helped create.

 

HOW DO I KEEP TRACK OF MY REFERRALS?

1. Log into your Indiegogo account.

2. On the top right corner of the page, you will see your profile name.  Click on it.

3. In the dropdown menu, click ‘My Contributions’

4. On your My Contributions page, look for the menu bar and click on the ‘Referrals’ tab.

5. You will see the number of people you referred, the number who have purchased and the total dollar amount of their contributions.  

6. Once the campaign is over, Indiegogo provides us with detailed information on how many MINUS-8 DIVER watches were purchased through your referrals and at what perk level.  

7. We then either issue you a refund on DIVER(s) you have purchased, or issue you campaign credit toward the purchase of a new DIVER.  

*Please note that contributors cannot receive referral credit for referring themselves.  

 

IF SOMEONE I REFER PURCHASES SOMETHING OTHER THAN A DIVER OR SIMPLY BACKS THE CAMPAIGN, DO I STILL RECEIVE THE REFERRAL CREDIT?

Unfortunately, no. The economics of our referral program only work when a MINUS-8 DIVER watch is purchased through one of the available Perks that include a MINUS-8 DIVER watch.

 

DO I NEED TO HAVE BACKED ONE OF THE MINUS-8 DIVER WATCH PERKS TO PARTICIPATE IN THE REFERRAL PROGRAM?

Yes. You need to have bought one of the perks that include at least one MINUS-8 DIVER watch.

 

HOW WILL YOU CREDIT ME FOR MY REFERRALS?

Once the campaign is over, Indiegogo will provide us with detailed information on how many MINUS-8 DIVERS were purchased through your referrals and at what perk level.

We will then either issue you a refund on a MINUS-8 DIVER you have purchased, or issue you campaign credit toward the purchase of a new MINUS-8 DIVER.

 

Thanks again for your support! And happy sharing!

story:
We are passionate about making the world a better place using sustainable practices to enrich the lives of others. We need your support to achieve the goal!

We've created prototypes of the sunglasses but in order to make them available to the public we need support from y'all. Handcrafted sunglasses can be expensive to manufacture and we have a wonderful team building each pair. We designed these sunglasses, in our dorm room, specifically to make them high quality and at the same time affordable. 

Our Story,

After a lecture about sustainable business we, four college roommates, decided that we wanted to change an industry norm by implementing sustainable business practices. We found that by replacing the plastics that are normally used in sunglasses with wood, we could reduce the emissions and pollution created when producing sunglasses. Our mission is to create and distribute wooden sunglasses that not only look fantastic but also help the environment. With every pair of sunglasses that we sell we plant a tree in an American National Forest.

-The Tigerling Team

Bamboo Sunglasses

Black Walnut Sunglasses

Classic Case (Left), Travel Case (Right)

Black Walnut Sunglasses with Classic Case

story:
Short Summary

Vaults of Fortune,Inc is a U.S. based company, headquartered in California. We are currently in development and testing of the first Showcase Vault (The Corp) that will enable gun owners to proudly display their guns safely and securely.  Our product design is not only capable of saving lives, but it will also provide the ultimate display case for any collector.

This campaign is important to our company because we want to make a difference in the world. Most gun cabinets purchased today are easily broken into by children who put themselves in a grave situation.  We want gun collectors to be able to showcase their firearms in safe and secure manner. Your contribution would help catapult us into a position where we can begin manufacturing these products and get them into the hands of collectors who need them.


What We Need & What You Get

We are currently in need of additional funding to finish the prototype which is currently in work. We also will use the funds to purchase tooling and equipment needed to make the safes on a large scale in Southern California. 

  • $10K for Prototyping
  • $5K will go to the Lawyers for Manufacturing Agreements (We are as upset as you are about this, but it's a necessity!)
  • $80K toward tooling & equipment
  • $5K for warehouse retrofit
We are happy to share with you the following perks as a contributor to this campaign:
  • $1 Contributors receive an updated newsletter and Thank You from Vaults of Fortune
  • $5 Contributors will receive a Vaults of Fortune Sticker 
  • $25 Contributors will receive a Vaults of Fortune baseball cap
  • $50 Contributors will receive a luxurious polo shirt with VoF logo similar to what our staff wears today
  • $500 Contributor will be given an interview with the founders 
  • $1,500 gets you one discounted Imperial VI Gun Safe with Digital lock
  • $7,500 gets you one of the first Display Vaults coming off of the line next year!
    Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

      The Impact

      Your contribution today will not only help our business grow, but it will help to save lives of children who get their hands on an unlocked guns and accidentally shoot themselves.

      Risks & Challenges

      • The biggest challenge is creating a locking mechanism for the door which must be hinged on a rotating 1.5" steel tube
      • We have gathered a team of safe & vault experts to design the Angel Lock design
      • Our combined experience with low rate production and project management will help us achieve our goals

      Other Ways You Can Help

      Even if you can't contribute money, that doesn't mean you can't help us:

      • Please get involved by promoting this campaign on Facebook, Twitter and other social media avenues to get the word out
      • Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

      Who and What We Support

                   


      The Executive Team

         Rene Ramirez's (President) Background:

      His career began in the metal working field in 1997 when he began introducing innovating concepts in custom trucks for functional and aesthetic purposes. This included design, fabrication and welding.  His passion for the craft led him into the big iron industry which later took him across the United States and the world to work on varied and special steel projects. He became an inspector in steel projects which added an additional high quality dynamic to his skills.  Personal tragedy in his family with an unsecured gun drove this  passion, skill and welding of steel  to design and develop a system that allows firearms to be properly stored within an artistic and contemporary showcase vault.  This tragedy has culminated in the most beautiful and unique products that VoF brings to the market.

           Eric Traboulay's (VP) Background:

      A graduate of the Univ. of California Riverside in Business and IT systems with graduate degrees in business (MBA) and management (PMP) and he is a lead engineer in a high tech UAV program at Northrop Grumman. He is the founder and owner of many businesses in the Southern California Area and an entrepreneur “par excellence”. He brings to VoF™ knowledge in finance, management, marketing and the ability to penetrate the US market with innovative VoF™ products.

He is the founder and owner of many businesses in the Southern California Area and an entrepreneur “par excellence”. story:
The Story of Charmology Jewelry

I've been making art since I was a little girl, always crafting something new and sometimes creating a mess. Whether it was making friendship bracelets out of electric wires or using mixed media to make collages, there was never a shortage of creativity!

All of this led me to where I am today, starting a jewelry business. Charmology, launched in 2014, focuses on dainty handcrafted jewelry using natural gemstones, druzy and more.

I've created several pieces and I have made do with basic tools, but this is where I came to a road block. There are several tools and materials that I need help with funding.

By simply just asking for your support, I have already accomplished a huge part of my goal; being vulnerable enough and willing to ask for help! However, your monetary support would truly make my ideas become reality. With your help and support, I will be able to fund this adventure to create my jewelry, have it be available online and move forward towards furthering the success of my business.

What I Need and Perk Rewards

As I said above, the majority of tools and materials I have covered. However, there are some items that I need to make certain jewelry pieces. Being realistic about what I need to get these tools and materials, jewelry produced, available for purchase online and shipped, I am looking to raise $700. The money goes directly towards the purchasing of all materials needed (metals, stones, tools) as well as for display photography and packaging materials.

Items I Need
  • Handstamping Kit - $80
  • Prop Kit for Jewelry Photography - $74
  • Jewelers Saw - $10
  • Steel Ring Mandrel - $13
  • Punch Pliers for Metal Sheets - $9
  • Capital Goods (gemstones, druzy, chains, findings,) and packaging - $400
  • Campaign and PayPal Fees
Every donation you make, no matter how big or small, will be put directly into the production and materials costs, allowing me to bring creative manifestations into fruition and available to the public. Whether I reach the entire goal or not, the money will only be used for the above described purposes.

Donation Perks
  • $1 - My humble and heartfelt gratitude for your support
  • $15 - Receive a 10% discount code for your online purchase at Charmology Jewelry
  • $25 - Receive a 20% discount code for your online purchase at Charmology Jewelry and your choice of white moonstone, pink coral or black onyx cabochon in gold or silver studs.
  • $50 - Receive a 30% discount code for your online purchase at Charmology Jewelry + previous tier earrings and your choice of grey, pink or black leather cord bracelet with gold or silver findings.
  • $75 - Receive a 50% discount code shipping for your online purchase at Charmology Jewelry + previous tier earrings + bracelet and a dainty necklace with personalized initials handstamped on a charm in gold or silver.
  • $100 - Receive all of the previous tier's perks + a pair of my handcrafted gold dipped leather feather earrings. Your choice between eggshell cream, soft pink or turquoise leather.
  • $200 - Receive all of the previous tier's perks and a travel jewelry box in either turquoise or magenta by Mele & Co.


Risks & Challenges

One of the biggest challenges for me, I've already overcome (sort of). My concern before starting this campaign was not having donation perks premade due to requiring the tools I need and not having photos included in my campaign. I'm a visual person, I like seeing what I'm getting when I put money towards a something and I expect others are the same way. That's where the "risk" comes in I suppose. However, you have to start somewhere, right?


Other Ways You Can Help Charmology

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help...

If you are unable to contribute at this time, I sure could use your help in getting the word out about the Charmology Jewelry campaign. Please pass this along to your friends and family and share it via your social media of choice (Facebook, Twitter, etc)

Here is a direct link you can also share: http://www.indiegogo.com/projects/charmology-jewelry

Thank you doesn't even express my appreciation for you, your time & support!

Sincerely,

Virginia Robertson

story:
This project is about awareness and education. Let’s get the message out about #smartisbeautiful and support the education of women and girls in Guatemala. What is considered beautiful changes year to year and from culture to culture, but what is beautiful across the world is a smart mind, and a kind heart. We live in a society whose seemingly sole focus is on women's outer appearance. There are thousands of beauty blogs and magazines whose focus is on giving us the newest and greatest beauty regimen and bashing women who do not "look" right. We need to take back the power and break the cycle of beauty oppression by creating a mindset of true beauty. Take a stand with us. Don’t be defined by outward appearance. Let’s define ourselves by the content of our minds and hearts. Our #smartisbeautiful collection is focused on empowering women everywhere to be their own beautiful and use the power of education to empower women and girls in Guatemala to rise above poverty.


This is the power of socially conscious fashion. If we meet our goal, we’ll send 50 women to school, including the mama’s who never went to school, mamas who didn’t get to finish their schooling, daughters who have never gone to school, and young women who have had a few years of schooling and want to learn more. In addition to sending women to school, your support will cover the cost of project-related t-shirt and artwork production, as well as recognize the dedicated efforts of the 4 All Humanity team.


You’re also invited along on this journey. In exchange for every pledge over $25, we’ll send you an enclosed QR Code. When scanned, you’ll learn a little bit about the girl you’re supporting in school. You’ll see a glimpse into her daily life, and her future dreams. And if you’d like to meet her for yourself, please pledge $4,000 or more!

#Smartisbeauitful is empowering women around the world. Without your help in raising the $30,000 we will not be able to create this collection or give the needed funds to send women and girls to school.

"Education is the one thing that will equalize us across the globe." -Norma Juma

Be a change maker and help us change the lives of women and girls in Guatemala!

THE COLLECTION:

SIZING GUIDE:

THE PRODUCTION:

This collection is 100% made in the USA. We are a fair trade label at heart and this collection is no different. By producing these shirts in the USA we can guarantee fair labor practices and a quicker delivery time to you.

story:
Hello beautiful people,
About Unique:

 My name is Unique Weston.  I'm a 24 year old self taught designer. I founded Monroe Threadz at age 20 and have been building every since. Monroe Threadz is a sexy couture women's clothing line,  inspired by the iconic, sexy actress and model; Marilyn Monroe. After reading her biography, I discovered that Marilyn spent her childhood as an orphan in the 1950's and managed to still accomplish her goals as an actress and was not only in 30 movies but ended up being one of the highest paid actress of her time. Since I too spent my childhood as a orphan this impressed me and gave me the confidence to go after my dream. Growing up as an orphan without a lot of belongings or resources made me fall in love with fashion at a young age. I eventually taught myself operate a sewing machine and started sewing clothes on myself with the help of Marilyn I decided to start modeling my own designs and like Marilyn, my modeling skills took off like a rocket. I gained a lot of popularity off my shoots and eventually started scouting my own models to model my designs with me and eventually  called them my Monroe Modelz.

About Monroe Threadz:


 Monroe Threadz is for all the Marilyn Monroe's around the world that are either already successful or working to be successful. My customer is a sassy, sexy women with a personality to go with the sexy couture pieces. The majority of designs are event wear but I also design everyday, business, swimwear and customs. This is not just another fashion line, It holds a very valuable meaning to inspire women to go after there dreams. Monroe Threadz is for for stylish, bold women who know themselves and love feeling sexy and independent. The reason I want to tell my story and share my clothes is to motivate young women to start businesses and have a harmonic wealthy life. I want  to support there entrepreneur lifestyle and be able to  provide them with a unique wordrobe to go with there unique life. 

Road to success:

After building Monroe Threadz by creating custom designs , organizing model castings, shoots and different fashion shows. In 2014 I took a huge leap of faith and moved  to LA.  I left with with my sewing machine, Monroe Threadz savings and faith in my dream. I've been living in LA for a little over a year now, its def been challenging but I've slowly  networked and designed outfits that has caught a lot of women's attention. The last two collections I released have gotten a wonderful response and sold more than I projected!!! I was so excited when I got all my orders but quickly became overwhelmed when I had to sit down and sew each design by hand.  Monroe Threadz made a lot of women happy, which gave me the courage to continue implementing designs into the new summer collection, but this time around I WANT TO DO IT RIGHT and get my 12 Monroe Threadz pieces reproduced in small, medium and large!  It would be an amazing feeling to release this Summer collection professionally to a larger crowd of women.


What needs to be done to make this dream turn reality:

I working to get each popular design re-manufactured in addition to some new summer designs, to make this happen I need $10,000 and happen to be $7000 short. Funds will go directly into manufacturing, organizing a professional lookbook shoot, recreating a fabulous website where women can also order custom designs and assembling a new Monroe Team (Monroe modelz, make up artist, photographers, stylist, hair stylist and many more. With the capital that I have already contributed and the money I will raise with your help, I will be able to complete this collection and give my Monroe boss women exactly what they need and also have the product to showcase my designs in two interested LA boutiques!


I believe YOU GET WHAT YOU GIVE so I created some lovely perks to show my appreciation!

THANK YOU EVER SO MUCH
