story:
Enjoy, you deserve it. It will be a pleasure to make these belts, at the highest level of quality possible, this is what we are about, and you all made it happen. The most technically advanced belt with super luxury leather, thanks to you.

 

INDESTRUCTIBLE

KEVLAR & LEATHER

 

 

  In 2016 we launched "The Indestructible" Kevlar® & Leather Belt and it was a major success with almost 2000 backers. This year our Smart Belt has raised more than 1 Million Dollars  with almost 12.000 backers.

Our signature invention is the addition of a Kevlar® Core to classic belt construction. This material is the strongest textile ever made, stronger than steel but flexible and light. Most of the wear you see on a belt is due to the constant stretching that it is subjected under the pressure of daily wear. Because of it's special construction, our belt is much less prone to wear and tear. The leather we use for the exterior is top grain Italian Leather, sourced from one of Italy's best tanneries. In stress testing, our belt has proven to be 13 times stronger than the weakest belt tested and 5 times stronger than the most rugged reinforced belt. Be sure, our Smart Belt will last many many years and retain it's beauty.  

 

 UNPARALLELED COMFORT

 

 For 2017 we're back with much more. This time our belt is the best product possible from all angles. One major innovation is the Automatic Track System that eliminates the 5 hole system. A classic belt is not really adjustable because holes are 1" ( 2.5 cm ) apart.  Say you had a hefty lunch or lost a bit of weight. Adjusting by one hole up or one hole down is a big leap and usually improper for small modifications in waist size. Our track system has 1/5" ( 5 mm ) increments that are well suited for waist size modifications that occur naturally throughout the day so as to be adjusted for Perfect Comfort at any time, truly adjust. If you've never owned this type of belt before, the level of comfort will blow you away, it really changes the way you feel. 

 

NO SIZES - JUST A PERFECT DIY FIT

 

 

   No more sizes. Having sizes means you can get them wrong and makes it hard to order a belt for someone else. Sizes also mean that if you are exactly in between you will be wearing your classic belt at one end of the 5 holes or at the other, not really elegant.

  Because we are an on-line company we believe that our strap attachment type buckle is the best way to go in order to have very happy customers. It's also perfect for elegance. No more short or too long belt ends and no more wrong sizes. We have tested our belts over the last 6 months and these buckles are as dependable as  they are beautiful.   You will receive the maximum length of strap, you will  be able to measure the actual belt around your hips, mark, cut and attach for a perfect tailored fit. The max. waist size is 45" or 115 cm.

 

ELEGANT LEATHER 

 

 

  

We use the best Top Grain Italian Leather Vegetable Tanned. made to our custom specifications by one the few tanneries that use vegetable tanning, a process that is eco-friendly and produces the strongest and most beautiful  Grade A Luxury Leather. We believe that beauty and quality are as important as functionality and that an indestructible and perfectly comfortable belt should also be the most elegant belt you own. We have prepared two color options for the straps and 4 buckle finishes. We have undergone a lengthy process of trials and prototyping to arrive at the highest level of quality and aesthetic performance. After becoming a backer of our Campaign, at the end of our crowdfunding period, you will be asked to pick the finishes and colors of your belts.

 

DELIVERED ON TIME

STARTING END OF SEPTEMBER

    We are Crowdfunding Veterans, our last Belt Campaign "The indestructible" was a huge success, a large order and we managed to start shipping on time. With that experience on our resume we are confident we will start shipping on time for this one regardless of size. To that end, we will begin production halfway through our campaign. Be sure, we have become efficient professionals with 3 Campaigns over the last 3 years, all of which started to ship on time.

“DuPontTM and Kevlar® are trademarks or registered trademarks of E.I. du Pont de Nemours and Company."

We welcome third party sharing of our product in graphic form and text but only if in accordance and in full respect of trademark and copyright use guidelines concerning Kevlar® and Nomex® issued by it's respective owner, E.I. du Pont de Nemours and Company.

For more information on using these trademarks linked to the materials we use in manufacturing THE INDESTRUCTIBLE belt, please visit:

Kevlar® Trademark Policy

 

A CLOSER LOOK
story_txt:
Enjoy, you deserve it. It will be a pleasure to make these belts, at the highest level of quality possible, this is what we are about, and you all made it happen. The most technically advanced belt with super luxury leather, thanks to you. INDESTRUCTIBLEKEVLAR & LEATHER    In 2016 we launched "The Indestructible" Kevlar® & Leather Belt and it was a major success with almost 2000 backers. This year our Smart Belt has raised more than 1 Million Dollars  with almost 12.000 backers.Our signature invention is the addition of a Kevlar® Core to classic belt construction. This material is the strongest textile ever made, stronger than steel but flexible and light. Most of the wear you see on a belt is due to the constant stretching that it is subjected under the pressure of daily wear. Because of it's special construction, our belt is much less prone to wear and tear. The leather we use for the exterior is top grain Italian Leather, sourced from one of Italy's best tanneries. In stress testing, our belt has proven to be 13 times stronger than the weakest belt tested and 5 times stronger than the most rugged reinforced belt. Be sure, our Smart Belt will last many many years and retain it's beauty.    UNPARALLELED COMFORT 
  For 2017 we're back with much more. This time our belt is the best product possible from all angles. One major innovation is the Automatic Track System that eliminates the 5 hole system. A classic belt is not really adjustable because holes are 1" ( 2.5 cm ) apart.  Say you had a hefty lunch or lost a bit of weight. Adjusting by one hole up or one hole down is a big leap and usually improper for small modifications in waist size. Our track system has 1/5" ( 5 mm ) increments that are well suited for waist size modifications that occur naturally throughout the day so as to be adjusted for Perfect Comfort at any time, truly adjust. If you've never owned this type of belt before, the level of comfort will blow you away, it really changes the way you feel.  NO SIZES - JUST A PERFECT DIY FIT     No more sizes. Having sizes means you can get them wrong and makes it hard to order a belt for someone else. Sizes also mean that if you are exactly in between you will be wearing your classic belt at one end of the 5 holes or at the other, not really elegant.  Because we are an on-line company we believe that our strap attachment type buckle is the best way to go in order to have very happy customers. It's also perfect for elegance. No more short or too long belt ends and no more wrong sizes. We have tested our belts over the last 6 months and these buckles are as dependable as  they are beautiful.   You will receive the maximum length of strap, you will  be able to measure the actual belt around your hips, mark, cut and attach for a perfect tailored fit. The max. waist size is 45" or 115 cm. ELEGANT LEATHER     We use the best Top Grain Italian Leather Vegetable Tanned. made to our custom specifications by one the few tanneries that use vegetable tanning, a process that is eco-friendly and produces the strongest and most beautiful  Grade A Luxury Leather. We believe that beauty and quality are as important as functionality and that an indestructible and perfectly comfortable belt should also be the most elegant belt you own. We have prepared two color options for the straps and 4 buckle finishes. We have undergone a lengthy process of trials and prototyping to arrive at the highest level of quality and aesthetic performance. After becoming a backer of our Campaign, at the end of our crowdfunding period, you will be asked to pick the finishes and colors of your belts. DELIVERED ON TIMESTARTING END OF SEPTEMBER    We are Crowdfunding Veterans, our last Belt Campaign "The indestructible" was a huge success, a large order and we managed to start shipping on time. With that experience on our resume we are confident we will start shipping on time for this one regardless of size. To that end, we will begin production halfway through our campaign. Be sure, we have become efficient professionals with 3 Campaigns over the last 3 years, all of which started to ship on time.“DuPontTM and Kevlar® are trademarks or registered trademarks of E.I. du Pont de Nemours and Company."We welcome third party sharing of our product in graphic form and text but only if in accordance and in full respect of trademark and copyright use guidelines concerning Kevlar® and Nomex® issued by it's respective owner, E.I. du Pont de Nemours and Company.For more information on using these trademarks linked to the materials we use in manufacturing THE INDESTRUCTIBLE belt, please visit:Kevlar® Trademark Policy  A CLOSER LOOK

story:
Helping Austin's Dad Smile From Heaven

My name is Nick McGuinn and I am one of Austin's dad's longtime friends. Dan Sosa was in the process of getting his son a new Moto-Cross Racing Bike when he was suddenly diagnosed with Stage 4 Cancer and passed within 72 Hours at the age of 32. With no warning, and being so young that you wouldn't really think about writing a will, unfortunately, none of Daniel's affairs were in order, leaving Austin and his mother to fend for themselves. Austin is a bright 12 year old young man who is now starting a Non For Profit organization to help raise awareness and prevention of Cancer in Honor of his Father. This to me, from such a young man immediately after losing his father, speaks volumes about his character. His goal is to raise awareness threw competing in a Motocross Circuit and raising money. Getting a Dirt Bike for Austin not only will help keep him doing something his father Dan and he shared together as a team, but also give him something positive to look forward to do in memory of his father.

What We Need & What You Get

We're Looking to raise a total of $5,000.00 for Austin to get a new Dirt Bike so he can start racing for awareness, it will cost around 3,600 + Tax. The remaining funds needed (minus the 5% indiegogo fee) will be allocated towards new safety equipment and gear for Austin. He will be starting the racing season this MARCH of 2014 so please feel free to come and show your support in person as well! Any additional money will be put into a college fund for Austin so when we reach our goal of 5k, please don't hesitate keep donating! 

We have all sorts of cool perks and ways of saying thank you for helping! We have personalized thank you videos directly from Austin, Autographed pictures of Austin on his new bike, A night and dinner for 2 at the luxurious Strathallan Hotel in Rochester's Art District, as well as sponsored stickers on the Racing Bike for all to see.

If for some reason we don't reach our $5,000 goal all funds will go towards getting Austin his new Bike, But, I believe YOU will help us make this happen!

The Impact

In the midst of a tragedy Austin remained strong and the first thing he said after his father passed was, "I want to start a foundation in honor of my dad to help raise awareness and prevention of cancer in men". He has started to develop program ideas to help kids with counseling and families to cope with such a tragedy. Myself personally, along with some of his family members are helping him make this foundation a reality. We have a list of folks who have offered their financial and legal services pro bono to assist with the launching of this foundation. The 501c3 preparations are in progress for the  "Austin's Dad" foundation. At 12 years old Austin is light years ahead of what one could call a good Samaritan. Any support would be Greatly Appreciated! 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand not everyone has the ability to help financially. That's OK! For those that can we greatly appreciate the help and support! For those that can't, we appreciate that you want to help and you still can by sharing this campaign with you're friends! Help us spread the word not only about Austin's motocross aspirations but also about the charity foundation that at 12 years old he is developing in honor of his father! This is inspiring from someone so young. So please help us spread the word and don't forget that indiegogo has some amazing sharing tools that will make this even easier and more efficient!


Thank You All and in the words of Austin, "Be Blessed"!

story:
About Us!

My name is Ian, and I set out on a personal and professional journey many months ago to create one of the first and most unique clothing brands in aviation. Many may not realize it, but aviation is a beautiful and adventurous sport, hobby, industry, but most importantly it is an art form. I was very surprised to find that there is no clothing brand that tries to express the love for aviation in the way we all see it. This is when I came up with the idea to put my love for fashion and t-shirts and mix with my huge passion for aviation (I am a pilot).

I am asking for you fellow lovers of aviation and design, to help contribute to this idea in a huge way. I am seeking anyone that loves fresh and unique designs to help me in furthering my first t-shirt line for Heading 370. With one design already production, we know that we need more designs out there for the world to see. This is where you all come in. By contributing to our campaign, you are helping the world see the impact that aviation has on its users. 

The beauty of this clothing brand is that we aren't just attracting the pilot and aviation community, our designs will attract anyone! By providing inspirational messages and unique designs on our clothing, we are positive anyone can see the value in our brand.

Why do we need the money?

We are trying to raise $6,000 to help fund directly the design and production of four to five more tee designs. With a large portfolio of designs ready to be implemented, we are ready to get the ball rolling once the funds are there.

We are very excited about the perks we are offering anyone who contributes. Please check them out!

The Impact

Your contribution, however big or small is HUGE to us! All the funds will help aid in a new revolution of clothing for the aviation sector. We want so badly to bring a reputable clothing brand to aviation, and without your help we don't know if we could. We are all about our following and appreciate anything you bring to the table.

We understand if you are unable to contribute monetarily, but we would love for you to share this new company with your friends and family on Twitter, Facebook, and any other social media platform if possible.

Thank you so much!

Fly Safe everyone.

story:
In deutsch lesen

Who are we?

 We are two creative young entrepreneurs from Germany. One a studied mediamanager, the other a studied geograph. Together a team that completes perfect.

 What do we do?

 We are trying to transfer our ideas into the reality and constantly go a step further.

 

  What do we want?

 Wir möchten mit unseren Produkten aktiv die Zukunft mitgestalten. Neues schaffen und Altbewährtes verbessern.

 

 

Why Indiegogo?


PLASTIC SUCKS! And we are the alternative!


We are fed up to the back teeth and don’t want to see anymore plastic totes. So here is the ecologic, ergonomic and reasonably priced alternative:


Our team of scientists, living in underground labs, fulfilled the impossible after uncountable tries. They managed to cross-breed a standard cotton pouch with an ordinary bag. The result is the best of two worlds, the B.E.U.T.E.L. (short for bearable, ergonomic, unisex, turbulent, extraordinary, lifestyle)

This hybrid (made of 100% cotton) is winning anyone over by its innovative form and the B.E.U.T.E.L. lace makes it possible to bear heavy loads in an easy manner, without any constrictions.
Another feature of quality is the enormous fabric-thickness. It guarantees a long lasting durability.
But it’s the printing which makes this formidable transportation device to an object of the pride of human handcrafting creation.
On this account we gave our visions to the talented hands of our young and aspiring designer Lisa Pham. Her skills and her appreciation of art, transformed our ideas into pieces of art.

 

Why do we need your help?

To see if our ideas work, we’ve produced a small amount of B.E.U.T.E.L. This gave us the possibility to check the quality, test its features and gave Fashion Experts the opportunity to validate our product. (Link just in german)

We and everyone else we’ve presented the B.E.U.T.E.L. were excited and convinced of our idea and the final result. So we decided to produce a larger amount to give everyone the chance to get a high quality B.E.U.T.E.L. for little money.

 

How do the contributors help?

You are helping to:
- Prevent the increasing plastic trash
- Make the world a better place
- Let you look as best as possible ;-)

These goals can only be achieved by financial help to produce a larger amount of our eco-friendly cotton bags. So they can be selled to a larger audience to a lower price.

 

What happens, if we don’t get the money we need?

If we don’t reach our aimed goal, Flip and Phil will live of water and bread in the future, but you will nevertheless send you your promised Perks.

 

Is it possible to help you without money?

Of course, you can help us by promoting our campaign. Tell your friends and family. Because only together we can change something!

Pictures: 

B.E.U.T.E.L. Plastic Sucks:

B.E.U.T.E.L. Dont Shoot The Chickens:

B.E.U.T.E.L. Just Fucking Buy It:

B.E.U.T.E.L. ME:

B.E.U.T.E.L. World:

 

B.E.U.T.E.L. Gefärbt:

 

B.E.U.T.E.L. Ausgemalt:

 

Unser Webshop: www.phwerk.com

 

AUF DEUTSCH:

 

 Wer sind wir?

 Wir sind zwei kreative Jungunternehmer. Ein studierter Medienmanager, und ein studierter Geograph. Beide zusammen ein Team, das sich ideal komplettiert.

Was machen wir?

 Wir versuchen unsere Ideen in die Realität zu übertragen und immer wieder Grenzen einzureißen um einen Schritt weiter zu gehen.

 

Was wollen wir erreichen?

 Wir möchten mit unseren Produkten aktiv die Zukunft mitgestalten. Neues schaffen und Altbewährtes verbessern.

 

Warum Indiegogo?

PLASTIC SUCKS! Wir haben die Alternative!
Wir haben genug von Plastetaschen und wollen eine ökologische, ergonomische, schicke und finanzierbare Alternative bieten.

 

Zu diesem Zweck:

ist es unseren, in unterirdischen Forschungsanlagen lebenden, Wissenschaftlern Nach vielen Versuchen gelungen, einen Standard Baumwollbeutel mit einer Tasche zu kreuzen. Das Ergebnis ist das Beste aus zwei Welten, der B.E.U.T.E.L. (Belastbar, Ergonomisch, Unisex, Turbulent, Extraordinär, Lifestyle).

Zum einen besticht der (zu 100% aus reiner Naturbaumwolle bestehende) Hybrid durch seine innovative Form und zum anderen ermöglicht der B.E.U.T.E.L. durch den breiten Trageriemen einen hohen Tragekomfort, der sogar den Transport von schweren Dingen in den Bereich des Machbaren rückt, ohne dass es zu Einschnürungen und Striemen kommt.

Ein weiteres Qualitätsmerkmal ist die enorme Stoffdicke des B.E.U.T.E.L.´s, die ihm eine lange Lebenszeit garantiert.

Doch erst der Aufdruck macht dieses formidable Stück Transportbehältnis zu einem Objekt höchster menschlicher Schöpfungskunst.

Zu diesem Zweck, ließen wir unsere Visionen von der talentierten und aufstrebenden jungen Designerin Lisa Pham umsetzen. Durch ihre Fertigkeiten und ihr Kunstverständnis wurden aus Ideen - Kunstwerke.

 

Warum brauchen wir Hilfe?

Um die Idee in die Tat umzusetzen, haben wir bereits eine Mini-Auflage hergestellt um die Qualität zu bewerten, die Eigenschaften zu testen und sie Mode Experten bewerten zu lassen. (Link)
Wir und allen denen wir unseren BEUTEL vorgestellt haben, waren begeistert und überzeugt. Deshalb möchten wir ihn in größeren Mengen herstellen um allen die Chance zu bieten, ebenfalls einen B.E.U.T.E.L. für weniger Geld erwerben zu können.

 

Wobei helfen die Spender?

Du hilfst dabei:
- Das Plastemüll sich nicht weiter vermehrt
- Die Welt ein bisschen schöner zu machen
- Euch unheimlich gut aussehen zu lassen ;-)

Diese Ziele können wir nur durch finanzielle Mittel erreichen, mit denen wir eine größere Menge B.E.U.T.E.L. herstellen und sie einem größeren Publikum für einen geringeren Preis anbieten können.


Was passiert, wenn weniger Geld zusammenkommt?

Falls wir unseren Zielbetrag nicht erreichen, werden sich Flip und Phil in Zukunft nur noch von Wasser und Brot ernähren und ihr erhaltet eure versprochenen Perks trotzdem.


Kann ich auch ohne Geld helfen?

Natürlich kannst du uns auch behilflich sein, indem du dabei hilfst, unsere Kampagne bekannter zu machen. Erzähle deinen Freunden und Bekannten von der Kampagne und unserer Idee. Denn nur zusammen können wir etwas ändern.

Bilder:

B.E.U.T.E.L. Plastic Sucks:

B.E.U.T.E.L. Dont Shoot The Chickens:

B.E.U.T.E.L. Just Fucking Buy It:

B.E.U.T.E.L. ME:

B.E.U.T.E.L. World:

 

B.E.U.T.E.L. Gefärbt:

 

B.E.U.T.E.L. Ausgemalt:

 

Unser Webshop: www.phwerk.com

story:
Short Summary

Hi, my name is Suzanne McAllister and I have been growing as a small independent label since 2011. I have been building up my business while studying my second fashion degree as a mature student. I am completely committed to running a more ethical label and I try to minimize any negative effects I might have on the environment while at the same time, supporting other local businesses and suppliers. 

I started this label from nothing, I sold anything and everything I could on eBay to raise enough money to upgrade my old sewing machines to industrial versions and have re invested every penny I have made so far back into buying supplies.

I'm at a point now where I want to do more. I want to print on to my own fabrics, launch a range of menswear and bespoke suits and finish off all my stretch fabrics more professionally. For this to happen I need to invest in a cover stitch machine, upgrade my pattern cutting table to a larger, more workable space and buy the tools I need to print onto fabrics and for this, I could do with some help. 

What We Need & What You Get

To begin to acquire the things above I need a minimum of £1000. It doesn't sound like a lot but for a small business it can be. 

To break it down of that £1000, £400 would go towards a cover stitch machine, £100 to custom build myself a larger cutting table and £500 to invest in printing materials and fabrics which are environmentally sound and organic if possible. If I raise more then I can buy better equipment and may even be able to look at buying more organic and recycled fabrics in bulk as at the moment I don't have the buying power for that and can only buy small amounts. This has the advantage that I can do small, more unique runs of designs, but the down side that if I do find some awesome fabric, I can't buy more then a few metres and then that design is gone forever. 

If I don't reach my entire goal I will put what I can towards printing materials firstly as I really want to show you some of my new ideas for prints which will work into new designs, and maybe then look at a new cutting table and lastly a cover stitch machine.

In return I hope you will find a diverse range of perks. If there is something you would like but isn't listed, just contact me and I will see if I can add it to the list. 

The Impact

I have been doing so well, with great feedback and support from wonderful customers but I need to take a further step towards building this label. I would like to expand one day so I can employ people like myself, with a passion for fashion and protecting the planet. I never have and never will use sweatshop labour and I support locally as much as I can. If you help me to grow, that has a knock on effect meaning more money goes into locally sourcing labour and supplies.

I want people to realise that more sustainable and eco friendly fashion is out there and can be seriously stylish and better made then fast fashion, meaning you don't have to waste money buying cheap, expolitation rife clothing from bargain stores only to throw it away later. Instead you could buy an amazing piece from an independent designer and have it last you forever.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't afford to contribute don't worry! Thank you so much for taking the time to read all of this. If you get a chance, just share this on your facebook or blog. Spreading the word is just as valuable as a contribution and is very much appreciated. If you can spare a few quid to help a label like mine grow then great, and I hope you won't be disappointed with the results.

story:
I'm a new home accessories designer (former charity entrepreneur) and I love using crowdfunding to help me get my line of footed table top and home decor off the ground. Crowdfunding allows me to introduce new ideas to the market, solicit valuable feedback and make new friends! 

I'm running this campaign for an idea that personally means the world to me because not only am I ceramist, I am also a cat rescuer (I've fostered dozens of kittens and helped find them new homes) and all around animal advocate. So after hearing from lots of bowl owners that they were using their two-legged human bowls for their furry friends I decided to design something special for our animal pals. It just made sense. 


Five charming bowls on dog or cat paws with all the same attributes as their two-legged human companion bowls. The bowls are stoneware, dishwasher and even microwave safe (sometimes kitties with colds like their stew warmed up ever so slightly). Why should our furry friends have boring bowls?! Show them you love them with chic new food and water bowls that are not only better for them but help all animals in need.  

$1 of each dog bowl pre-sold through the Indiegogo campaign will go to Hope For Paws -- a remarkable dog rescue doing critical work in South Central Los Angeles (where I have family) and $1 of each cat bowl pre-sold through the Indiegogo campaign will go to Stray Cat Alliance whose work rescuing homeless cats and advocating for a No Kill Los Angeles is vital to raising awareness and making a difference to the lives of cats on the streets.

We have Lennox modeling the 7" dog bowl. What?! A kitten eating out of a dog bowl!? We don't believe in teaching boundaries to our companion animals!

Our pooch, Kiwi, is modeling the 4" cat bowl. Yes, our dog, Kiwi, is a tiny Chihuahua and yes, she only has 3 legs! She's a 3-legged dog with a 4-legged bowl and that's totally okay because she can still run in excited circles when we get home. :-)


Two 7" dog bowls...Kiwi photobombed this shot. She was supposed to be on the sidelines watching our models! 

Milo with 6" cat bowl....very very tasty! 

Mako with the 9" dog bowl....a perfect model! 

Agnes and Merle (new dog models)! 


And lastly...no companion animal? Not a problem, these bowls are designed to help us all more thoroughly enjoy the dog days of summer! 

Specs:

Tiny Cat Bowl 4" diameter x 2.75" high, weighs 7oz and holds 1/4 cup liquid

Small Cat Bowl 5" diameter x 3.75" high, weighs 13oz and holds 1 cup liquid

Medium Cat Bowl 6" diameter x 4" high, weighs 1lb 3oz and holds 2 cups liquid

Medium Dog Bowl 7" diameter x 4" high (Best for dogs no more than 40/50 pounds), weighs 1lb 6oz and holds 2.5 cups

Large  Dog Bowl 9" diameter x 5" high (Best for dogs above 50 pounds), weighs 2lb 11oz and holds 6 cups liquid

All measurements of liquid are to the rim of the bowl

We've included a shot with fruit in the bowls to show scale.  


Please email me if you'd like a combination not offered in the rewards pre-grouped. For example? Two little 4" bowls for petite cats? Two 6" cat bowls? Email me at dylan@dylankendall.com and I'll work it out for you!

story:
THE REVELOT STORY

 

We are an independent watch design company with passion in making premium quality watches at an uncontested price. Our inspiration comes from retro vintage art forms and designs, hence this bring us to design our next watch. It is called the Avantgarde R7 and we are excited to bring you along on the journey of making it a reality.

 

It was late 2017 when we stumbled upon an abandoned aircraft hangar in Japan during our business visit to a watch making factory.  The combination of elements of the dystopian aircraft hangar and the fine craftmanship of Japanese watchmaking led us to design the R7 Avantgarde. We work tirelessly for the past 6 months to design and build the prototype. Finally we are proud to present you with our finest creation.

 

For decades, its either you have to spend a lot of money to purchase that luxury, high quality timepiece or forced to buy cheap replicas or low quality watches. Today, Revelot is here to solve that problem. We travelled across the globe in search of industry experts and manufacturers to bring you the highest quality products at the best prices.

By going straight to manufacturers, we are able to bypass the middleman and bring down the price of the watches.

 

 

MEET OUR COLLECTION

 

 

 

STRAPS

All our straps are handcrafted by artisans in an authentic leather workshop. Equipped with quick-release pins, the straps are easily interchangeable.  Choose between 3 variations of straps each with 3 colors; the standard leather straps, the Saffiano leather straps and the Nylon Nato straps.

 

SPECIFICATIONS

PACKAGING

 

TIMELINE

THE TEAM

SHIPPING & TAX

Kindly take note that duty tax might occur as it is based on individual country's duty tax law. Duty tax might differ from different countries. Do take note that there are certain countries that are duty tax free. We are not responsible for the duty tax fee hence kindly check with local's authority regarding of import tax before you back for us to avoid future disruptions.

story:
The 22 DEGREES Ocean Jacket

Divemaster and designer, Rick Miskiv started 22 DEGREES while working in Palau and developed a hooded neoprene ocean jacket. Launched in January 2014, 22 DEGREES has made multiple iterations of its popular jacket improving on the design each time. This campaign offers an opportunity for individuals to pre-order the latest and best version of the jacket at a significant discount and help support the introduction of a more environmentally responsible production process.  Read about the origins of 22 DEGREES and Rick's story about life as a dive master in Palau here. 

"I wear it because it's the best jacket I've ever worn for boat work. It's wind proof, water proof, comfortable, well fitted, and  flexible. I get so many comments about it every time I wear it." ~ Riley Elliot, shark researcher  and marine scientist a.k.a the Shark Man featured on Nat Geo Wild SharkFest

Visit us online at www.22degrees.co Instagram @22degrees.co Facebook: @22degrees.co  Twitter: @22degrees_co Vimeo: @22degrees

About 22 DEGREES - The Early Days in Palau

Working on high speed dive boats everyday, you and your gear are exposed to harsh sun, salt water, strong winds and pelting down pouring rain. In 2010, while heading to Palau to start an adventure as a dive guide and instructor, 22 DEGREES founder Rick Miskiv purchased an expensive leading brand rain jacket to use on the boats. Within two weeks this jacket started to fall apart, leak, cling to the skin, and provided very little warmth. It became clear that neoprene was a more suitable material for a jacket that was going to survive the elements and hard rains of Palau. Combining experience in the fashion and diving industries, the 22 Degrees Ocean Jacket was designed with these conditions in mind, meeting the needs of both  professional dive guides and underwater photographers.

Reduced Carbon Footprint with Recycled Materials

22 DEGREES is excited to announce our new prototype jacket that utilizes more environmentally responsible production processes. In Palau, Rick would walk by a pile of used tires in the landfill on his way home everyday, it made an impression about how we impact nature. The jacket will be produced by an industry leader in wetsuit manufacturing with BlueSign certified factory processes, reducing CO2 footprint, and using water based glues, recycled neoprene and old tires. This is a modest step forward, but hopefully each small step towards making more responsible products has a positive ripple effect. 22 DEGREES is also a member company of 1% for the Planet, and donates 1% of its annual profits to conservation efforts. In addition, all of our products ship in recycled packing goods by EcoEnclose. 

Ambassadors and Testimonials

22 DEGREES is proud to have an amazing and talented crew of brand ambassadors who have been selected for their positive contributions to protection and awareness of the ocean.  The crew includes professional underwater photographers, videographers, marine research scientists, marine conservationists and more.   For a complete list of names and bios, please visit our website: 22 DEGREES Ambassadors

Other people that own and use our jackets include illustrious names and some of our heroes including:  Brian Skerry, and David Doubilet

"I never leave the dock without it! There's no substitute." ~ Jesse Alpert, Divemaster and Underwater Photographer, Palau

"Love having my 22 Degrees jacket in the field. Quality material, thoughtful design. Keeps me warm and dry and makes me look a lot cooler than I actually am." ~ Dr. Erika Woolsey Langbein, CEO of The Hydrous

"After seeing these jackets in use by the crew when diving in Palau I decided to buy a couple for me and my wife for our planned trip to Tonga. We just got back and I have to say the jackets were just what we needed. They could be worn over our clothes or directly over our wetsuits when just coming out of the water and we needed to stay warm. They are also light weight and take up little space in luggage. I highly recommend these jackets!" ~ Andy Deitsch , Underwater Photographer

"Every diver should have a 22 Degrees jacket as part of their mandatory dive gear..I have watched Rick and his company grow from the beginning and it's been a privilege to see the product in all its glory today . This jacket is perfect for before and after diving when the weather can change suddenly, rain can come from literally nowhere and you have a long boat ride back home, these jackets keep you warm and dry. A must for all you divers out there!" - Richard Barnden, Co-Founder at Unique Dive Expeditions / Underwater Photographers, Palau

"Love my 22 Degrees jacket! Together with my camera setup, it's one of those thing i always secure first especially when im out on explo mode. It's not only fashionable but keeps me warm and game for every dive." ~ Ram Yoro, Underwater Photographer, Philippines

"We usually use this jacket in very harsh/cold conditions. Fall and winter months in Baja (La Paz, Los Cabos & Magbay) get quite chilly and we usually spend 6-8 hours in the open ocean looking for pelagic life. During our time out in the pangas we get constantly splashed by cold water and then drilled down by northern winds. After trying all sorts of jackets ("waterproof" jackets, ski jackets, marine jackets), we finally came across the ideal product for our Pelagic Safaris. These jackets keep you warm, practically dry and are made for hard use in the ocean. Today we can't imagine going out looking for marlins, whales, sharks or any kind of life in the open ocean without a 22 Degrees jacket. Truly a must have product if you are in the ocean for long periods, with cold and you want this jacket to last." - Jero Prieto, Filmmaker & Expedition Leader, Pelagic Life

Ocean Jacket Details and Specs

  • 2.5 mm Smooth Skin Eco Neoprene
  • YKK Aquaguard water resistant zipper
  • Blind stitched seams for maximum water seal
  • Two large pouch pockets on the inside
  • Drawstrings on hood and waistline hem
  • Fast drying / Easy care
  • Check the chart for best sizing.

story:
197s

Hi!
My name is Bror T.
I'm an artist. I love to create, design and invent
My latest are these sunglasses handmade from steel glass and leather.
They are like made to last forever...

They're made in just 197 samples, and each one is numbered from 001 - 197

It's a kind of industrial retro design, and I just love the style.

So, be one of only 197 people world wide to own these cool sunglasses!


Very Cool! 

This is my daughter Julie with a male size of the sunglasses, but ofcourse they are in female size too

The 197s project:

The 197s is a limited edition art/design project.

This means we will make unique products with unique designs,
limited to only 197 samples of each.
And each piece is numbered.
We handmade only these 197 samples in each project, and that's it!
The only 197 samples of this planet!

And when I say WE, that's me and my daughter Julie, who is a photographer and artist.
We have this webside together: www.blacknsugarwhite.com

So if you want some very special and limited piece of Art & Design,
follow us in the future!
We will soon have another 197s project, presented here on Indiegogo!
The next project is a handmade Chess set. Made by hand in every detail.
Steel, rust, wood, leather and concrete, this time! Quite cool!

Since everything is handmade, it takes time and patience.

We have a small workshop, and need a lot of tools to be crative on this level.
The more and better tools, the more uportunities. Some of it we make ourselves.
Spescial tools made for just one limited edition design.

"Quality never goes out of style,..."

Yes, somebody said that, and we can't agree more!

Due to the fact that  Norway is the most expensive country in the world to produce anything in, we have to focus on quality and design!

We love to create and invent, and with your help we hopefully will bring alot of good 197s
campaigns to you in the future!

story:
Purchase The Gun Box Echo






The Gun Box Echo is easily portable and the 18 month rechargeable battery life makes Echo the perfect way to transport your gun safely while maintaining quick access. It’s the ideal home, office, car, travel, and concealed carry safe! 




My name is Ryan Hyde.  As an inventor and product creator, I love cool products that make a difference in the world.  Two years ago I launched The Gun Box on Indiegogo.  The Gun Box solved a problem gun owners, like myself, face each day. “Where can I safely keep my gun so I have access when I need it?”  Because I may choose to keep a gun anywhere, and because traditional gun storage solutions were never intended to be part of home décor, no solution existed that worked for me. The Gun Box 1.0 began the evolution of gun storage and was designed to be left out in plain sight.  It has the tech to open quickly while keeping your family safe.  Our solution made a gun-owners responsibility to “protect and defend anytime, anywhere” a reality.

Since the launch of 1.0 we have had hundreds of customers ask for a more streamlined portable version. I am very proud to launch The Gun Box Echo! Echo means a close parallel, or repetition of an idea, feeling, style, or event.  If you love the original Gun box you will love this product.  Lots of new tech has been added to push the evolution of gun storage even further!

The Gun Box Echo is uniquely designed to be part of your home décor. Using the latest in technology including Bluetooth, Biometric, & RFid you have multiple ways to access the box quickly. Echo can be mounted in any orientation, secured with the tether cable and has an audible alarm attached to a accelerometer that will sound if the box starts moving. The free smart app allows you to adjust the settings on the box and give access to the box if you’re not there. With interior measurements of 7.25 x 8.5 the Gun Box Echo is big enough to store most duty sized firearms. This is a smart gun storage solution.

We need your help to get this product off the ground, we need your feedback,  and get the word out. Please share this campaign with anyone.  


The Echo is powder coated with high performance resin which provides a brilliant, durable, and scratch-free finish.

  • Will my gun fit? YES most duty size hand guns will!The interior measurements are 7.25" x 8.5". 
  • How strong is The Gun Box Echo? We designed the box to keep Guns out of the hands of unintended users, especially children, while providing quick access in an aesthetically pleasing design. The Gun Box Echo accomplishes this purpose. If you take a hammer or saw to it for an extended period of time, like any safe, you can get into it. The Gun Box Echo is is tough enough to do what it was designed for!
  • Does it have a mechanical/non electronic key? No
  • How do i access the box if the electronics fail? If all the electronics fail we we have a procedure for opening the box.
  • Does the Echo meet TSA standards? Yes 

www.thegunbox.com

story:
At some point, you have probably owned a smart wristband to track activity and exercise. But there is something special about owning a watch, not just to tell the time, but as an expression of style too.

 

That’s why we made BozGo. It’s more than just a watch with sports tracking functions, BozGo has other important features like 24-hour seamless heart-rate tracking and sleep monitoring. It helps you keep track of your active and healthy life. It’s incredibly useful but stylish too. And best of all, we managed to include all the best qualities of an activity tracker and a fashion watch while keeping the price affordable for anyone.

 

  • Heart Rate Monitor and Activity Tracker

To make exercise tracking easy, it shouldn’t be a hassle. BozGo keeps track of heart rate, calories burned, and distance traveled via it’s photoelectric and the acceleration sensor. Walking and running activities are automatically recognized.

  • Sleep monitoring

The latest scientific studies show that proper rest is essential for good health. BozGo can help! It features automatic Sleep Cycle analysis to help you better understand your sleep patterns and get a good night’s rest. BozGo can tell by your activity that you have gone to bed and monitors your pulse rate, measures your sleep quality and determines periods of light sleep and deep sleep. When it’s time to wake up, a gentle, silent, vibrating alarm wakes you at the optimal time.

 

 
  • Ultimate coach

But fitness tracking isn’t just boring data. Using the free APP Racefit Pro, you can set fitness targets with Bozgo, monitor your progress and mark your completions. It’s a fun way to get serious about health while setting and achieving your activity goals. The highly-rated app also rewards achievements, offers advice and lets you challenge friends to help keep you motivated and push you further.

Unlike typical sports watches, BozGo has a totally unique 3D interface. It is not necessary to study complicated graphs or reports to understand activity performance, the watch face uses 3D animations to easily see at a glance one’s daily activities, sleep information, and more. It even has friendly inactivity reminders to help users be fitness-minded.

  • Premium Materials

Any watch built for serious activity requires quality components. BozGo uses the best. It’s constructed with durability in mind using a stainless steel body, silicone sports strap, & a variety of stylish color options. The strap is easy to change and is available in cool, modern color choices so that you can coordinate BozGo with your outfits and other accessories to perfectly complement your own personal style. Wear it loud, wear it proud, with Bozgo.

  • Less Charging

Daily charging is inconvenient and easy to forget. BozGo’s onboard battery can provide up to a 5-day battery life on a single charge so you can spend more time on the go and less time connected to the charger.

 

BozGo does more than other sports trackers too. It has a suite of new smart functions that set it apart from competitors, including phone notifications and motion controls that can turn on the smartwatch or control a phone camera remotely with just a flip of the wrist.

 

Gallery

story:
We have re-designed the boxer brief, taking apart its construction, creating an anti ride-up fit and sourcing the world's softest fabric to make the ultimate boxer.

Since Jockey created the first Y-front in 1934, mens pants have predominantly been made from cotton. Big brands have been churning out the same underwear, made from the same fabric, in the same shape for as long as we can remember. 

We at ZLDN Underwear believe it's time men had more of a choice. Through our innovative fit, premium fabric and original prints we're excited to bring you an entirely new range of ultra-comfortable underwear. We believe in fair pricing so you can own your very own pair without being ripped off by so-called 'luxury brands'.

NB: We will contact you for your print and size choice after you make your pre-order. This standard practice for Indigogo.

We travelled the world to source a better fabric and found an Austrian technology fabric called Lenzing MicroModal®, made from sustainably sourced Beech trees. It is three-times softer than cotton and comfortable beyond belief. It's also moisture wicking and breathable. 

We know pants. We've spent more than two years tweaking the cut and fit and have been led by the views of our customers. They spoke and we listened - taking into account more than 300 guys' opinions views on what makes the perfect pair of boxers. We took apart the boxer brief and re-designed the cut, adding in 3 more panels than the average pair to put an end to riding up! After slipping these bad boys on you'll never look back.

For this collection, we remained true to our passion for creating "trademark bold prints" - (GQ.com). 

Working with London-based artist Ross Aitken using inspiration from dutch-wax textiles and 90s pop culture, we spent months creating these four original and distinctive patterns; Rewind, Radio Wave, Bird and Outbound.

We also created an option in white and black.

NB: We will contact you for your print and size choice after you make your pre-order. This standard practice for Indigogo.

We couldn't just stop with mens' boxers so have also created a ultra-comfy womens' version. Also made from MicroModal®, featuring our brushed elastic and elastic piping to stop the slip, these are the only womens' briefs you'll ever want to wear.

As an Indiegogo special, we have created a fitted t-shirt made from our MicroModal® fabric. This one-off is exclusively available for both men and women as part of the Kickstarter.

ZLDN was created by Jack Hicks who grew up in South Africa and was inspired by the prints found in Ethekwini market. What started as a passion project has grown into a business. Since launching 2 years ago we've sold 1000s of pairs of 'Dutch wax' boxer shorts to dozens of countries around the world.

We like doing good things. Since launching our brand two years ago we have raised hundreds of pounds for South African charities. Although Kickstarter's rules don't allow charity pledging (cheers guys), all sales outside the campaign will help us to carry on giving away money to places and people that inspire us. 

We're offering FREE shipping to ALL backers in the UK. If you're from anywhere else in the world you'll get a free pair of underwear when buying more than three pairs. Shipping charges suck! 

Contact us with any questions you might have...

story:
GET BRUNO BASIC $139   |   GET BRUNO SMART $199   |   GET BRUNO MAX $199








































1. How does bruno work?

bruno is activated by a series of light and motion sensors and delivers dirt and debris directly into the trash bag through a network of integrated vacuum tubes.

2. Where does the dirt go?

Using its built-in filtration system, bruno suctions up the dirt from the floor directly into the trash bag. The purpose of the filter is to prevent dirt entering the motor, and it is easy to remove and clean with a simple rinse under the faucet.

There is no need to empty anything except the trash on trash day!

3. Does bruno have to be plugged-in to operate?

No. bruno and brunoSMART have a rechargeable 18-V battery that will supply approximately 30 days of suction before needing to be recharged. The retractable re-charging cord is accessed from the top of the appliance, in a secondary compartment.

4. Is the battery replaceable?

Yes and it is easily accessible from the bottom of the appliance.

5. Does bruno come with a cord for recharging?

The retractable charging cord can be accessed under the secondary door located on the topside secondary compartment of bruno.

6. Is there an app? Is it free? What controls and features are available through the app?

The bruno App is free. Through the app, you can set alerts and reminders - from trash day notifications to low bag refill counts. You can even reorder trash bags through the app at the touch of a button AND for the same cost as the grocery store! $19.95 - and this includes the cost of shipping!

7. What colors are available for the bruno?

bruno and brunoSMART are available in Arctic White, Slate Grey, Harbor Blue, Urban Red and Stainless.

brunoMAX is available Grey.

8. How big is bruno?

Weighing in at 17lbs, bruno and brunoSMART measure at 12.25” x 12.25” x 29.5”

brunoMAX is 23 lbs. 19.5” x 24” x 32".

9. What specific size trash bags fit into bruno?

bruno is optimized for use with 13-gallon tall bags (the standard size).

10. What materials is bruno made out of?

bruno and brunoSMART are constructed with ABS bodies and a motion-sensing lid (brunoSMART's lid is stainless steel).

brunoMAX is made out of heavy-duty seamless polyresin.

11. Is bruno water-resistant?

Yes!

12. Does bruno have any certifications?

Yes, bruno is both UL-certified and CE-certified for safety and operational quality.

13. Is the vacuum feature child-proof or child-safe?

Yes, bruno is child and pet-proof and cannot be accidentally activated.

14. What's the difference between bruno, brunoSMART and brunoMax?

All three come with the vacuum integration feature. brunoSMART is app-supported and connects to your mobile via Wi-Fi. The App features reminders, alerts and bag reorder capabilities. brunoMAX is geared for more industrial and commercial use.

15. Does bruno have a warranty?

Yes, bruno comes with a standard one year warranty for normal wear and tear. Parts and labor included. Extended warranties will also be available for purchase throughout the campaign - we build the bruno to last!

16. Who is the shipping provider for bruno?

We will be using several providers:

- USPS for USA and Canada

- UPS and DHL for international  

17. When will I get my bruno?

bruno and brunoSMART will arrive November 2015. brunoMAX is scheduled for July 2016.

18. How much is international shipping?

International shipping varies by country and is mentioned in each perk description. You must manually add this on to your perk at check-out, otherwise we will post a reminder before the end of the campaign.
