story:
Introduction 

  • We are a team of three creative people from different backgrounds who came together for one project. After meeting each other in our Los Angeles apartment complex, we decided that our creative brains and individual skill sets needed to be combined to get behind one very large project - one hopefully large enough to change the world.
  • The Baby Changer is a revolutionary way to change your baby. Our vision is to change public health standards to provide cleanliness and safety for every child being changed on public tables. The current health standards for public changing stations and the majority of the changing tables being used bothered us so deeply that we ventured out to create the a new and progressively protective way to safely change your child in public.  This idea that we could have a substantial impact on future generations and provide a safe and sanitary way to have parents change their children, fueled us to create The Baby Changer.  
  • In our road to creating this, we are going to need the support of Mothers, Fathers, Grandmothers, Grandfathers, and other concerned citizens of the world to help us obtain funding necessarily to build this product out and make it available to public bathroom facilities. This is a huge undertaking, instating a new health standard for bathrooms and a safe and sanitary way to change children in public. And that's why we need you!

What Makes US Different

  • We have found a way to make changing your baby in public a safe and sanitary process. We have accomplished this by implementing a very special material that we will be using for the bed surface of The Baby Changer, our germ/bacteria efficiency rate will be 99.9% effective. This is superseding the 30%-65% rate that you are getting with the current public changers. 
  • Current public changing stations use Microban technology, the current leader in fighting off "odor causing bacterias" - ODOR! We believe that other bacteria are just as harmful, or worse, and the evidence supports the fact that touch surface bacterias are way worse! The Baby Changer product has a way to stave off ALL bacterias. 
  • The bacterias found on current baby changing stations include but are not limited to: Salmonella, Shigella, E. coli, the MRSA virus, Staphylococcus (staff infection), and Enterobacter (a fecal virus that causes a nasty stomach bug like the noral virus). With these bacterias showing up at a rate of 80% in the current units and other alarming statistics like 9 out of 10 current tables will test positive for crack/cocaine residue. This made us realize we need to act quickly, and provide something safe. 
  • With 6 different kinds of bacterias prevalent on these current baby changers we plan to kill them all by using our 99.9% effective germ killing material. Our special material kills the following bacterias: Escherichia coli (E. coli), Methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus, Staphylococcus aureus (staff infection), Enterobacter aerogenes, Pseudomonas aeruginosa, Vancomycin-resistant Enterococcus. All of which would prevent any bacterias to survive on our surface eliminating the chance of disease spreading.
  • How are we creating a surface that is 99.9% germ efficient? We are using an EPA regulated, clinically tested and proven safe material which is called Antimicrobial Copper Alloys. This material is tested regularly to provide safety in many different facets of its use. But for our use, there is nothing better! Without any other form of sanitation we can create this are environment for all to use! This is our secret weapon and we hope to expose it for the safe and sustainable material it is. 
  • SPECS:  Antimicrobial Copper Alloys continuously reduce bacterial contamination, achieving 99.9% reduction within two hours of exposure. Antimicrobial Copper Alloy surfaces kill greater than 99.9% of Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria within two hours of exposure. Antimicrobial Copper Alloy surfaces deliver continuous and ongoing antibacterial action, remaining effective in killing greater than 99% of bacteria within two hours. Antimicrobial Copper Alloys surfaces kill greater than 99.9% of bacteria within two hours, and continue to kill 99% of bacteria even after repeated contamination. Antimicrobial Copper Alloys surfaces help inhibit the buildup and growth of bacteria within two hours of exposure between routine cleaning and sanitizing steps. It is also 100% recyclable, making it completely sustainable in its properties.
  • Testing demonstrates effective antibacterial activity against Staphylococcus aureus, Enterobacter aerogenes, Methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA), Escherichia coli O157:H7, and Pseudomonas aeruginosa


Unit Specifications: 

  • Bed touch surface: Antimicrobial Copper Alloy (100% recyclable)
  • Unit Dimensions:
  • Bed Dimensions: 850mm x 515mm x 54mm
  • Gloss white finish
  • Designed to minimize theft and vandalism
  • ADA Compliant - 4" mounting depth off wall
  • Stainless Steel hardware and brackets
  • LCD Interface for readings
  • Weight scale built in
  • Easy to read instructions
  • Etched ruler in changing surface for height
  • Temperature sensor
  • Small lullaby playing speaker (feature to come)
  • Multicolored lights for baby's attention (feature to come)
  • Pull out utility shelf (feature to come)
  • Flip out bag/jacket hanger (feature to come)

How Important You Are:

  • Funding is going to help us create this product to our fullest extent, we have many things to do to make The Baby Changer something you see in every public restroom and saving children from every public bacteria/germ possible. The initial funding will go towards legal necessities that will include patent/trademark/copyright filings costs and lawyer fees. We are going to need a few utility and design patents, which are not cheap, but we want to make sure that only product insuring child's safety is The Baby Changer and not one of the current companies claiming to. Also a working prototype of the product, a prototype that will feature all of the necessary and unique components to our changing table.  This will be a huge step for The Baby Changer because after working out any kinks that may come with prototyping, we can work towards manufacturing full scale units. These two processes will take up a lot of the goal funding money, especially due to part costs for the materials needed to prototype working units. 
  • For your generous support we will be giving out logo'd material and memorable items for each of our contributors. We want you to know that you are right there with us every step of the way, in completing this project and changing such a broken system into something life changing for many!
  • No matter what happens through this amazing experience we plan to use your support in a beneficial matter to offer this product to the world and provide a sustainable, sanitary and safe way to change children in a public setting. 

The Impact/Mission

  • Our mission is to provide the world with a sustainable, sanitary and safe way to change your baby in a public setting. By changing standards of health in every restroom to keep children safe and to give parents peace of mind every time that they change their baby. Our hope is to change the way you change your baby. 
  • Our team is built up of all different expertise each of which we have had our different work experience. Between the three of us we have worked for New Balance, Hasbro and medical companies. Created independent films and shorts. Freelanced as a graphic designer, advertiser and an industrial designer. Managed musicians and companies and have created things to make this world a better place. 
  • Please help us in creating the first public changing station that if you have kids or are planning to have kids, that you would actually feel safe changing your child on.

Risks & Challenges

  • We have some major challenges to tackle but all the challenges that we hope to tackle are with your help! The biggest ones are surrounding public perception of the current baby changing stations. There is a lot to know about the current system and so many flaws that haven't been changed for almost 30 years! This really is hard to believe and really hard to bare for parents, grandparents and concerned citizens alike. The biggest challenge through all this is to shed enough light on the current problem: which is dangerous touch surfaces for children, diseases that can be contracted and very serious sicknesses that could leave children in the hospital or worse.
  • Another challenge is the cost for our new product,  this is something that concerned us greatly originally. However we have found that even with all the features we are going to include with The Baby Changer, it will still come in below all of the current units that are being sold today. The cost for the current units is outrageous considering the lowest model costs around $185 USD and the best models costing almost $1300 USD. These prices are hard to believe when all you are getting is some scrap plastic and mane possible injury points for the children laying on them.  
  • Help us tackle these challenges head on by spreading awareness to family, friends, relatives and co-workers. Bring this epidemic to light and help us provide a drastic change to end it!

    Ways Anyone Can Help

    • Folks we know everyone can't contribute money at a whim. But you can help us in so many other ways! This whole campaign is successful by word of mouth and people coming together to help implement this crucial life saving product. Please tell anyone and everyone about the harmful current system and about the solution that we have to offer! The best thing we can do is make this a fighting cause for our future generations and for health. Email our Indiegogo campaign to anyone you know and show people The Baby Changer. Funding isn't the only way this will take off, but global awareness and fighting for a sustainable, sanitary and safe cause for our future generations.  If you need to contact us about further questions or to further our campaign, our email is open 24/7 at  thebabychanger@gmail.com. Thank you so much from our team to yours :)
story_txt:
Introduction  

We are a team of three creative people from different backgrounds who came together for one project. After meeting each other in our Los Angeles apartment complex, we decided that our creative brains and individual skill sets needed to be combined to get behind one very large project - one hopefully large enough to change the world.
 The Baby Changer is a revolutionary way to change your baby. Our vision is to change public health standards to provide cleanliness and safety for every child being changed on public tables. The current health standards for public changing stations and the majority of the changing tables being used bothered us so deeply that we ventured out to create the a new and progressively protective way to safely change your child in public.  This idea that we could have a substantial impact on future generations and provide a safe and sanitary way to have parents change their children, fueled us to create The Baby Changer.  

In our road to creating this, we are going to need the support of Mothers, Fathers, Grandmothers, Grandfathers, and other concerned citizens of the world to help us obtain funding necessarily to build this product out and make it available to public bathroom facilities. This is a huge undertaking, instating a new health standard for bathrooms and a safe and sanitary way to change children in public. And that's why we need you! 
What Makes US Different


We have found a way to make changing your baby in public a safe and sanitary process. We have accomplished this by implementing a very special material that we will be using for the bed surface of The Baby Changer, our germ/bacteria efficiency rate will be 99.9% effective. This is superseding the 30%-65% rate that you are getting with the current public changers. 
Current public changing stations use Microban technology, the current leader in fighting off "odor causing bacterias" - ODOR! We believe that other bacteria are just as harmful, or worse, and the evidence supports the fact that touch surface bacterias are way worse! The Baby Changer product has a way to stave off ALL bacterias. 

The bacterias found on current baby changing stations include but are not limited to: Salmonella, Shigella, E. coli, the MRSA virus, Staphylococcus (staff infection), and Enterobacter (a fecal virus that causes a nasty stomach bug like the noral virus). With these bacterias showing up at a rate of 80% in the current units and other alarming statistics like 9 out of 10 current tables will test positive for crack/cocaine residue. This made us realize we need to act quickly, and provide something safe. 

With 6 different kinds of bacterias prevalent on these current baby changers we plan to kill them all by using our 99.9% effective germ killing material. Our special material kills the following bacterias: Escherichia coli (E. coli), Methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus, Staphylococcus aureus (staff infection), Enterobacter aerogenes, Pseudomonas aeruginosa, Vancomycin-resistant Enterococcus. All of which would prevent any bacterias to survive on our surface eliminating the chance of disease spreading.
How are we creating a surface that is 99.9% germ efficient? We are using an EPA regulated, clinically tested and proven safe material which is called Antimicrobial Copper Alloys. This material is tested regularly to provide safety in many different facets of its use. But for our use, there is nothing better! Without any other form of sanitation we can create this are environment for all to use! This is our secret weapon and we hope to expose it for the safe and sustainable material it is. 

SPECS:  Antimicrobial Copper Alloys continuously reduce bacterial contamination, achieving 99.9% reduction within two hours of exposure. Antimicrobial Copper Alloy surfaces kill greater than 99.9% of Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria within two hours of exposure. Antimicrobial Copper Alloy surfaces deliver continuous and ongoing antibacterial action, remaining effective in killing greater than 99% of bacteria within two hours. Antimicrobial Copper Alloys surfaces kill greater than 99.9% of bacteria within two hours, and continue to kill 99% of bacteria even after repeated contamination. Antimicrobial Copper Alloys surfaces help inhibit the buildup and growth of bacteria within two hours of exposure between routine cleaning and sanitizing steps. It is also 100% recyclable, making it completely sustainable in its properties.


Testing demonstrates effective antibacterial activity against Staphylococcus aureus, Enterobacter aerogenes, Methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA), Escherichia coli O157:H7, and Pseudomonas aeruginosa


Unit Specifications: 

Bed touch surface: Antimicrobial Copper Alloy (100% recyclable)
Unit Dimensions:

Bed Dimensions: 850mm x 515mm x 54mm

Gloss white finish
Designed to minimize theft and vandalism
ADA Compliant - 4" mounting depth off wall
Stainless Steel hardware and brackets
LCD Interface for readings
Weight scale built in
Easy to read instructions
Etched ruler in changing surface for height
Temperature sensor
Small lullaby playing speaker (feature to come)
Multicolored lights for baby's attention (feature to come)
Pull out utility shelf (feature to come)

Flip out bag/jacket hanger (feature to come)


How Important You Are:
 
Funding is going to help us create this product to our fullest extent, we have many things to do to make The Baby Changer something you see in every public restroom and saving children from every public bacteria/germ possible. The initial funding will go towards legal necessities that will include patent/trademark/copyright filings costs and lawyer fees. We are going to need a few utility and design patents, which are not cheap, but we want to make sure that only product insuring child's safety is The Baby Changer and not one of the current companies claiming to. Also a working prototype of the product, a prototype that will feature all of the necessary and unique components to our changing table.  This will be a huge step for The Baby Changer because after working out any kinks that may come with prototyping, we can work towards manufacturing full scale units. These two processes will take up a lot of the goal funding money, especially due to part costs for the materials needed to prototype working units. 
For your generous support we will be giving out logo'd material and memorable items for each of our contributors. We want you to know that you are right there with us every step of the way, in completing this project and changing such a broken system into something life changing for many!
No matter what happens through this amazing experience we plan to use your support in a beneficial matter to offer this product to the world and provide a sustainable, sanitary and safe way to change children in a public setting.  
  The Impact/Mission 

Our mission is to provide the world with a sustainable, sanitary and safe way to change your baby in a public setting. By changing standards of health in every restroom to keep children safe and to give parents peace of mind every time that they change their baby. Our hope is to change the way you change your baby. 

Our team is built up of all different expertise each of which we have had our different work experience. Between the three of us we have worked for New Balance, Hasbro and medical companies. Created independent films and shorts. Freelanced as a graphic designer, advertiser and an industrial designer. Managed musicians and companies and have created things to make this world a better place. 
Please help us in creating the first public changing station that if you have kids or are planning to have kids, that you would actually feel safe changing your child on. 
  
Risks & Challenges








We have some major challenges to tackle but all the challenges that we hope to tackle are with your help! The biggest ones are surrounding public perception of the current baby changing stations. There is a lot to know about the current system and so many flaws that haven't been changed for almost 30 years! This really is hard to believe and really hard to bare for parents, grandparents and concerned citizens alike. The biggest challenge through all this is to shed enough light on the current problem: which is dangerous touch surfaces for children, diseases that can be contracted and very serious sicknesses that could leave children in the hospital or worse.

Another challenge is the cost for our new product,  this is something that concerned us greatly originally. However we have found that even with all the features we are going to include with The Baby Changer, it will still come in below all of the current units that are being sold today. The cost for the current units is outrageous considering the lowest model costs around $185 USD and the best models costing almost $1300 USD. These prices are hard to believe when all you are getting is some scrap plastic and mane possible injury points for the children laying on them.  
Help us tackle these challenges head on by spreading awareness to family, friends, relatives and co-workers. Bring this epidemic to light and help us provide a drastic change to end it!


 
Ways Anyone Can Help
 

Folks we know everyone can't contribute money at a whim. But you can help us in so many other ways! This whole campaign is successful by word of mouth and people coming together to help implement this crucial life saving product. Please tell anyone and everyone about the harmful current system and about the solution that we have to offer! The best thing we can do is make this a fighting cause for our future generations and for health. Email our Indiegogo campaign to anyone you know and show people The Baby Changer. Funding isn't the only way this will take off, but global awareness and fighting for a sustainable, sanitary and safe cause for our future generations.  If you need to contact us about further questions or to further our campaign, our email is open 24/7 at  thebabychanger@gmail.com. Thank you so much from our team to yours :)

story:
Hi, my name is Eric. I (officially) started this company back in February 2014. Then called Harvey Harper, this started as a concept to create socks that expressed my personality while at work. While on the search for socks that were both fun yet professional, all I could find were boring dark dress socks or the one's with the bright colors and patterns. So I set to work creating a sock that would turn heads, just not my bosses. 

As I researched other designs and companies, I noticed a theme with how clothing businesses operated. One, they mass producing products into 'small batches' at large profit margins. Secondly, they follow the buy one give one 'marketing' approach. 

Being a conscious consumer, I am constantly looking for ways to value my purchasing power, and try to mainly buy from companies that are local, follow fair trade practices and give back. While I appreciate the steps these social companies have taken so far, a majority of these buy one give one companies fall short with their donation side when making a lasting impact in my community. The item they donate goes to third world countries, which is a step in some direction, however, mostly these types of donations are a handout only program without actually impacting the system to create a lastly change in that community. 

Since a majority of these buy one give one companies don't influence the symptoms of the problem they are donating to, I decided to take a stride in a new direction by not only donating a pair with every purchase to someone in your community here in the US, I am only donating these socks to programs that make lasting change in people lives over a structured program that influences people's interpersonal communication, coping skills and teaches job training . 

Due to what I now know, I renamed this 'cause-company' as TWOSOME, Sock Co. I wanted this cause-company to do better. I wanted to create something that actually influenced the system that created the problem of homelessness, not just the symptoms of being homeless. It maybe a tough concept for people to understand that poverty is that much of a problem within our own boarders, however the number speak for themselves: 1 in 6 here in the United States lives in poverty, and 10.5 million people are unemployed.

Armed with these stats, our mission is to lower the number of homeless and poverty stricken in the US by reintegrating individuals through a two year program, teaching them job, coping and interpersonal skills. We're not just giving the homeless a pair of socks, instead we are a small part to someone's overall transformation from living on the street off handouts, to someone who is self-sufficent and providing for their family.

With every pair of TWOSOME socks purchased, one pair will be donated to someone who is transforming their life. 

Initial Goals

TWOSOME, Sock Co. produces business casual dress socks that are artist designed,  expertly manufactured and distributed to those in need. Our mission is to provide quality designer socks that influence the system of homelessness, not just the symptoms of being homeless. We have strategic partners in manufacturing, design, distribution and charity outreach that will lower the barrier to self-sufficiency through the purchase of the best socks you will ever own.

This is How We Are Changing Lives:

Fair Trade Practices

First, and foremost, we are starting with how the socks are manufactured. We are working with a manufacture company called Devmir, know in the trade as ‘Socks with a Purpose’. Our manufacture company is committed to producing high quality socks, using the finest materials and utilizing most innovative sewing techniques, all while keeping sustainability and fair trade practices on the forefront of their decision making.

Manufacturing 

Our commitment to you is to produce a high quality sock that you can wear numerous times without getting holes. Being that, we have chosen the finest cotton and the most innovative designs to help support you feet. The designs include breathable material to help keep your feet dry during the day, and to stay warn at night. And know that annoying seam on the toe? We have changed the way socks are stitched together to no longer create that seam on the toes. When it comes to the heel, the socks are stitched in a ‘Y’ pattern, better cupping and supporting your feet. Also, after months of testing, we have found the perfect blend of cotton and nylon to help these socks stay up during the day, preventing them from following down to your ankles.

Design

With leading class manufacturing and materials secured, we next focused our attention to the design. When shopping for dress socks, it’s the same dark pattern everywhere we looked, or it was the outrageous color that we couldn’t be proud to wear to work and have our boss see. So we have created designs that are fresh, original and show off your individual personality, yet stay in the acceptable range. We have partnered with designers from FIDM, The Fashion Institute of Design & Merchandising. FIDM is known for leading fashion trends and world-class designers. By working in conjunction with artists & designers during the design process, we have created an amazing products that you will love to wear and show off. You have be warned, these designs will cause extreme jealously, and hopefully your spouse or roommate doesn’t take them after a load of laundry.

Meet Harvey...

Line Up

Additionally, we will have an expansive lineup to include various product ranges. Through the progression of TWOSOME, our lines will include:

Men’s Business

Men’s & Women's Casual

Loafer Liners (no show)

Children’s

Each sock is named after the people that have inspired us to create this company. As we give back with every purchase, we will name our new designs after the individuals we help get back on their feet, transforming the socks into a person who became self-sufficent. 

Delivery | Logistics 

We have found the best way to get your purchase as quickly in your helping hands as possible. We have partnered with a distribution center that will fulfill your orders, dropping the socks off at your door in a timely fashion. 

So, we made partnerships to get you the best looking and most innovated designed socks you will ever own. We have combined the top materials in the industry, a cutting edge manufacturing process, with designs from top artist from the fashion institute, all so you know that you will receive a top-notch sock. Trust us, you will stand out wearing these.


However, we didn’t stop there.

At TWOSOME, we feel there’s more to life than just creating a quality brand and buying an industry-leading product. We wanted our product to give back to those in need, to be socially conscious like ourselves. So we thought, TOMS does it for shoes, and Warby Parker for glasses, why can’t we do it for socks.

So we decided upon using the one for one business model. However, instead of giving our donations to people overseas in Africa, or even the homeless population that just wants a handout, we wanted our socks to truly make a lasting impact in someone’s life. We wanted the donated socks to be more than just a band-aid, to actually influence the system, and to get people here, in our community back on their feet to work.

A Hand-Up, Over A Hand Out

Enter the OC Rescue Mission, a charity that does more than provide soup and meals for the homeless. Jim Palmer and his crew of dedicated individuals give more than just a hand out, they give a hand up. By taking in hundreds of Men, Women, Families and Children for 18 to 24 months at a time, The OC Rescue Mission makes a commitment to every person who enters their program to change their lives for good. They teach these individuals life changing skills, such as how to interact with others, how to cope with difficult life situations, how to find and sustain employment, and most importantly, how to reintegrate into the community, ultimately becoming self sufficient. 

We love how much the OC Rescue Mission does for people that we found a way to incorporate TWOSOME mission of providing quality dress socks to you and sustain it’s own charitable donations of getting people back on their feet. We know that a sock maybe a small item in an individual’s transformation into becoming a productive member of society, however, it is one less barrier that person will have to face. So, with every purchase of TWOSOME socks, we will donate a pair on your behalf TWOSOME one who deserves a second chance. Pair for Pair.

Also, with their network of 450 rescue mission across the country, we will hand select every single partner, using OC Rescue as our guide in find the best ones that make the biggest impact. As we grow, we will donate across the United States. Here's how it will work. Say you live in Southern California, great we will donate to the Orange County Rescue Mission. But wait, say I live in Texas. No problem, we gotcha covered, we will partner will a mission out there that helps people get back on their feet. 

When you buy these socks for yourself, loved one or a friend, you know that you will be directly helping someone in your community transform their life for a lifetime.  

And finally, Easton Ellis...

Warm Regards,


Eric, Chief Sock Giver

Please Note: The initial designs will be in next week (our initial designs are in 4/23/14), and we will continue to update as we work with our designers (yes still continue). I have decided to make this company as transparent as possible, answering every question you may have. We are committed to creating change. We take great pride in producing what you want, and more importantly, what benefits the greater need. If we do not hit our first goal, no worries, you will still receive what you signed up for, it just may take a little longer.

story:
Hey, I'm Geraldo. In the Summer of 2010 Nerdy Frames was launched from my apartment in NYC. Like all startups I struggle with getting the word out. I dedicate over 70hrs a week to create kick ass products. I want to make sure everyone gets a well made item produce by someone who loves what they're doing. My ultimate goal with Nerdy Frames is to make it into a fashionably & affordable brand where all ages can enjoy handmade glasses. 

Nerdy Frames believe in a Loop cycle of production where no waste is produce and any debris or waste is produce into other products. These days we need to be more environmentally conscious.

After a year and half of trial and error I have produce designs that will look good and can be produced effectively. 

So here I am asking for your Help. $500 Helps increase our production and more will allow us to produce more Styles. Skies the Limit!

Wooden Sunglasses Info ----------------------------------------------------------

How do our Sunglasses look like you ask ? Why is it different?

- All frames are designed and handcrafted in New York City.

- Nerdy Frames Sunglasses feature our signature "Third Eye" in all of our designs.

- We source mostly North American Wood such as Oak and Walnut. We also use an all Natural Beeswax coating that we created in order to stain our frames.


Wood Option----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

We're offering a Walnut / Oak Combo, all Walnut or all Oak


Your Personal Touch -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

We will engrave a name, our logo, our motto or a motto of your own.


Your Lens Choice ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Our supporters get to choose between Brown or Dark Grey lenses. Lenses are UV-A and UV-B treated. 

Perk Options -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Tees

Frames

Pouch 

Our sunglasses come with a Handmade Wool pouch made from a Houndstooth fabric.


What you get and what we need from you -------------------------------------------------

You get handmade wooden sunglasses from us with our natural Beeswax finish and  what we need is your support. We hope to bring to you a well made fashionable product that is easy on our environment.

How Your Money Helps Us ----------------------------------------------------------------------


Customer Service ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Regarding warranty, the 199 personalized frames offered here will be made by me ( Geraldo) and will be serviced by yours truly. The Grab Bag Special and Four Frame offer will be made by yours truly as well. ( I have limited the amount of frames offered since I'm only one person.) Depending on the severity of damage a service charge may be applied.

Attention International Supporters -----------------------------------------------------------

We haven't forgotten about you guys. I will cover the shipping cost to you.

After Donating ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

After donating, please contact: imanerd@nerdyframes.com with your lens choice and engraving choices. We will inform you what wood options are available.

We want to hear your feedback and/or comments.

Feel free to visit us at http://www.nerdyframes.com

Email: customerservice@nerdyframes.com

Twitter : @nerdyframes

Facebook Fan Page: http://www.facebook.com/NerdyFrames

Instagram: @nerdyframes

We're all about our fans and supporters and will always be available to answer any questions you may have. Thanks!
story_txt:
Hey, I'm Geraldo. In the Summer of 2010 Nerdy Frames was launched from my apartment in NYC.
 Like all startups I struggle with getting the word out. I 
dedicate over 70hrs a week to create kick ass products. I want to make 
sure everyone gets a well made item produce by someone who loves what 
they're doing. My ultimate goal with Nerdy Frames is to make it into a fashionably & affordable brand where all ages can enjoy handmade glasses.  Nerdy
 Frames believe in a Loop cycle of production where no waste is produce 
and any debris or waste is produce into other products. These days we 
need to be more environmentally conscious. After a year and half of trial and error I have produce designs that will look good and can be produced effectively.  So here I am asking for your Help. $500 Helps increase our production and more will allow us to produce more Styles. Skies the Limit!Wooden Sunglasses Info ----------------------------------------------------------How do our Sunglasses look like you ask ? Why is it different?-
 All frames are designed and handcrafted in New York City. - Nerdy Frames Sunglasses feature our signature "Third Eye" in all of our designs.-
 We source mostly North American Wood such as Oak and Walnut. We also 
use an all Natural Beeswax coating that we created in order to stain our
 frames.
Wood Option----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------We're offering a Walnut / Oak Combo, all Walnut or all OakYour Personal Touch -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
We will engrave a name, our logo, our motto or a motto of your own.Your Lens Choice ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Our supporters get to choose between Brown or Dark Grey lenses. Lenses are UV-A and UV-B treated. Perk Options -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------TeesFramesPouch  Our sunglasses come with a Handmade Wool pouch made from a Houndstooth fabric.What you get and what we need from you -------------------------------------------------
You get handmade wooden sunglasses from us with our natural Beeswax 
finish and  what we need is your support. We hope to bring to you a well
 made fashionable product that is easy on our environment.
How Your Money Helps Us ----------------------------------------------------------------------


Customer Service ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------Regarding
 warranty, the 199 personalized frames offered here will be made by me (
 Geraldo) and will be serviced by yours truly. The Grab Bag Special and 
Four Frame offer will be made by yours truly as well. ( I have limited

story:
The URBAN: A personal protection belt system that equips you with pepper spray and a super loud alarm!

Scat Belt presents The URBAN: A Personal Protection Belt System.
Provides instant access to pepper spray and a super loud alarm. Bring your smartphone, small personal items and even a bottle of water! You get the Scat Urban Belt, pepper spray and personal alarm in one great looking package! Scat Belt’s purpose is to Prepare, Protect, and Empower all women to go where they want, when they want. Worry less and adventure more!


The URBAN comes in three great colors and two sizes - you will choose which color and size before we send out your order! Get your Scat Urban Belt on and Go Safe. 



What makes the Scat Urban Belt so unique? Our design and function.
The Urban is a dual-defense belt system that offers quick access to your personal protection devices in a comfortable, secure, no-bounce athletically-fashioned design.


Dual-Defense: two options are better than one.

The 130 decibel alarm with pull-cord activation is an effective deterrent from a distance. It’s a precaution, a warning and a signal for help. Pepper Spray is securely held in place with a grab-and-spray holster. Accessing your pepper spray within a couple of seconds makes all the difference in defending yourself in the event of an up-close encounter. 

At Scat Belt, we know that non-lethal defense is by far the best option for preventing and mitigating unwanted situations.
Non-lethal devices are only effective if you have immediate access to them, that is where Scat Belt makes the difference! Go Safe.

    Risks & Challenges

    When it comes to personal protection we realized was that many of our best friends were nervous about going for a run in the early morning or simply walking their dog after dinner. Extensive market testing and group discussion with women-on-the-go has led us to the creation of The Scat Urban Belt. Our growing team of ambassadors, women of all ages and backgrounds, has influenced the design and utility of this product. We are 100% unique, creating a entirely new product category to enhance safety through non-lethal self-defense.

    Feedback has been over the top, we have to take action… Well, we already did! We have the first production run of The URBAN due to land in just a couple of weeks. We have met with retailers from large sporting goods chains to boutique running stores and have been welcomed - the biggest question is "When can we get them into our store?"

    No company wants to get “Sharked”, give up a major percentage of the business and become unmotivated. This product is too important not to SHOUT it out!!! We all deserve the freedom to move about and to stay safe, protect and empowered… So, let’s do this and TELL ALL CREEPS… SCAT!!!

    We need the funds to assemble the packaging, set up inventory and start in on outreach to get this life-changing and life-saving product to market. We know that the best way to market is via social media and events. We will use part of these funds to go to as many running, walking and biking events as we can! We hope to see you at our booth soon!!!


    Other Ways You Can Help

    Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

    • Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
    • Send your friends to our website, http://www.scatbelt.com/urban-series/
    • Send your friends to our Facebook page, https://www.facebook.com/scatbelt
    • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

    Thank you!

story:
We're back and better than ever!

One year ago you supported our vision to make the world’s thinnest, warmest jacket — a jacket insulated with NASA spacesuit technology. The crowdfunding community and our early adopters believed in us before anyone else even knew we existed. You blew us away with your support and kicked off a worldwide movement!

Now we're back. And this time, we mean business. 

The Orion Series can take you from the top of a mountain, back home, and everywhere in between. 

 

Traditional outerwear is cumbersome and boring! You have to wear big, bulky clothes and plenty of layers just to stay warm. 

What if you could wear thin gear with no layers and be perfectly warm whether you were on top of a mountain or relaxing with your friends? Using the same insulation NASA used in their space suits and space shuttles, OROS brings you its line of thin, warm performance apparel. No layers. No compromises. 

Aerogel, in geek terminology, is the lowest thermal conductive solid on the planet. Put simply, that means aerogel is the best insulator in existence!

Today, aerogel is used by NASA as insulation in their space suits. It can trap space dust on space shuttles, de-ice aircrafts, and insulate some of the coldest oil pipelines in the world. Aerogel is also very light. In fact, it would take 150 brick-sized pieces of aerogel to weigh as much as a single gallon of water! So what does all this mean? When you invest in OROS performance apparel, you get a thin and warm garment that even the astronauts would be proud of. 

Solarcore Aerogel:

We use a proprietary formulation of aerogel called Solarcore. It is the first aerogel suited for apparel with its incredible flexibility, hydrophobicity, durability, sound absorbency, and breathability all while maintaining the incredible insulation that aerogels are known for. 

Jacket:

 Available in Black & Blue

Beanie:

 Available in Grey & Blue

Gloves:

Available in Black

Snow Pants:

Available in black

The OROS Team:

 Michael, Rithvik, and Max (left to right) are lifelong friends who share passions for two things: Science & Adventure. By uniting the two, they believe they can change the way people think about outerwear and performance wear. 

WHY WE MAKE OUTERWEAR: 

Science gets a bad rap. Many believe science can't be sexy. Well, OROS thinks otherwise. We appreciate the flowing locks of Albert Einstein and find talks on epigenetics to be stimulating. We believe in challenging the status quo and pushing the boundaries of what is possible. Using the same technology applied by the National Aeronautics and Space Agency (NASA) as insulation in their space suits, we made outerwear slimmer, warmer and sexier. Besides, it's the 21st century. Aren't we beyond wrapping ourselves in animal furs and goose feathers?

OROS: 

OROS means mountain in Greek. But more than the gargantuan mass of land a rock formed by the clash of Earth's tectonic plates, OROS represents the challenge - and the accomplishment. The journey and the conquest. And the ultimate joy in achievement.

Reward Tiers:

Help us by sharing OROS Performance apparel with your friends!

Know someone who would be just as stoked as you are about OROS Performance apparel? Share our campaign with them through the "Share this project" button at the top. Sharing is caring!

Our team consists of experts in industries ranging from fashion and design to apparel and aerogel engineering.

We are all here to make sure the Orion series lives up to its name and you get your gear on time.

Here is our plan to achieve that:

February/March: Make tons of Indiegogo buddies, finalize the engineering and prototyping iterations, quality assurance, product validation

April-July: Procurement of raw materials and components, shipping of aerogel to apparel manufacturer, begin manufacturing

July-September: Conclude manufacturing, shipping of finalized product to distributor

October: Delivery of jackets to Indiegogo friends and fulfillment of rewards!

story: With its distinctive asymmetrical case, dramatic domed sapphire crystal, and clean dial design, the 72 Flyback celebrates tool watches of the 1960's and 70's—while exhibiting a contemporary feel in both styling and wearability.  Each model is assembled by hand in our California studio, carefully built for each owner. Find the Flyback that's right for you.

story:
Style with Significance

This all started with a simple idea: let's make "Christian shirts" that look cool! Instead of putting a verse on a shirt, we design symbols and graphics that represent a passage of Scripture. It’s like the difference between a custom tattoo and a bumper sticker. The tattoo might spark a conversation with other people. Bumper stickers often talk at other people. The goal of each design is to be noticed and inspire the question "what does that mean?"

We named the company Axent because our spiritual faith isn’t meant to be shared primarily through what we wear. It should be front and center in the way we live our lives. However, our clothes can accent, or emphasize, these beliefs to others.

 

Purpose over Profit

We see ourselves as a "for purpose" company. We want to sell products that people want in order to generate funds for charities that help others. So 10% of ALL sales will be donated to charity. This means 10% of top-line revenue or the "first fruits" - what we receive from customers. We're not talking about a "percentage of proceeds" or what's left over at the end.  

 

The Project & Timing

We think this is a great idea, but we also realize we are a bit biased. That is why we decided to launch the brand through this Indiegogo project. By reaching our funding goal, we’ll know the idea resonates with you, too. Plus, we’ll be able to help people in need, launch our own e-commerce site, and even expand our collection of designs.

The project will run through August 31st and shirts will be printed immediately following the project. Backers can expect to receive shirts around the end of September (international orders will be longer based on shipping times).

 

Our 110% Promise

Our goal is to create shirts that look great, fit great and last a long time. They’re made with high grade airlume combed ringspun cotton combined with polyester. That makes them light weight, durable, and incredibly comfortable. We’re pretty sure you’re going to love them. But if for some reason you don’t, no worries. Let us know within 60 days of receiving your shirts, and we’ll provide you with a 110% refund!

 

The Shirt Designs

We're excited about our "starting line up" for the initial shirt designs. We have others in mind and plan to offer even more options following a successful project.
 

Beginning To End

This shirt design represents the entirety of the Bible from Genesis 1 through Revelation 22. The inside of the letters is “filled” with the actual scripture verses from these chapters.

 

Three In One

This shirt design represents the Holy Trinity and incorporates three similar but unique triangle elements that come together as one overall shape. At the center is the Greek symbol for "Theos", meaning God.

 

New Way Through

This shirt design represents the splitting of the Red Sea in Exodus 14.

 

Moving Mountains

This shirt design represents the message in Mark 11:23, which demonstrates the power of faith and prayer in our lives – “Truly I tell you, if anyone says to this mountain, ‘Go, throw yourself into the sea,’ and does not doubt in their heart but believes that what they say will happen, it will be done for them.”

 

Forgive Forward

This shirt design is based on Colossians 3:13 - "Bear with each other and forgive one another if any of you has a grievance against someone. Forgive as the Lord forgave you." The design element is the Greek word for "forgive" used in that verse.

 

Backers will be able to choose their shirt design(s) and size(s)
after choosing a perk level.

 

Fit Guide for Shirt Sizing

story:
HOW TO PURCHASE
"3-Easy Step"

1. Select the “PERK” you wish to purchase. Click the pink button that says, "GET THIS PERK".
2. Select your choice of WATCH and STRAP COLOR. Click the pink button for next step.
3. Fill out your SHIPPING and PAYMENT INFORMATION. Click the pink button to confirm the order.

Note: Once the campaign is over, you will receive an EMAIL from us to confirm your choice of watch color, strap color, and the motivational quotes engraving on the straps.
After we received your confirmed information, we will begin the production! 

Now sit back, relax and wait for your Beacon Motivational Timepiece to arrive at your door step! We will keep you informed of any new updates!

 

EXPEDITED SHIPPING WORLDWIDE

We will ship all our products worldwide using EXPEDITED SHIPPING SERVICE.  

At the end of the campaign and after a confirmed order, we will provide you with a Tracking Code so you can track your purchases with ease. 

Please note that you may be responsible for duties, fees, and taxes applicable in your region.

 

FREE 10-YEAR WARRANTY

We are confident in the quality of our watches and this is why all our watches will come with a 10-YEAR INTERNATIONAL WARRANTY against manufacturer defects FREE-OF-CHARGE.

The warranty will cover all parts against manufacturer defects. Simply return us the watches and they will be repaired or exchanged!

 

ESTIMATED DELIVERY

Our commitment to excellence would be represented in the first shipment of the watches, which will be set to go out in JUNE 2018.

We all work hard to ensure the whole production runs smoothly, however unexpected delays may occur during any stages of production and therefore a delayed delivery can be a possibility.  As our customer, we promise to keep you informed every step of the way!

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

We are dedicated to delivering High-Quality Automatic Watches combined with Motivational Values that fulfills your expectations.

Our partners and manufacturers are standing ready to begin production as soon as we meet our funding goal. To cope with the time needed to purchase the required parts, assembly of the watches and perform all necessary tests and quality checking, we anticipate that the first batch of orders will be delivered to you by June 2018. We will, of course, keep you updated on our progress.

Everyone in the Beacon Watches team is ready for this exciting challenge, and we hope you will join us in making this Motivational and Inspirational project a Reality!

Thank you for your support!

 

CONTACT US

Please contact us at hello@beaconwatches.co.

We will always be here to answer any queries or questions you may have.

For our latest news and product info, feel free to visit our website at: https://beaconwatches.co

story:
The Project: 

Fairytales & Magic is a collaborative project that is like creating a story within many stories. Expressing the unique tale of the individual (the model/ the clothing), speaking of the creative quests of the many (the production crew), seeing the adventure as a whole (from scheming, plotting, to the making, to the photo-shoots to the actual shows). We're creating a story through many different forms of expression such as design, illustration, photography, videography, etc. 

There are two shows:

The first show is May 30, 2014 in Savannah, Ga. at the Muse Arts Warehouse and the second show is June 27, 2014 in Virginia Beach, Va. at the Royal Courtyard. 


The Funding: 

*The bulk of the funding will be used to pay for the two locations for the upcoming shows. 

*We will also use the funding towards any props needed for the upcoming shows.

*If we do not hit our goal, we will still use any funds collected and put it towards paying for the two locations for the upcoming shows. 

*If we’re lucky enough to exceed our goal, we can use the extra funding towards props for a couple amazing photo-shoots of the collections, and any extra fabric, appliqués, or notions needed for the final garments.  

The Perks:

Every dollar goes a long way! 

For every donation big or small, those of us a part of Fairytales & Magic would like to send you a special note, thanking you for contributing to magic! 

Some of our other perks include:

*Fairytales & Magic Buttons

*A Signed Poster from the Fairytales & Magic Cast & Crew (Which was Illustrated by Amazing Deanna deMonch)

*A Fairytales & Magic T-Shirt 

*A behind the scenes polaroid (This can be from any BTS of the Shows or Shoots)

*General Admission Tickets & VIP Tickets to the Show of your Choice 

(VIP Tickets include a Grab bag Full of Goodies)

*Tickets to Pre-Show Cocktail Hour

*Own a one of the beautiful creations by deMonch for Fairytales & Magic (Note: This perk is not available till July 2014) 

Note: International Shipping will be charged extra. 

The Impact

Every contribution will bring us one step closer to achieving our goal to be able to bring an amazing dream to life. We’re bringing a fantasy like journey alive through one Designer’s clothing. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help!

*Share this project and spread the word! Word of mouth is the strongest tool!

*Visit our Facebook page and become a fan.

And that’s all there is to it!


Photo Credit: Visionaries Photography
story_txt:

Expressing the unique tale of the individual (the model/ the clothing), speaking of the creative quests of the many (the production crew), seeing the adventure as a whole (from scheming, plotting, to the making, to the photo-shoots to the actual shows). We're creating a story through many different forms of expression such as design, illustration, photography, videography, etc. There are two shows:The first show is May 30, 2014 in Savannah, Ga. at the Muse Arts Warehouse and the second show is June 27, 2014 in Virginia Beach, Va. at the Royal Courtyard. The Funding: *The bulk of the funding will be used to pay for the two locations for the upcoming shows.

story:
Simple Snap™ comes with a patented mold that fits perfectly around your device allowing for a flawless bubble-free installation.

The first screen protector was designed and patented by Herbert Schlegel in 1968 for use on television screens.  Since that time many innovations have been made to improve the quality of the screen protector, but little has been made to improve on the ease of installation.  If you have ever installed a screen protector, you understand the frustration of aligning it properly and keeping all of the dust and dirt off so you can have a bubble free installation.

Simple Snap™ Coming Soon

iPhone 6, Samsung Galaxy S4, Samsung Galaxy S5, iPad 2/3/4, Samsung Galaxy Note 3, Samsung Galaxy Note 4 & Amazon Fire Phone
story_txt:
Simple Snap™ comes with a patented mold that fits perfectly around your device allowing for a flawless bubble-free installation.The first screen protector was designed and patented by Herbert Schlegel in 1968 for use on television screens.  Since that time many innovations have been made to improve the quality of the screen protector, but little has been made to improve on the ease of installation.  If you have ever installed a screen protector, you understand the frustration of aligning it properly and keeping all of the dust and dirt off so you can have a bubble free installation.
Our Mission

To offer a quick and simple protection method for smartphones and tablets utilizing effortless technology that anyone can use.
What is the problem?


Screen protectors are historically grueling to install. It is a difficult task to align the protector properly so that it goes on evenly. Constantly removing and repositioning the protector causes it to bend and trap dust and air bubbles.Patented Position-Lock Design solves the Problem!

Simple Snap™ comes with a disposable mold that fits perfectly around the device. Simply push the mold over the device until it snaps off and leaves the screen protector flawlessly installed within 0.1mm precision.

What have we done with OUR money?
So far we have invested our money into R&D, Tooling (patented mold), and the development of the product brand.  
We have also self-funded the initial sample production run.
What will we do with YOUR money?
Manufacturing - We will be increasing the product line and will allocate funds to allow for tooling of several additional smartphone and tablet models.  Pledgers will be able to vote on the next devices they want to see with a Simple Snap™ mold!
Distribution - We want to extend our distribution channels through ecommerce and retail outlets such as BestBuy, RadioShack, Target, Wal-Mart and GameStop.  
Marketing - In order to build upon our momentum, we need you to tell your family & friends  The easiest way to do that is through social media: Post about Simple Snap™ on Facebook, Twitter, Linkedin, YouTube and Instagram!  We are launching several marketing campaigns to assist with spreading the word via social media.


With your funding you will get yourself one of the very first production Simple Snap™ protectors by or before September 2014.


All contributions include FREE shipping within the USA! 
Please add the $10 International Shipping perk for all locations outside of the USA.



Simple Snap™ Installation

Step 1 - Clean Phone and Peel Back Bottom Disposable Film



Step 2 - Align Simple Snap mold parallel to Device


Step 3 - "Snap" mold over phone until Screen Protector adhesive activates

Step 4 - Remove Top Layer of Disposable Film and Voilà!




Simple Snap™ Tech Specs
HD Anti-Fingerprint

Simple Snap™ Tech Specs
Tempered Glass



Simple Snap™ Coming Soon

iPhone 6, Samsung Galaxy S4, Samsung Galaxy S5, iPad 2/3/4, Samsung Galaxy Note 3, Samsung Galaxy Note 4 & Amazon Fire Phone
We'd love to hear from you!
Please let us know if you have any questions, comments or suggestions!

Please note that our team will try as hard as possible to answer any and all questions and comments that are left on the comments page but the easiest way to get immediate assistance is to email our Customer Relations team at:
Hi@SimpleSnap.com

Don't forget to like and follow us for the latest information on all things Simple Snap
Like Us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/simplesnap
Follow us on Twitter: @SimpleSnapit

For inquiries regarding Distribution, Retail, and Partnerships please contact our sales team at: Sales@SimpleSnap.com


Press
Please email Ashley@SimpleSnap.com for more information. 
For resources visit: http://www.SimpleSnap.com/deck

FAQ
1) What is the thickness of the Screen Protector?


The HD-Antifingerprint version is 0.125mm and the Tempered Glass version is 0.33mm thick.
2) What is the weight of the screen protector?
A basic iPhone screen protector weighs less than 8 grams.
3) Will this screen protector work with my case?
Absolutely!  The screen protector will work with most cases on the market today.
4) How do I order multiple items/combinations?
Indiegogo doesn't allow multiple perk contributions.  You'll need to contribute multiple times in order to purchase more than one item!
5) Is the Shipping and Handling Cost Included?
Shipping within the USA is FREE!
Add the $10 International Shipping perk for locations outside the USA.
6) When will you possibly ship the first batch?
We have already received the final production run samples and everything is on track for final distribution in August 2014.  You should receive your Simple Snap™ Screen Protector within 30 days after the campaign ends!
7) Does it affect the Touch ID sensor on iPhone 5s?
No. it will not decrease the performance of the Touch ID sensor.
8) Does the ReVamp team love you?
Yes :)

DEUTSCHER KAMPAGNENTEXT:
bitte herunterscrollen!


Fabric of your regular clothes hasn’t changed, in like “forever”?

Probably not forever, but during the last decades there hasn’t been much of a change in your everyday apparel, except for the looks of course!

Sports clothes industry is changing their material all the time and new innovative fabrics are used by every major sporting good manufacturer. However, your everyday t-shirt, sweater, skirt or pair of pants hasn’t changed a bit. 


Why buy a rain jacket, if you can wear your favorite sweater all year?

Why ruin your favorite shirt with nasty red wine or beer stains during a night out in town?

Why have a spare shirt in the office just in case you spill your drink or food during lunchtime?

Why wear plastic bags or other “stupid-looking” plastic covers at festivals?

Why dry your swim shorts for so long on the beach? Why have you never been in the shower all suited up? 





Simply modify your clothing’s fabric structure. 

Cure it - from its boring, ordinary existence. 
Cure it - to become extraordinary, exceptional
Cure it - to become something unique and exciting! 


Let’s cure our favorite clothing with an amazing clothing impregnation – TextilCure 



Nearly every piece of fabric. You’ll probably know best. To stir your imagination we mention just a few of the sheer possibilities: 











And for the hipster amongst you: 

Why not protect your MacBook with a super-hydrophobic tote bag? 



TextilCure creates a permanent, transparent and ultra-thin layer on nearly any fabric. It actually does not just lay on top of the fabric, but merges with each fiber to create an amazing water resistant, oil resistant and dirt repellent surface. It is easy applicable, just spray it on or soak the fabric in. As soon as the fa- bric is really dry the effect can be seen and your favorite t-shirt is super-hydrophobic.
Our product is bio based. It is absolutely not harmful or dangerous to you, your skin or the environment. It is also UV-resistant, so it is safe to use. It is machi- ne washable for up to 40 times, depending on how consistent the fabric is covered /soaked. It is also washable in the hot water laundry program.
You have seen something similar? Nice, means you’re open to innovation. But are similar products truly fully transparent? Isn’t there a slightly frosted look to it and would you want your brand new clothes to look like that?



nanoCure is a start-up company that focuses on providing high-performance, industrial nanotechnology coatings for commercial and private use.

Our journey began one and a half years ago during our studies. Throughout the last year of our studies, we have encountered this absolutely amazing technology and our interest was caught straight away. Ever since, we have been looking for, researching on and developing special solutions for many different sectors. Due to our amazement and the constant inquiries by friends, colleagues and family, we have decided to share our latest, fascinating product not only with the industry, but with everyone. 




We give people access to this kind of technology, because there is an actual need for it. Somehow the big players in the textile industry see no reward in publishing such a product, because planned obsolescence does not allow for clothing to be worn more than one season.

Don’t be restricted to what the textile industry wants you to wear or buy. Wear your favorite piece of clothing whenever you want to, all seasons long. 


First and foremost, the production of this product is fairly expensive. It’s a cool, innovative, game changing liquid, but quality comes at a price. We need some inventory to fulfill orders and to stock for the opening of our webshop. Further to get into retail we need to be flexible in our production and able to fulfill mini- mum order quantities.

Secondly, you probably guessed right, we need to get our webshop going. Coding, publishing and marketing are the three major matters of expenses on this account.

As you can see on our website, so far we have tried different angles to approach our clients and that was mostly regional marketing in Germany and surrounding Europe. Therefore we have to extend and amend our website.

Last but not least we have to market our idea and most marketing ideas cost at least a little. Professional video material is key, as our products have to be visualized to be understood by the broad mass.

This list gives you an insight, without boring you with the details. 

Ok, we'll show you some details; 

We're really not here to make a quick buck or two by just selling our product. We put a lot of effort, money and time into our products and the graphic below will show you how your money will be spent.  




As we want to build the backend for a customer product, we don’t want you to feel left out.
That’s why we offer you our products for a pioneer / indiegogo price.

The concentrate can be mixed 1:20 - 1:25 with distilled water, depending on the fabric. The 20ml perk can be mixed with 500ml - 1⁄2 Liter distilled water. Further details will follow on the user manual.


As you’ve probably seen from our location, we are a Hamburg, Germany based company. For that reason we have to add a ship- ping fee to some international orders.
Please, if you’re not from the EU or USA or Canada, just contact us and we’ll find out how much it is.

story:
IMPORTANT NOTE:  *Leave a message in the "Comments" section with your Belt size and colour at the TOP of this page (above the video) AFTER purchasing your Fresh Set Belt or Box*


STRETCH GOAL #2: $10,000

Help our campaign reach $10,000 and EVERYONE who has backed our campaign will receive a FREE set of Cufflinks!  


The Fresh Set All-In-One Accessory Box 

Our Mission 

To challenge the belief that style comes with a high price tag.  We want to help men look sharp, feel confident, and find success with an affordable, high quality product that's minimalist in design.

Our Vision 

To be your all-in-one accessory shop.  We strive to be a leader in affordable, high quality fashion providing a superior alternative to overpriced brands.

On behalf of Co-Founders Spencer Leiske (left) and Tanner Nault (right)  we would like to thank you in advance for taking the time to check out our campaign, any support helps and we appreciate all of it!

As Covered by:

Why Fresh Set?

We arrived at the Fresh Set idea purely out of necessity.  We were unhappy with the selection at the big box stores and even less impressed with the price tag that came along with it.  We wanted to create something that reflected what we value most, a high quality product at an affordable price.  And so the idea for Fresh Set was born! We have spent the past six months designing a product that we love, with its minimalist design, and stylish features, we know you will love it too!

Critical components of the Fresh Set design process:
  • Subtle style through a minimalist design
  • A product that meets our high quality standards
  • Creating sets of products at an affordable price point

The Fresh Set Signature Collection

Our First line consists of FOUR Signature Collections to choose from. 


The Gold Set


The Onyx Black Set


The Silver Set



The Gun Metal Set


What's in the Box?

Each Fresh Set Box comes complete with a Tie Clip, a set of Cufflinks, a Belt Buckle and a Leather Belt (located underneath the insert).  We have carefully constructed each box so that each item within the set perfectly complements each other. Whether you are wearing them individually or as a set they will be sure to complete your look in style.


Signature Belts


Signature Tie Clips

Signature Cufflinks


Fresh Set Specifications

Belt Buckle Dimensions: 80mm x 42mm 

Material: Brass 

Belt Lengths: 43"(28 -32 Waist), 45"(32-36 Waist), 47"(36-40 Waist) 

Note: Any Belt can be shortened to fit a smaller waist

Material: Cowhide Leather   

Colours: Brown and Black

Action: Insert flat end into the buckle, close the clasp

Tie Clip Dimensions: 45mm x 7mm 

Material: Stainless Steel

Action: Slide-on

Cufflink Face Diameter: 15mm 

Material: Stainless Steel


The Fresh Set Guarantee

We are so confident in our product that we are proud to offer a two year product replacement guarantee.  In fact, if you have any issue with our products functionality or mechanical ability, we hope you will send it back to us so we can replace it.

Warranty does not cover:
  • Wear and tear or aging (e.g. alteration of the color and/or material of buckle or belt, finish on the tieclip or cufflinks.)
  • Any damage on any part of the buckle, cufflinks or tieclips resulting from abnormal/abusive use, lack of care, negligence, accidents (knocks, dents, crushing etc.) 
 

What's Next?

Our Ultimate goal is to be your one-stop shop for Men's accessories, with your help we will continue to build new and exciting collections of Fresh Set Boxes that stay at an affordable price.  Come with us as we take this journey, we know that you are as much a part of this as we are! We will continue to offer YOU an exceptional product that remains affordable, because without YOU there is no Fresh Set.


The Fresh Set Team

Created by two young entrepreneurs and suit enthusiasts who share a passion for style and an appreciation for accessories.  Spencer and Tanner set out to create a product that was both stylish and minimalist in design.  Price was still an issue, they realized that by eliminating the classic retail supply chain, they could remove the high price tag associated with Big Box Stores.  And so it was decided that two long time friends would assume the role of business partners and create a product that inspires a community to look fresh and feel confident.


What We Need & What You Get

We have set our campaign goal at $20,000.  This will provide us with the necessary funds to fill our orders, and begin development on the next collection of Fresh Set Boxes.  Our backers are the key to our success and, through the many perks we offer, can help us reach our goal.  
By selecting one of the perks available on the side, you'll instantly become a backer and a part of the Fresh Set journey. If you back us,  not only will you receive our special Indiegogo pricing, you will be among the first to receive products from the Fresh Set Signature Collection.


If funded, how will we fulfill the orders?

We've created, modified, and refined our initial design.  Established a working prototype and built a relationship with a trusted manufacturer that has a great reputation in the industry.  Once Indiegogo releases the funds, we can pay the initial deposit to begin production.  Production time takes roughly 30 days from the end of the campaign.  Our team will then ship the orders to our awesome backers! 

It's Time to Get Fresh!

From Tanner, Spencer and the rest of the Fresh Set team, thank you for backing our project.

Check us out on Instagram

  https://www.instagram.com/fresh_set/

We will continue to offer YOU an exceptional product that remains affordable, because without YOU there is no Fresh Set.

By selecting one of the perks available on the side, you'll instantly become a backer and a part of the Fresh Set journey. If you back us,  not only will you receive our special Indiegogo pricing, you will be among the first to receive products from the Fresh Set Signature Collection.
