We've created, modified, and refined our initial design.  Established a working prototype and built a relationship with a trusted manufacturer that has a great reputation in the industry.  Once Indiegogo releases the funds, we can pay the initial deposit to begin production.  Production time takes roughly 30 days from the end of the campaign.  Our team will then ship the orders to our awesome backers! 

It's Time to Get Fresh!



From Tanner, Spencer and the rest of the Fresh Set team, thank you for backing our project.


Check us out on Instagram


  https://www.instagram.com/fresh_set/

story:
P U S H I N G   T H E   B O U N D A R I E S

O F   D E S I G N

Simone Chap is an international brand with an italian soul.

With designs focused on pret-a-porter with couture elements, and using the best italian fabrics and materials, Simone mixes the old-fashioned italian couture techniques with a post-avantgarde aesthetic and modern technologies, to create wearable contemporary art pieces. 

A S   S E E N   O N

www.simonechap.com/press

 

M Y   S T O R Y

I always wanted to do something original.

I developed my aesthetic code in a life of artistic experiments, from novel-writing to painting, to being a musician, composer and finally designer.

   With Suzy Menkes, while working in Iris van Herpen's studio

Working first in a small tailoring studio in my hometown, after my graduation in Fashion Design in Rome I attended short courses at the Central Saint Martins College of Art and Design in London. I then pursued my dream of working with some of my favourite designers, first for dutch designer Iris Van Herpen and then for Paris-based designer Rick Owens. 

All these working experiences contributed to form and influence my aesthetic and brought me a post-avantgarde vision on modern fashion, and I felt confident enough to bring those visions to reality.

So SIMONE CHAP was born.

 

T H E   D A R K   M A T T E R  

 C O L L E C T I O N

The DARK MATTER Collection is a journey in our little universe, to discover the invisible dark matter that rules our consciousness.

A subtle, dark structure that can only be perceived through the effects it has on the other surrounding matter.

The invisible and obscure matter finds his form in dark fabrics, and the hand-crafted manipulated silk recalls the chaos theory, while layers and folds are shaped on wormholes and space-time alterations.

 

T H E   C A M P A I G N

After working in major fashion brands, I decided to finally launch my own designs, bringing on the market high-quality products that combine a fashion-forward design and a luxury craftmanship.
 
The funds raised through the campaign will be used for the opening of our new studio, for the development of our next collection, expected for March 2017, and for the basic forniture and essential expenses.
 
The main features of the project are:

U N I Q U E N E S S

The DARK MATTER collection is being launched exclusively here on Indiegogo, so you get something that has never been seen before anywhere else!

 

C U T T I N G - E D G E   D E S I G N

There is no space for basics. Detailed textures and sharp edges, yet with a minimalistic aura.

 

L O C A L L Y   S O U R C E D

Our fabrics are sourced in italian factories that are still using traditional techniques, delivering the best quality on the market.

 

H A N D - C R A F T E D
We mixed the best traditional italian sewing techniques with a hint of technology, to deliver impeccable hand-crafted fabrics and details.
 
 

N O   R E T A I L

You buy directly from the designer's studio, cutting out the retail middlemen.  In this way you get the same outstanding quality and save a minimum of 40%!
 
 

P E R K S

We made available a small selection of our first collection for this campaign, including some unisex pieces (see the size chart at the bottom for size details)

For more pictures at higher resolution have a look at the gallery at the top of the page.

All the pieces are hand-crafted with the maximum care, and include premium packaging to deliver a truly luxurious experience to your hands.

Also, all our backers will become part of our new studio! We will hang on the wall a framed art with the names of all our backers, to show you eternal gratitude!

 _________________________________________________________________________

A C C E S S O R I E S

_________________________________________________________________________

"KHAOS PYTHON" LEATHER IPHONE COVER

UNISEX

An extremely refined black iPhone 6/6S cover made of genuine python snake leather, for a luxurious touch and amazing grip!

Composition: 100% genuine python snake leather

Retail Price: 160 €               INDIEGOGO Price: 69€

_________________________________________________________________________

"BELT DROP" BACKPACK

UNISEX

A premium crinkled lambskin backpack, with belt detail, two side pockets, one upper pocket and an inside one. Great for everyday use or even for a long weekend! Measures: H36cm x W30cm x D24cm
Composition: 100% genuine crinkled lambskin

Retail Price: 395€               INDIEGOGO Price: 237€

_________________________________________________________________________

"NOTHINGNESS" TOTE BAG

UNISEX

A versatile tote bag made of raw vegetable tanned lamb leather, perfect for everyday use. Features an inside zip pocket and detachable shoulder strap with adjustable lenght. Measures: H33cm x W30 x D14cm
Composition: 100% genuine vegetable tanned lamb leather

Retail Price: 265€               INDIEGOGO Price: 159

_________________________________________________________________________

C L O T H I N G

_________________________________________________________________________

WORMHOLE SHIRT

UNISEX

The Wormhole Shirt features an origami-like manipulation inspired by the Einstein-Rosen bridge, a shortcut connecting two separate points in spacetime. Made of medium-thickness cotton with an elastic touch, for the best comfort.

 Composition: 97% cotton, 3% elastan.

Retail Price: 245€               INDIEGOGO Price: 147€

_________________________________________________________________________

WORMHOLE LONG TANK

UNISEX

Featuring the same "Wormhole" detail as the Wormhole Shirt, this sleeveless version comes in a longer lenght, and it can also be worn as a stand-alone dress. Made of comfortable cotton.

Composition: 97% cotton, 3% elastan

Retail Price: 270€               INDIEGOGO Price: 162€

_________________________________________________________________________

KHAOS DROP SHIRT

This shirt features a drop-shaped neck detail made of hand-crafted manipulated silk, that creates a chaotic random pattern. Perfect for everyday, brings a hint of femininity in an androgynous silhouette.
Composition: 78% cotton, 20% silk, 2% elastan

Retail Price: 240€               INDIEGOGO Price: 144€

_________________________________________________________________________

           

WORMHOLE POCKET PANTS

With origami-like details around the pockets, the Wormhole Pocket Pants are perfect to be paired with the Wormhole Shirt. Made of thick resistant elastic cotton, they come with a slim relaxed fit, to offer the maximum of the comfort. 
Composition: 98% cotton, 2% elastan

Retail Price: 280€               INDIEGOGO Price: 168€

_____________________________________________________________________________

KHAOS KNEE PANTS

The chaotic silk details on the knees make the Khaos Knee Pants perfect to be paired with the Khaos Drop Shirt, but they are awesome on their own! The relaxed slim fit makes them perfect to be worn every day.

Composition: 83% cotton, 15% silk, 2% elastan

Retail Price: 295€               INDIEGOGO Price: 177€

_____________________________________________________________________________

WORMHOLE NECK DRESS

The Wormhole Neck Dress features geometric origami-details on the neck and dark grey polyurethane sleeves applications. Perfect for a fancy night out or just a drink with friends. Lenght above the knees and invisible zip in the back.

Composition: 83% cotton, 15% polyurethane, 2% elastan

Retail Price: 490€               INDIEGOGO Price: 294€

_____________________________________________________________________________

KHAOS FOLDED DRESS

The Khaos Folded Dress is a triumph of tailoring. Folded volumes, exquisite details, precious materials and impeccable hand-stitched finishes. The details from the Dark Matter collection are all fused in an architectural aesthetic, hand-made for you.

Composition: 83% cotton, 15% silk, 2% elastan

Retail Price: 580€               INDIEGOGO Price: 348€

_____________________________________________________________________________

S I Z E   G U I D E

Measurements shown in the size guide refer to body measurements and not measurements of the garment.

The model in the pictures is 172cm tall and wears size S of every piece.

W O M E N S W E A R

 

M E N S W E A R

 

H O W   T O   M E A S U R E

               

 

F R E Q U E N T L Y   A S K E D   Q U E S T I O N S

 

Can I get multiple perks?

Yes! You can back our campaign as many times as you want, choosing as many perks as you want.

Where are your clothes produced?

Our clothes are all designed, prototyped and produced in-house in our temporary small studio based just a few kilometers away from Rome, Italy, delivering you the well-known italian artisanal craftmanship.

Where do you source the fabrics and materials?

We source all we need for our production in small local shops and factories based around the Rome area,  so that you get the best quality fabrics on the market.

When are my perks going to be shipped?

Shipping is expected in February 2017.

When can I expect my order to arrive?

This depends much on your location. Maximum delivery time worldwide should be 3-4 weeks.

How will you use the money you raise?

The funds raised through the campaign will be used for the opening of our new studio, for the development of our next collection, expected for March 2017, and for the basic forniture and essential expenses.

Where are you going to open your new studio?

Plans are to open our new studio in the Netherlands, close to the city of Amsterdam, but we are planning to keep production location in Italy.

Beside backing your project, how can I help?

If you can't contribute with money, there are many ways you can still help us! You can help by spreading the word to everyone you know using the sharing tools at the top of the page, as well as follow us on Facebook and Instagram!

P R O J E C T   T I M E L I N E

O T H E R   W A Y S   Y O U   C A N   S U P P O R T

We realize that not everyone can contribute with money. In that case, there are many other ways you can help! Send this campaign to a person you think might be interested, share it with your family and friends using the share tools at the top of the page and follow us on Facebook and Instagram!

 

S P E C I A L   T H A N K   Y O U ' S

Putting this campaign together has been an amazing experience. We couldn’t have done it without the help and support of the following  people. THANK YOU!

  • Anna Fantuzzi
  • Manu Chis
  • Kingä Hädobas
  • Ingrid Lima
  • Douglas Oler
  • Matteo Castelli
  • Alexandra Popoviciu
  • Everyone who supports!

www.simonechap.com

story:
Manaliso develops sustainable fashion, that doesn’t take any deals on style, fairness, health or environment.

 

Help us to start the production of our new collection.

We finished our new 100% fair, 100% organic and 100% vegan collection “All I Sea”. With this crowdfunding campaign, we collect enough advance orders to start the production. We will use the raised sum completely for our production. You will learn on this page, why backing this campaign is so important and how backing in general works.

 

 

Manaliso entwickelt nachhaltige Mode, die keine Kompromisse mehr bei Stil, Fairness, Gesundheit oder Umwelt macht.

 

Hilf uns, unsere neue Kollektion zu produzieren!

Wir haben unsere neue, 100% faire, 100% bio und 100% vegane Kollektion “All I Sea” fertig. Wir nutzen unsere Crowdfunding-Kampagne, um genug Vorbestellungen für die Produktion zu sammeln. Die komplette, gesammelte Summe werden wir direkt in die Produktion investieren. Warum das so wichtig ist und wie der Ablauf funktioniert, erfährst du auf dieser Kampagnenseite.

 

 

Why support Manaliso?

Still #topless? In a nutshell.

Let’s be honest: For how many of your clothing pieces you can claim they have been produced fair and organic. We think the time to compromise is over. We want to create fashion without compromises. What’s in for you?

Warum solltest du uns unterstützen?

Immer noch #obenohne? Auf den Punkt.

Hand aufs Herz: Von wie vielen Kleidungsstücken kannst du behaupten, sie mit guten Gewissen zu tragen? Wir finden, die Zeit für Kompromisse ist vorbei. Wir haben uns daher das Ziel gesetzt, Mode zu entwickeln, bei der du keine eingehen musst. Was bedeutet das für dich?

The Deal (Unser Angebot)

With help of the advance orders we can start the product and, at the same time, offer you a big discount. For you, there’s no risk, if the campaign doesn’t succeed, everyone gets their money back!

Durch die Vorbestellungen können wir die Produktion starten und euch gleichzeitig noch ‘nen dicken Rabatt geben. Für euch gibt es dabei kein Risiko. Falls wir das Ziel nicht erreichen, erhalten alle ihr Geld zurück!


Which size do i need and how do i measure right?

Take one of your textiles, where you like the shape. You can then compare the measurements with our sizes.

Chest width: Begin about 2.5 cm (1 inch) below one armpit and measure the length horizontally to the other armpit.

Torso length: Measure the length from the collar vertically to the end of the shirt.

Sleeve length: For a shirt with long sleeves, you can measure the sleeve length. To do this, simply measure the distance between the collar and the end of the sleeve.

 

Welche Größe benötige ich und Wie messe ich richtig?

Nimm dir eins deiner Textilien, bei dem dir der Schnitt gefällt. Die Messungen kannst du dann mit unseren Werten vergleichen.

Brustbreite: Setze das Maßband ca. 2,5 cm unter den Achseln an und lege es möglichst horizontal bis zur anderen Seite. 

Rumpflänge: Um die Rumpflänge zu messen, setzt du das Maßband am äußersten Kragenrand an und misst möglichst senkrecht bis zum Ende des Textils.

Ärmellänge: Bei einem Textil mit langen Ärmeln, kannst du auch die Ärmellänge messen. Setze das Maßband am Kragen des Textiles an und messe bis zum Ende des Ärmels.

Shipping Map (Versandkarte)

 

Production Process (Produktionsablauf)

We need at least 25000€ to start the produce for the rest of the collection. This money goes directly to our external service providers who manage the production. If the campaign is successful, we will start the production immediately to ship you perks in the year - except for the coupons, they will be ready directly after the campaign! With every perk you buy you'll get a digital certificate you can print and use as a gift as well.

Wir benötigen mindestens 25.000 €, um die Produktion zu starten. Dieses Geld fließt komplett an unsere externen Dienstleister (Nähereien und Stoffproduzenten), die uns bei der Produktion unterstützen. Wenn die Kampagne erfolgreich ist, geben wir die Produktion in Auftrag und werden die Geschenke im nächsten Jahr ausliefern. Die Gutscheine für unseren Online-Shop kommen auch schon direkt nach der Kampagne!

How you can contribute?

You can support us in 4 different ways:

  1. You can donate by clicking the beautiful pink “Back it” button in the upper right and follow the checkout instructions.
  2. You choose a perk on the right side and follow the checkout instructions as well.
  3. You can share this campaign with your friends, family and other nice people who might be interested in this campaign. You can use this short memorable link for sharing: igg.me/at/all-i-sea.
  4. Follow us on Facebook, Instagram, Youtube or join our newsletter list.

Important: To support us, it’s not necessary to have a Paypal account. Everyone with a valid credit card or a Paypal account can back this campaign. Indiegogo uses Paypal as a service provider to process the payments. You will be redirected to the Paypal site but can choose to pay via accout.

Wie du uns helfen kannst?

Du kannst uns auf 4 unterschiedlichen Arten unterstützen:

  1. Du kannst für uns spenden, indem du oben rechts auf  den schönen rosaroten Button “Unterstützen” klickst und dem Bestellvorgang folgst.
  2. Du suchst dir ein Geschenk (Perk) auf der rechten Seite aus und folgst ebenfalls dem Bestellvorgang.
  3. Du kannst deine Freunden, Verwandten und Bekannten im Internet oder persönlich auf unsere Kampagne hinweisen. Wir haben dafür einen Kurzlink erstellt, den man sich besser merken kann: https://igg.me/at/all-i-sea.
  4. Folge uns auf Facebook, Instagram, Youtube oder trage dich in unseren E-Mail-Verteiler ein und bleibe auf dem Laufenden.

Wichtig: Um uns zu unterstützen, braucht ihr keinen Paypal-Account. Jeder mit einer gültigen Kreditkarte oder einem Paypal-Account kann uns unterstützen. Indiegogo nutzt Paypal lediglich als externen Dienstleister für die Verarbeitung der Zahlungen. Ihr werdet zwar auf die Seite von Paypal weitergeleitet, aber könnt auswählen, dass ihr ohne Paypal-Account bezahlen möchtet.

Press (Presse)

  • Pressematerial (Fotos) (Link)

FAQ

Q: How do I choose my size and Style? F: Wie wähle ich meine Größe aus?

Inside of the perks, you will be able to choose the size and style (if applicable: boys or girls). You can find the exact size for you with the help of our size charts.

Bei den Geschenken auf der rechten Seite gibt es die Möglichkeit, im Bestellprozess die Größe und Style (wenn vorhanden: Damen oder Herren) auszuwählen. Die richtige Größe, kannst du anhand der Größentabellen herausfinden.

Q: Where can I get in touch? F: Wie kann ich euch erreichen?

You can get in touch via mail at hi@manaliso.com, our Facebook page facebook.com/manaliso or leave a comment on the campaign page.

Du kannst uns per Mail an hi@manaliso.com, über unserer Facebook-Seite facebook.com/manaliso oder mit einem Kommentar auf der Kampagnenseite erreichen.

Q: What is Crowdfunding? F: Was ist Crowdfunding?

Crowdfunding is a possibility for companies and organizations to raise funds for specific purposes. Backers can then either donate or choose from a list of perks.
We want to raise money for the production of our 2017 summer’s collection and while offering you a sweet deal to stay independent of external loans or venture capital.

Crowdfunding ermöglicht es Unternehmen und Organisationen Geld zu sammeln, um damit konkrete Vorhaben zu realisieren. Dabei können Unterstützer direkt spenden oder sich ein Geschenk (Perk) als Gegenleistung aussuchen.
Wir möchten unsere Kollektion 2017 damit finanzieren, euch gleichzeitig super Deal anbieten und unabhängig von externen Kapitalgebern bleiben.

Q: How does Crowdfunding work? F: Wie funktioniert Crowdfunding?

See section “How you can contribute?” above.

Siehe Abschnitt “Wie du uns helfen kannst?” oben auf dieser Seite.

Let’s be honest: For how many of your clothing pieces you can claim they have been produced fair and organic. We think the time to compromise is over. We want to create fashion without compromises. What’s in for you?

Warum solltest du uns unterstützen?
Immer noch #obenohne? Auf den Punkt.
Hand aufs Herz: Von wie vielen Kleidungsstücken kannst du behaupten, sie mit guten Gewissen zu tragen? Wir finden, die Zeit für Kompromisse ist vorbei. Wir haben uns daher das Ziel gesetzt, Mode zu entwickeln, bei der du keine eingehen musst. Was bedeutet das für dich?





The Deal (Unser Angebot)
With help of the advance orders we can start the product and, at the same time, offer you a big discount. For you, there’s no risk, if the campaign doesn’t succeed, everyone gets their money back!
Durch die Vorbestellungen können wir die Produktion starten und euch gleichzeitig noch ‘nen dicken Rabatt geben. Für euch gibt es dabei kein Risiko. Falls wir das Ziel nicht erreichen, erhalten alle ihr Geld zurück!













Which size do i need and how do i measure right?
Take one of your textiles, where you like the shape. You can then compare the measurements with our sizes.
Chest width: Begin about 2.5 cm (1 inch) below one armpit and measure the length horizontally to the other armpit.
Torso length: Measure the length from the collar vertically to the end of the shirt.
Sleeve length: For a shirt with long sleeves, you can measure the sleeve length. To do this, simply measure the distance between the collar and the end of the sleeve.
 
Welche Größe benötige ich und Wie messe ich richtig?
Nimm dir eins deiner Textilien, bei dem dir der Schnitt gefällt. Die Messungen kannst du dann mit unseren Werten vergleichen.
Brustbreite: Setze das Maßband ca. 2,5 cm unter den Achseln an und lege es möglichst horizontal bis zur anderen Seite. 
Rumpflänge: Um die Rumpflänge zu messen, setzt du das Maßband am äußersten Kragenrand an und misst möglichst senkrecht bis zum Ende des Textils.
Ärmellänge: Bei einem Textil mit langen Ärmeln, kannst du auch die Ärmellänge messen. Setze das Maßband am Kragen des Textiles an und messe bis zum Ende des Ärmels.

Shipping Map (Versandkarte) Production Process (Produktionsablauf)We need at least 25000€ to start the produce for the rest of the collection. This money goes directly to our external service providers who manage the production. If the campaign is successful, we will start the production immediately to ship you perks in the year - except for the coupons, they will be ready directly after the campaign! With every perk you buy you'll get a digital certificate you can print and use as a gift as well.Wir benötigen mindestens 25.000 €, um die Produktion zu starten. Dieses Geld fließt komplett an unsere externen Dienstleister (Nähereien und Stoffproduzenten), die uns bei der Produktion unterstützen. Wenn die Kampagne erfolgreich ist, geben wir die Produktion in Auftrag und werden die Geschenke im nächsten Jahr ausliefern. Die Gutscheine für unseren Online-Shop kommen auch schon direkt nach der Kampagne!
How you can contribute?
You can support us in 4 different ways:

You can donate by clicking the beautiful pink “Back it” button in the upper right and follow the checkout instructions.
You choose a perk on the right side and follow the checkout instructions as well.
You can share this campaign with your friends, family and other nice people who might be interested in this campaign. You can use this short memorable link for sharing: igg.me/at/all-i-sea.
Follow us on Facebook, Instagram, Youtube or join our newsletter list.

Important: To support us, it’s not necessary to have a Paypal account. Everyone with a valid credit card or a Paypal account can back this campaign. Indiegogo uses Paypal as a service provider to process the payments. You will be redirected to the Paypal site but can choose to pay via accout.

Wie du uns helfen kannst?
Du kannst uns auf 4 unterschiedlichen Arten unterstützen:

Du kannst für uns spenden, indem du oben rechts auf  den schönen rosaroten Button “Unterstützen” klickst und dem Bestellvorgang folgst.
Du suchst dir ein Geschenk (Perk) auf der rechten Seite aus und folgst ebenfalls dem Bestellvorgang.
Du kannst deine Freunden, Verwandten und Bekannten im Internet oder persönlich auf unsere Kampagne hinweisen. Wir haben dafür einen Kurzlink erstellt, den man sich besser merken kann: https://igg.me/at/all-i-sea.
Folge uns auf Facebook, Instagram, Youtube oder trage dich in unseren E-Mail-Verteiler ein und bleibe auf dem Laufenden.

Wichtig: Um uns zu unterstützen, braucht ihr keinen Paypal-Account. Jeder mit einer gültigen Kreditkarte oder einem Paypal-Account kann uns unterstützen. Indiegogo nutzt Paypal lediglich als externen Dienstleister für die Verarbeitung der Zahlungen. Ihr werdet zwar auf die Seite von Paypal weitergeleitet, aber könnt auswählen, dass ihr ohne Paypal-Account bezahlen möchtet.
Press (Presse)
Pressematerial (Fotos) (Link)

FAQ
Q: How do I choose my size and Style? F: Wie wähle ich meine Größe aus?
Inside of the perks, you will be able to choose the size and style (if applicable: boys or girls). You can find the exact size for you with the help of our size charts.
Bei den Geschenken auf der rechten Seite gibt es die Möglichkeit, im Bestellprozess die Größe und Style (wenn vorhanden: Damen oder Herren) auszuwählen. Die richtige Größe, kannst du anhand der Größentabellen herausfinden.Q: Where can I get in touch? F: Wie kann ich euch erreichen?You can get in touch via mail at hi@manaliso.com, our Facebook page facebook.com/manaliso or leave a comment on the campaign page.Du kannst uns per Mail an hi@manaliso.com, über unserer Facebook-Seite facebook.com/manaliso oder mit einem Kommentar auf der Kampagnenseite erreichen.Q: What is Crowdfunding? F: Was ist Crowdfunding?Crowdfunding is a possibility for companies and organizations to raise funds for specific purposes. Backers can then either donate or choose from a list of perks.We want to raise money for the production of our 2017 summer’s collection and while offering you a sweet deal to stay independent of external loans or venture capital.Crowdfunding ermöglicht es Unternehmen und Organisationen Geld zu sammeln, um damit konkrete Vorhaben zu realisieren. Dabei können Unterstützer direkt spenden oder sich ein Geschenk (Perk) als Gegenleistung aussuchen.Wir möchten unsere Kollektion 2017 damit finanzieren, euch gleichzeitig super Deal anbieten und unabhängig von externen Kapitalgebern bleiben.Q: How does Crowdfunding work? F: Wie funktioniert Crowdfunding?See section “How you can contribute?” above.Siehe Abschnitt “Wie du uns helfen kannst?” oben auf dieser Seite.

story:
MY STORY

You could say I’ve been following my passion across the country for a long time now, but allow me to explain.

I grew up watching just about every old movie from the 1930s and 1940s, fascinated by the glamorous fashion of Hollywood's Golden Age. By the age of 14, when I was competing in rodeo queen pageants and horse shows, I was sketching my own outfits and costumes with a retro-glamour nod. My mom, who was an amazing seamstress, took my sketches and modified patterns to create my visions. My dad even helped by hand-cutting leather fringe and installing intricate beading. These original designs garnered a lot of positive attention and I sold every piece in my wardrobe.  

At the age of 25, I resurrected my love for fashion design when I started making my own elaborate Halloween costumes and stage wear. I focused on creating flowing, comfortable sundresses for the hot Texas weather as I was touring and singing in Americana bands. Finding high-quality, vibrant fabrics that were comfortable and didn't wrinkle was paramount, and I scoured shops in the garment district in New York to find the perfect textile blends. 

Before long, I was making dresses for my friends and family and started an Etsy shop. Within a matter of months, I was designing and sewing hundreds of dresses fulltime on Etsy for clients all over the world. Now at 37, I have my first bricks-and-mortar shop in my hometown of Boise, Idaho, and have been loving the opportunities the new space has given me. I've had the amazing fortune to work with women of all ages and walks of life to create special gowns for celebratory events and cherished moments. I currently create more than 400 dresses a year for my store and online sales, and I have a vision to expand even more into the bridal and special event space.  That’s where you come in. 

Why This Matters

It's so important to me to create this new capsule collection because it is something greatly missing in the bridal space. Every day, I hear from brides and bridesmaids that “nothing ever fits me” or “I can’t find dresses to satisfy everyone in my bridal party." Most big bridal stores offer dress lines with limited sizing or fabric choices and very often someone is having to squeeze into something frustrating, uncomfortable and too expensive. That shouldn’t be! No woman should ever have to feel excluded simply because of her proportions, age, or preferences. This new line has been percolating in my creative mind for quite some time and I'm excited to finally be able to bring it to you and women like you. Each woman I design for has a different aesthetic and body shape, and these new, flexible designs are the culmination of the feedback I've gotten from my clients over the past several years. There is no such thing as one-size-fits-all. But now, there can be something that is the perfect fit for everyone!

Body-positive empowerment starts with loving the skin you’re in, and I aim to make each gown more comfortable and beautiful than you will ever imagine a special event gown to be. My new offering is a customized capsule collection that allows each client to choose from a variety of necklines, waist options, and skirt styles to fit and flatter her unique body type and shape. You’ll be able to design your perfect gown which will then be made to your measurements. Brides will be able to provide their bridesmaids with an extremely flattering and unique dress that still offers a uniform concept for her dream wedding. This collection is one of a kind—beautiful dresses designed by you, in high quality fabrics with a fit that is customized to your exact measurements. Designed by you, lovingly made for you. 

In addition to raising funds for my new dress line, I will also be contributing portions of your donations to the Miss Amazing Pageant, a grassroots organization that provides opportunities for girls and women with disabilities to build confidence and self-esteem in a supportive environment. Everyone deserves a chance to reach her full potential, and your contributions will serve as a gift to provide stage gowns for the pageant participants. For more information on the Miss Amazing organization, please visit their website: https://missamazing.org/

What You Will Help Me Achieve

This will be the first time I will be able to totally conceptualize a new collection all at once. My new line was borne out of years of creative feedback from my existing clients coupled with a decline in the availability of quality dresses for bridesmaids and special events. I can’t wait to take all of your suggestions and ideas and combine it with my design vision to create something truly one of a kind!

What I Need

You may think that you can’t actually buy time, but here you can!  This new collection has been in development for several seasons, but with the steady stream of dresses I am constantly making, I haven’t had time to stop and create the needed prototypes, samples, and patterns to produce the new dress line.  I work extremely fast, so I am only asking for a short runway with which to get this off the ground!

Marketing is key for any new product and your contributions will help fund the needed photoshoots, SEO, and targeted marketing materials and campaigns to launch the collection.

Fabric, of course. I often utilize existing stock fabric to create prototypes and samples, but your investment in my cause will give me a budget to buy the perfect textiles. 

What You Get

  • Massive thanks and a personal thank-you card
  • Acknowledgement as a contributor on the Rooney Mae website
  • Invitations to special events, private screenings, and runway shows
  • Discounts on your purchase of a Rooney Mae custom gown
  • Gift cards toward a purchase of a gown for yourself
  • Contributions toward a Miss Amazing Pageant Foundation
  • Opportunity to guest-design a gown with Meagan
  • Have a custom gown design named after you which will stay in the public collection forever
  • Join Meagan on a fabric buying trip either virtually or in person (responsible for your own expenses) to choose your ideal fabric and create a custom gown that will be named after you and included in my collections forever!

The Impact

Many online sites including Etsy recently started selling extremely cheap knock-off versions of designer’s fashions for a tiny fraction of the price. This new way of “buying dresses” has hit a lot of US designers hard, myself included. To compete with Chinese manufacturers, one simply cannot pay a seamstress a living wage in the United States. It’s time for me to push back.  Supporting items Made in America is crucial, and I am committed to keeping this standard in my company. I make almost every dress that I’ve sold, or I work closely with US-based designers and seamstresses to create the looks I send out. My new capsule collection, like all of my previous collections, will be 100% Made in the USA. Let’s keep it that way! 

Each time I have launched a small dress collection on Etsy or in store, I’ve sold completely out of the item within the year. I have a classic design aesthetic with a modern/edgy flare and it continues to build in popularity the more designs I come up with. From a dining room table to my downtown boutique, I’ve grown so tremendously in the past five years. I need your help to make it to the next phase!

One of my biggest sources of pride is my reputation for creating new and exciting designs and for making sure my clients are incredibly happy with the looks I create. I work extra hours and extremely hard to give my clients exactly what they’re envisioning and I couldn’t be happier with what I’ve accomplished so far.

Risks & Challenges

Upswings as well as downturns are all too common for small businesses and I’ve weathered plenty of them. Facing down the massive overseas manufacturers is daunting, but I am confident that my quality and commitment to excellent products will prevail with your help. Customers will always have the option to buy the cheaply made, inexpensive products; but I’m determined to give them the option to spend their money in the USA and support a product that is well-made and custom-designed for them.

As always, with more business comes more work! I’ve been running the business solo up to this point and am motivated to bring more talent on board as soon as possible.  This new collection gives me the opportunity to expand in more ways than one and I’m looking forward to tackling the next hurdle.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute,  that doesn't mean you can't help:

Please share my crowdfunding campaign with your friends and family. Help me make some noise!

story:
Meet MYNT

                                  

Introducing the world’s most versatile multi-purpose smart button! You will only need to use this one single device to do everything a smart button or a tracker does. MYNT is the world’s thinnest and most durable track-mote. It can fit anywhere and helps you keeping track of valuables. MYNT’s metal body is resistant against physical impacts and wear-tears. The replaceable battery has a long lifespan of up to one year. It's the perfect companion gadget. 

MYNT has an open SDK kit freely available for other developers, which means that MYNT can be integrated into Tile's and other crowd-GPS networks. New functions will be added to MYNT through simply updating the smartphone app without having to change the hardware. To sum it up, MYNT does everything a smart button does, and MYNT provides the most accurate tracking. Our App User Interface is unique and humanistic, it is available for free on App Store and Google Play. 

With MYNT:

Featured On 

Allways know where everything is:

Features

Out-of-range alarm: never leave your valuables behind

Attach MYNT to your valuables. Your smartphone will alert you if you leave your keys or wallet behind, or your puppy runs away in the park while you are talking to someone.

Out-of-range alarm: never lose your phone

Left your phone on the coffee table? Forgot to take your phone with you when running out of the house? This won’t happen again. MYNT is a bi-directional tracker. It will prevent you from losing your phone thanks to its built-in buzzer. You can configure MYNT to beep if you forget your phone.  In addition, MYNT  can help you find your phone as a reverse tracker. Press and hold the button on your MYNT to make your phone ring. The phone will vibrate and ring even if set to Silent mode. Never has it been so easy to find your phone hiding under the sofa or in your car.

Find phone and other items

Keep track of your purse, keys, and phone around the house.

Locate your car easily

MYNT makes finding your car easier than ever: it saves your parking location and gives you walking directions back to your car.

Take selfies

Want to take a selfie or group photo? Want to take a jump shot? You can use MYNT to remote control your cell phone camera and capture that special moment -- from any angle, at any time. Free your hands and take memorable selfies wherever, whenever -- it's a great alternative to the dreaded selfie stick.

Control your music

If you enjoy listening to music on your phone or tablet, MYNT lets you control your music from anywhere in your house.

Presentation remote

Just install the Mac app and press or double press MYNT's button to move to the next or previous slide in your PowerPoint or Keynote presentations.

Design and manufacturing

We designed MYNT to be an integral part of your key ring, bag, or purse. The thin body allows MYNT to be slipped into your wallet or luggage. MYNT can also be attached to your camera, passport, laptop, pet collar, and pretty much anything you can imagine. You won't even notice it when placed in your wallet. 

MYNT is manufactured using state-of-the-art processes. MYNT's metal body is finished with the same anodizing process as the iPhone 6; the stainless steel used for MYNT is actually processed in the same furnaces as the material used for the iPhone 6.



As thin as a sheet of bubble gum


1/8-inch thick and 2 inches long.(3.5 mm and 55mm, respectively). MYNT fits easily inside any wallet and the stainless steel construction is extremely durable.

Long battery life


Replaceable battery  + long battery + smart battery reminder

MYNT’s standard CR2020 battery lasts up to 1 year. It's smart battery reminder will notify you when your battery starts running low. Each package comes with one replacement battery.

Multi-platform experience

MYNT currently supports iOS, Android, and Mac OS X. The hardware combines seamlessly with the software to provide the best user experience.

The package

It includes one MYNT tag with a standard CR2020 battery pre-installed, one extra battery, one easy to attach strap, and two adhesive pads.

Dimensions

Colors

MYNT comes in four different colors: silver (brushed), black (sand-blasted), gold (mirror), and blue (mirror). If you plan to use MYNT on a key ring, we recommend getting the silver (brushed) or black (sand-blasted) models, which are more scratch-resistant.

CrowdGPS: our global support community (compatible with communities of other tracker brands)

When you report a lost tag with the MYNT app, all MYNT users around the globe can help you. Each phone with the MYNT app installed can detect a tracker within 150 feet. This means you benefit from a network supported by hundreds of thousands of people: CrowdGPS. The MYNT app includes community support features. Once an MYNT is reported lost, the information is passed on to all other MYNT users, and those with the community function enabled will be able to help locate the lost tag if it comes within range of any MYNT user. Once the MYNT app detects a lost item, the whereabouts will be sent to your phone instantly.

Why We Need Your Support

MYNT is ready for production. We can't stand for anything that's not perfect – we designed MYNT to be just 1/8 inch thick, something deemed impossible without sacrificing performance like battery life and alarm volume. 

We are doing an Indiegogo campaign because we believe that you are our best possible early adopters. We'll ship MYNT as soon as the campaign ends.

With your help, we will be able to add more smart functions. We will make connection with Xbox, smart refrigerators, cars, and you name it smart device possible. We need your help so we can constantly improve the functionality of MYNT and release updated versions, which can be easily upgraded over the air. MYNT will evolve into a smart swiss army button that fits your needs in unimaginable ways. With you help, together, we can make MYNT even better.

MYNT Team

Dr. Leo Pang Founder, Stanford PhD, Mechanical Engineering, and MS, Computer Science. Dr. Pang has 14 years entrepreneur and executive management experience in Silicon Valley and China: he is the founder or co-founder of 4 companies, was involved one IPO on NASDAQ and three acquisitions. He led his last company from the startup stage all the way to an acquisition. Dr. Pang holds 31 patents, 25 more pending, and is the author of 65 publications.

Leo Zhu Cofounder, Product Designer. Leo has extensive experience in Product Design with MediaTek, Lenovo, Motorola, RIM, and Samsung Wearable Lab.

Jack Yang Cofounder, Head of Mobile App Development. Jack was the architect of the Baidu PhotoWonder and WonderShot apps, which have hundreds of millions of users.

Ellen Fan Cofounder, Head of Hardware. Formerly with Motorola and Nokia, Ellen has more than 10 years experience with mobile phone mold design and launching new products.

Honghai Su Cofounder, Head of Structural Design. Formerly with Motorola and LG, Honghai has more than 10 years experience in mobile phone mold design and launching new products.

Nick Yang Angel Investor and Adviser, Founder of Lebox Capital, one of the most well-known angel investors in China. Co-founded ChinaRen.com, which was sold to Sohu.com. Founded KongZhong and in two years of operation became the youngest president of a listed company on NASDAQ, before Mark Zuckerberg. University of Michigan, BS in Electrical Engineering, and Stanford University, MS in Electrical Engineering.

How Funds Will Be Used

  • Ensuring the manufacturing quality to be excellent 
  • R&D on additional app functions such as connection with other smart device
  • Improving current functions and fine tuning 
  • Improve MYNT app's user interface 
  • Creating customer support infrastructure 

Key Attributes

• Thin enough to be inserted into wallet and books

• Easily attaches to key rings, bags, and luggage

• Durable, stainless steel construction

• Flat rear surface sticks perfectly to your laptop and passport

• Long battery life and standard user-replaceable battery

• Extended range, up to 45 meters (150 feet) outdoors

Specifications

• Wireless technology: Bluetooth 4.0 LE (BLE)

• Wireless range: up to 150ft

• Waterproofing: IP43 (splash-resistant)

• Dimensions: 0.98 x 2.17 x 0.14 inches / 25 x 55 x 3.5 mm

• Battery life: up to one year (depends on usage)

• Battery type: user replaceable CR2020 lithium button cell (120mAh)

• Supported platforms:

- iOS7 and above 

- Android 4.3 and above (requires Bluetooth 4.0 LE)

- Mac OS X 10.9 and above (for presentation remote)

Celebrities Comments

Jason Wang (Founder of HustlerBox, ReReply, i5labs, BA Economics CEO)

Testimonial video:  This is cool, I actually just got my Tile last week, and (comparing with MYNT) it feels kind of fat. I like that I can actually use it for presentations, I like that I can use it for taking photos. It’s pretty handy, especially the size.

Professor Eli Yablonovitch  (Berkeley Professor, Member of the National Academy of Engineering, the National Academy of Sciences, the American Academy of Arts & Sciences)

I am really amazed with the achievements of the Slightech Engineering team. When they told me they were going to create MYNT with a stainless steel body, I said "don’t do that, use plastic, because solving antenna problems with a metal body is a very challenging and difficult task". Ultimately, when I got the working sample, I was shocked! It's really well crafted -- looks great -- and the antenna works perfectly.

User Testimonial



FAQ (or post a comment and ask your question, we will answer within 24 hours)

BUYING & SHIPPING

When will I receive my MYNT?

Backer's MYNTs will ship by November 2015. You should receive your MYNT before the  Thanksgiving/Christmas holidays. This makes it perfect as a holiday gift for your family and friends.

Where do you ship to?

We ship globally (worldwide).

Is shipping included?

Yes, free shipping within the United States is included for perks $25 and higher. Add $25 at checkout for international shipping. International shipping is free for the "Buy 6 Get 4 Extra" package.  

How do I choose a color?

Look at  the Color Upgrade perk. Basically, you can upgrade your MYNT to your favorite color: choose from Silver, Black, Gold, and Blue. You'll have to buy this perk ($5) as a separate transaction in addition to other perks. Or you can choose the Free Upgrade and use the sharing tools (Facebook, Twitter, and Email) to refer 5 people to the campaign page. This gets you the Color Upgrade for Free -- just keep track of your referrals and show them to us when we ask your color options.

TECHNICAL QUESTIONS

How long does the MYNT battery last?

The MYNT battery lasts up to one year depending on usage

How do I replace the MYNT battery?

There is a slider on the side of MYNT to lock/unlock the battery holder. To replace the battery you need to unlock the battery holder by toggling the plug to the other side. We will have a video on our website that demonstrates "How to replace your battery".

Is MYNT waterproof?

MYNT is rated IP43. In other words, it's splash-resistant.

Waterproof Sleeve 


Does MYNT work with Bluetooth, Bluetooth 4.0 (Low Energy), WiFi?

MYNT supports Bluetooth 4.0 LE, also marketed as Bluetooth Smart.

What Android phones will MYNT work with?

MYNT should work with all Android phones running Android 4.3 or above. It's been fully tested with the following Android devices:

Nexus 5

Samsung Galaxy S3

Samsung Galaxy S5 G900F

Samsung Note 2 N7105

HTC One M7

Xiaomi Note

Xiaomi Redmi

Xiaomi Redmi 2

Smartisan T1

Meizu Blue

Huawei 3C

Huawei Mate 7

No-name tablet with MTK CPU

OnePlus One

Android phones with issues: Samsung Note 3 N9002 (doesn't support firmware upgrade. If you decide to stay with the stock version of the firmware, it's okay)

Do I have to download a Mac OS X app for the presentation remote?

Yes, you need to download the app from our website. Here's the download link: 

http://slightech.sinaapp.com/downloads/mynt-v1.0.dmg

How many MYNTs can be handeled through the App? 

We support up to 8 MYNTs in our app.

How far back to you support ios? Will it work with an iPhone 4 (not the 4s)?

It has to be iPhone 4s or later, since iPhone 4 doesn't support Bluetooth 4.0.

How do you manage “geo-fencing” to have a good mix between “do not forget your keys when you leave the house” AND “it does not ring when you go to the next room”?

We have a feature, called "safe zone". You can set your home or office as safe zone, so you will get a warning when you forget your key when you leave house, but won't ring when you go to the other room.

Will this work without GPS enabled on your phone? I assume the close proximity alerts will still function if Bluetooth is on, but I'm unsure how regular GPS factors in. Would having Bluetooth on and no GPS mean that groupGps is useless?

If you turn the GPS off, all of the functions are still working, just it won't record the location of your item on map. 

What are the limited connections required for his app to function?

Just Bluetooth. 

Could you explain the GroupGPS more clearly for me? Is the Regular GPS in a phone only used for this part? Do other users that use GroupGPS know where your lost item is if you decide to announce something as lost? Is there the potential that someone could use GroupGPS and steal lost items?

They won't know. Their phone will detect the missing MYNT when it's close by, then such info will be sent to our server, and we will pass it to you. 

Is there a way to allow certain users (one's you deem as friends potentially) to help get alerts about your specific missing item?

Yes, we are working on this feature - to allow all people or certain people to get alerts.

Can you tell me the range of the MYNT GPS or Bluetooth range? It showed that you can track you back to your parked car but wanted to know how far you can be.

The MYNT Bluetooth range is about 150 feet in open space, but when it's blocked by metal, it's short. It uses GPS on your smart phone to record the last lost signal location. So, when you have MYNT in your car, once you leave your car, the MYNT app in your smartphone will record your car parking location. Later on you can check it on the map of MYNT app to find your car.

What is the “Out of range” distance (left keys on restaurant table) before the “out of range alarm” goes off on my iPhone? Also, how will this lead me back to the lost item which is attached to MYNT? (GPS function )

"Out of range" mean the Bluetooth loses signal. This can be 30 feet to 150 feet depending the obstacles between MYNT and your smartphone. 

One you get an alarm, you can first look at the lost location from the map in the MYNT app. Once you get closer to your lost item location, MYNT will automatically connect to your smartphone again. Then you can get even closer to your lost item by looking at the signal of the Bluetooth in the MYNT app. You can also let MYT buzz and flash from that MYNT app, that will help you eventually find your lost item.

Please let us know if you have any questions, comments/suggestions or ideas!

Email us at Support@Slightech.com

Please note that our team will try as hard as possible to answer any and all questions and comments that are left on the comments page but the easiest way to get immediate assistance is to email our Support Team at Support@Slightech.com

Please like us on Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/Slightechmynt

Follow us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/slightech

Distribution, retail, and partnership inquiries: please email us at Partner@Slightech.com

Media inquiries: please email us at Media@Slightech.com

story_txt:
Meet MYNT

                                  Introducing the world’s most versatile multi-purpose smart button! You will only need to use this one single device to do everything a smart button or a tracker does. MYNT is the world’s thinnest and most durable track-mote. It can fit anywhere and helps you keeping track of valuables. MYNT’s metal body is resistant against physical impacts and wear-tears. The replaceable battery has a long lifespan of up to one year. It's the perfect companion gadget. MYNT has an open SDK kit freely available for other developers, which means that MYNT can be integrated into Tile's and other crowd-GPS networks. New functions will be added to MYNT through simply updating the smartphone app without having to change the hardware. To sum it up, MYNT does everything a smart button does, and MYNT provides the most accurate tracking. Our App User Interface is unique and humanistic, it is available for free on App Store and Google Play. With MYNT:
Featured On Allways know where everything is:

Features


Out-of-range alarm: never leave your valuables behindAttach MYNT to your valuables. Your smartphone will alert you if you leave your keys or wallet behind, or your puppy runs away in the park while you are talking to someone.
Out-of-range alarm: never lose your phone
Left your phone on the coffee table? Forgot to take your phone with you when running out of the house? This won’t happen again. MYNT is a bi-directional tracker. It will prevent you from losing your phone thanks to its built-in buzzer. You can configure MYNT to beep if you forget your phone.  In addition, MYNT  can help you find your phone as a reverse tracker. Press and hold the button on your MYNT to make your phone ring. The phone will vibrate and ring even if set to Silent mode. Never has it been so easy to find your phone hiding under the sofa or in your car.
Find phone and other items
Keep track of your purse, keys, and phone around the house.

Locate your car easily

MYNT makes finding your car easier than ever: it saves your parking location and gives you walking directions back to your car.Take selfies
Want to take a selfie or group photo? Want to take a jump shot? You can use MYNT to remote control your cell phone camera and capture that special moment -- from any angle, at any time. Free your hands and take memorable selfies wherever, whenever -- it's a great alternative to the dreaded selfie stick.

Control your musicIf you enjoy listening to music on your phone or tablet, MYNT lets you control your music from anywhere in your house.Presentation remote

Just install the Mac app and press or double press MYNT's button to move to the next or previous slide in your PowerPoint or Keynote presentations.



Design and manufacturing
We designed MYNT to be an integral part of your key ring, bag, or purse. The thin body allows MYNT to be slipped into your wallet or luggage. MYNT can also be attached to your camera, passport, laptop, pet collar, and pretty much anything you can imagine. You won't even notice it when placed in your wallet. MYNT is manufactured using state-of-the-art processes. MYNT's metal body is finished with the same anodizing process as the iPhone 6; the stainless steel used for MYNT is actually processed in the same furnaces as the material used for the iPhone 6.


As thin as a sheet of bubble gum

1/8-inch thick and 2 inches long.(3.5 mm and 55mm, respectively). MYNT fits easily inside any wallet and the stainless steel construction is extremely durable.
Long battery life

Replaceable battery  + long battery + smart battery reminder
MYNT’s standard CR2020 battery lasts up to 1 year. It's smart battery reminder will notify you when your battery starts running low. Each package comes with one replacement battery.
Multi-platform experience



MYNT currently supports iOS, Android, and Mac OS X. The hardware combines seamlessly with the software to provide the best user experience.
The package
It includes one MYNT tag with a standard CR2020 battery pre-installed, one extra battery, one easy to attach strap, and two adhesive pads.

Dimensions




Colors
MYNT comes in four different colors: silver (brushed), black (sand-blasted), gold (mirror), and blue (mirror). If you plan to use MYNT on a key ring, we recommend getting the silver (brushed) or black (sand-blasted) models, which are more scratch-resistant.

CrowdGPS: our global support community (compatible with communities of other tracker brands)



When you report a lost tag with the MYNT app, all MYNT users around the globe can help you. Each phone with the MYNT app installed can detect a tracker within 150 feet. This means you benefit from a network supported by hundreds of thousands of people: CrowdGPS. The MYNT app includes community support features. Once an MYNT is reported lost, the information is passed on to all other MYNT users, and those with the community function enabled will be able to help locate the lost tag if it comes within range of any MYNT user. Once the MYNT app detects a lost item, the whereabouts will be sent to your phone instantly.Why We Need Your SupportMYNT is ready for production. We can't stand for anything that's not perfect – we designed MYNT to be just 1/8 inch thick, something deemed impossible without sacrificing performance like battery life and alarm volume. We are doing an Indiegogo campaign because we believe that you are our best possible early adopters. We'll ship MYNT as soon as the campaign ends.With your help, we will be able to add more smart functions. We will make connection with Xbox, smart refrigerators, cars, and you name it smart device possible. We need your help so we can constantly improve the functionality of MYNT and release updated versions, which can be easily upgraded over the air. MYNT will evolve into a smart swiss army button that fits your needs in unimaginable ways. With you help, together, we can make MYNT even better.
MYNT TeamDr. Leo Pang Founder, Stanford PhD, Mechanical Engineering, and MS, Computer Science. Dr. Pang has 14 years entrepreneur and executive management experience in Silicon Valley and China: he is the founder or co-founder of 4 companies, was involved one IPO on NASDAQ and three acquisitions. He led his last company from the startup stage all the way to an acquisition. Dr. Pang holds 31 patents, 25 more pending, and is the author of 65 publications.
Leo Zhu Cofounder, Product Designer. Leo has extensive experience in Product Design with MediaTek, Lenovo, Motorola, RIM, and Samsung Wearable Lab.
Jack Yang Cofounder, Head of Mobile App Development. Jack was the architect of the Baidu PhotoWonder and WonderShot apps, which have hundreds of millions of users.
Ellen Fan Cofounder, Head of Hardware. Formerly with Motorola and Nokia, Ellen has more than 10 years experience with mobile phone mold design and launching new products.
Honghai Su Cofounder, Head of Structural Design. Formerly with Motorola and LG, Honghai has more than 10 years experience in mobile phone mold design and launching new products.
Nick Yang Angel Investor and Adviser, Founder of Lebox Capital, one of the most well-known angel investors in China. Co-founded ChinaRen.com, which was sold to Sohu.com. Founded KongZhong and in two years of operation became the youngest president of a listed company on NASDAQ, before Mark Zuckerberg. University of Michigan, BS in Electrical Engineering, and Stanford University, MS in Electrical Engineering.How Funds Will Be Used
Ensuring the manufacturing quality to be excellent 
R&D on additional app functions such as connection with other smart device
Improving current functions and fine tuning 
Improve MYNT app's user interface 
Creating customer support infrastructure 

Key Attributes
• Thin enough to be inserted into wallet and books
• Easily attaches to key rings, bags, and luggage
• Durable, stainless steel construction
• Flat rear surface sticks perfectly to your laptop and passport
• Long battery life and standard user-replaceable battery
• Extended range, up to 45 meters (150 feet) outdoors
Specifications
• Wireless technology: Bluetooth 4.0 LE (BLE)
• Wireless range: up to 150ft
• Waterproofing: IP43 (splash-resistant)
• Dimensions: 0.98 x 2.17 x 0.14 inches / 25 x 55 x 3.5 mm
• Battery life: up to one year (depends on usage)
• Battery type: user replaceable CR2020 lithium button cell (120mAh)
• Supported platforms:
- iOS7 and above 
- Android 4.3 and above (requires Bluetooth 4.0 LE)
- Mac OS X 10.9 and above (for presentation remote)

story:
Hello and welcome to the latest project by Pegasus Watches Venezia. We aim to redefine the vintage watch concept. The brand creates high-end unique and unrepeatable timepieces, classic and elegant pieces of history for the present and the future never made obsolete by new technology. In fact, this watch was designed to be an heirloom to be passed down to the next generation.

FIRST AGED ITALY TIMEPIECES

We are launching the first "Aged in Italy" watch, 100% handcrafted by skilled artisanswith absolute accuracy for every detail according to the traditional features of the twentieth century. We aim to manufacture brand new watches that look aged from the dial details to the packaging. The aging process requires great skill and is made possible by the experience of the best Italian craftsmen. Our mission is to revolutionize the market for vintage watches by offering a completely new product, more reliable and affordable than old watches. Sounds interesting? So keep reading

We cooperate with some of the most experienced watch manufacturers, who have produced luxury watches for notorious brands. With their support we have achieved an extremely high quality product.
The assembly process, for instance, is done by expert technicians in a dust free environment. 

At the end of the assembly process the cases are transferred to the quality control department. Only the watches that meet the specifications can pass this stage since no mistake is tolerated.

TECHNICAL INFO

CASE: 316L stainless steel, Ø42mm

MOVEMENT: Automatic 9015 Miyota (Citizen) made in Japan

GLASS: Domed sapphire glass

WATER RESISTANT: 20ATM (200 meters)

LUME: Swiss Superluminova®

BEZEL: Unidirectional rotatable 120-minute graduated bezel

STRAP: Handcrafted Italian Leather

Pegasus Venezia Mercurio & Nettuno is made of 316L stainless steel, offering high resistance and reliability. 316L Stainless Steel Marine grade stainless, or SAE 316 stainless steel, is a molybdenum-alloyed steel and the steel commonly used in marine environments because of its greater resistance to pitting corrosion if compared with other grades of steel. 

Sapphire glass is created by crystallizing corundum, or aluminum oxide, at temperatures of 4000° F and then by molding the mixture into clear disks. These disks are then machined to the proper crystal size, polished, and perfectly fit to the watch case.

In fact, it has a hardness of 9 on the Mohs scale that ranges from 1 to 10, and is surpassed in hardness only by diamond. The major advantages of sapphire and the drawbacks of mineral crystals are summed up in the table above. 

Together, Nemoto & Co. Ltd. and RC TRITEC Ltd. set up a joint venture which is the licensed manufacturer and exclusive distributors for Swiss Super-LumiNova®  photoluminescent pigments. We applied pigments C1 or C3 (for cream dial only) to every single watch.

The Calibre 9015 used in the Nettuno and Mercurio watches is an accurate high-spec, Japan-made automatic movement (42-hour power reserve).

The movement has been compared to the ETA2824 used by many Swiss luxury brands. 

Stones or jewels were developed in watches to reduce friction at the points of heaviest wear so that a watch can function for longer periods. To combat metal-on-metal wear watchmakers needed to find a substance that was harder than metal and so began the use of jewels within watches. Rubies are used because they have a hardness on the mohs scale similar to diamonds.

Leather processing is an ancient procedure dating back to prehistoric times when leather was used for human protection from weathering. The tanning process consists of several stages:

Preservation: after being flayed, leather is treated with salt and then dried so that as much water as possible is eliminated in order to protect it from the attack of bacteria and microorganisms.

Preparation to tanning through rehydratation: that is the reacquisition of the water lost in the previous stage; liming and further finishing operations.

Tanning: chemical process that prevents water from putrefying by placing it in wooden barrels that turn around.

Post Tanning: used for improving the appearance of leather

All the types of leather used are from Veneto and Tuscany, two well known Italian tannery districts. Therefore, thanks to the expertise of our local and skilled artisans we provide soft, vintage and durable straps.

The hides we use are tanned according to traditional, natural methods, without colourings, chrome, formaldehyde and pentachlorophenol and they are processed in compliance with current laws.

WHICH DESIGNS CAN I CHOOSE?

All combinations are possible, here is a reference chart. All backers will be free to choose the designs by filling a survey that will be sent out once our project ends.

 

Pegasus Venezia wooden boxes and packaging have a unique flavor that goes beyond standard shapes and manufacturing solutions. Our design, in fact, is inspired by tradition.

For the production of our boxes we rely on a craft company that was established in the heart of the "Chair District" in Friuli, a region where woodworking is not only part of local history and culture but also represents an international trademark associated with the excellence of “Made in Italy” products. With over 40 years of woodworking experience they have become partner of many leading wine and spirit producers, combining of craftsmanship, technology and special attention to design.

What are the advantages associated with silicone straps? There are several reasons to wear them. As a matter of facts, silicone is a light weight, non-absorbent, rubber-like material. It doesn’t matter if you get your watch wet since silicone doesn’t absorb liquid, you’ll have no issues wiping it right off. 

This material has amazing properties thanks to a particular process called vulcanization that makes the rubber strong, resistant but also elastic. That’s why we offer both leather and silicone straps. We want you to wear your Pegasus Nettuno and Mercurio on every occasion.

The traditional distribution channel is based on different steps, involving extra costs for the final customer. We do things in a different way: we cut this chain. Our prices derive just from the fine components we use for our watches.

Our customers only pay for the quality of the watch and not for all the costs related to distribution such as agent fees and traditional retail markups. The chart below provides an insight into our costs.

 

We have already produced and approved working prototypes of the Mercurio and Nettuno and we are ready to go ahead with production. 
As soon as we place the order with our suppliers, they will start manufacturing and assembling the timepieces. The final product will then be shipped to us for final inspection and testing. After the end of the campaign, we will provide constant updates on the status of production. We will ship all watches by the end of April 2017. 

FAQ

The movement: When do I need to change the battery? 
NEVER! The watch has a mechanical movement that is powered by you.

The movement: Why did you decide on Japanese movements for the Pegasus Nettuno and Mercurio collection? 
Well, the Japanese movements are just as reliable as any ETA movement - if not even more reliable! If we did use an ETA movement the watch would have almost doubled the final cost of the product. 

How can I add something to my pledge? 
If you find yourself wishing you would have gotten 2 or more watches its very easy to add a watch to your order. All you will need to do is “edit your pledge.” This option will allow you to select the pledge you prefer. Remember that you will choose your watches at the end of the campaign when a survey will be sent.

When will my card be charged? 
If you’re new to Kickstarter this might be confusing to you but here on KS all cards will be charged as soon as the campaign has been officially funded and the time has ran out on the campaign. You should see a charge on your account 3-5 days after the campaign ends

How long will my watch be warranted? 
We will work with all customers case by case but all watch movements will be insured for up to a year after the campaign ends. We cannot warrant customers who break their watches due to wear and tear.

Do all backers benefit from Stretch Goals? 
Absolutely. It doesn't matter if you were the first or the last to back our project, all backers qualify for the stretch goals.

When can I select the watch of choice? 
We will be sending out our official survey once our project ends. You will then be able to select your watch and give us your correct shipping instructions.

Who do you use for shipping international orders? 
We use DHL Express for all international and domestic shipments (excluding PO Box addresses).

What parts of the watch are actually luminescent? 
The indexes and hour and minute hands.

story:
Welcome to our Crowdfunding Page!

I’m excited to introduce the first and only pet carrier that collapses to the size of a wristlet. With patent pending design and multi features, it’s the essential pet carrier for small companions living the city life.

You may be thinking there are a ton of carriers already out there. And you are right. Many are available - but they are usually clunky, cumbersome and less than chic. As a result many default  to creating a makeshift carrier out of the tote or bag they are already carrying. This DIY hack leaves a lot to be desired, as the bags are unsafe for your fur baby, don't collapse and they don't have room for all the essentials and your fur baby. So you are usually left with two equally unappealing choices: Leave your furry BFF at home or suck all of the fun and spontaneity out of your time out & about by planning the day in excruciating detail to accommodate a less than agile pet carrier. #worstdayever

This is not how things should be when you share your life with the best pooch ever to scamper around on four little legs. Crap carriers should not hinder your ability to go out, live your life, and have an adventure with your faithful companion by your side.

That's why I made it my mission to create a carrier that is stylish & functional. Living in an active, spontaneous city requires going with the flow of where the day can take you - and having a carrier to keep your companion safe and by your side makes running around the city more fun & enjoyable. This is the perfect small dog carrier for the city denizen always on the go and taking on the town.

All-in-One Carrier

There is space for everything you need while out & about, along with features that make the journey more pleasant for pup and human.

 

                                 

We  have a logo baseball cap for the people that don't need the carrier but want to show their support for our brand.

Don’t need anything? It’s ok we understand-you can click 'back it' to donate as little as $5 for the people that just want to help this come to life . We need your support and we thank you for your efforts.

How we will use the funds

Your generous funding will empower us to move forward with realizing and further improving the product to make it available to more loving pet parents. We currently need $30,000 to make this happen, which will cover the costs of further development, manufacturing and production, marketing and other start-up expenses.

Because we are committed to continuous improvement to provide the best possible solutions, we will be using the funding to:

  • Finalize the first product version
  • Create additional complimentary products and services
  • Expand retail solutions

And Most Importantly - THANK YOU!

The last few months of diligently working hard to bring our vision to life in this campaign have been worth it due to all of our generous supporters. Please know your efforts -  even the smallest, don’t go unnoticed or unappreciated.  We will continue to keep you posted on what your donation helped us achieve.

story:
Short Summary

  Wrist watch printed using FFF technology (Fused Filament Fabrication) on a 3D printer. Join the campaign and support the 3D printed watches project.

.

 Jelwek Watch is a project of 3D printed watches fabricated with the wood-like material - the addition of the wood powder to polylactide. Marvelous idea brought to reality.


The birth of Jelwek Watch

 The project was born in the head of the young engineer, the student of Rzeszow University of Technology, when he realized that the stylish and yet extraordinary watch was missing on the market. Thanks to the cooperation with the Jelwek company his project could have been brought to reality. It was entirely designed and tested using CAD software.

 

 The watches combine the style, elegance and modern design. It’s a completely  new view on the passing time. Jelwek Watch is a mix of reliable mechanism made in Japan, a hint of creative design and the precise assembly. It weights only 44 grams. It’s a watch for people who wants to stay who they are and also distinguish themselves with a remarkable detail.


Production:

Time needed for the production of one watch is divided to:

- 3h – printing the parts (FFF technology)

- 2h – complete assembly

Rest is a joy of using it.       

                                                     Our action plan: 



What We Need & What You Get

We need Your support to get to success & We give You an amazing wrist watch.

Risks & Challenges

From the beggining of our project we wanted to minimize the risk. Only thing to worry about is the number of the watches that we can produce. Don't worry,  it's only our concern.


Other Ways You Can Help

 Tell Your friends about those watches available at Your fingertips. Write to us about Your ideas and propositions about the Jelwek Watch.

 Be a part of our campaign, make this eco-friendly watch Your watch. Every one who will contribute to the realisation of our idea will be rewarded. Jelwek Watch is a 3D printed future. Join our 3D printed world today. Share our campaign with Your friends.


They had written about our project in: 

http://www.3ders.org/articles/20141214-jelwek-launches-3d-printed-wood-filament-watch-collection.html

http://3dprintingindustry.com/2014/12/15/3d-printed-wood-like-jelwek-watch/

http://3dprint.com/30947/jelwek-wood-3d-printed-watch/

http://3druck.com/objects/jelwek-watch-3d-gedruckte-armbanduhr-aus-holz-1327601/

http://centrumdruku3d.pl/drewniane-zegarki-jelw...

From today we start sending watches! Best Regards Jelwek fans.

story:
Wallgers Mini T: luxury RFID wallets with style and smart tracking for theft and loss protection of your Phone and Wallet.


If you don't want to leave your wallet or phone behind, or have them or your credit card information stolen, the MiNi T is for you.

What about:

  • Trackers: cost up to $30, bulky, inside wallet = muffled alert sound, falls out easily, not easy to replace battery  
  • Wallets with trackers: no special cut out slots, not premium leather or handcrafted, dull styles, tracker inside wallet = muffled alert sound, tracker is not removeable for use in other wallets

  • fits inside to reduce bulk when the MiNi T is closed
  • alarm sound is not muffled
  • reception is not blocked by RFID shields

  • can be switched for left or right hand use
  • battery can be replaced easily
  • can be used in other wallets

Handcrafted with premium scratch resistant leather (magnified on right) used in high end $200 Bally or MCM wallets to last for years of use.

This MiNi T wallet has been used for over 6 months and still looks new!

RFID shields protect credit / ID cards from electronic theft  

Sporty - quick swipe card slots for 1 handed card access

Smart tracking device fits inside either left or right quick swipe card slot to reduce bulk

Minimal size and bulk

Expandable - 4 card slots + 2 hidden pockets for up to 8 cards / ID and cash

The smart tracking device fits into both quick swipe slots to stay thin.

Smart tracking device and app (Android & iOS)

  • Phone and wallet both alarm when separated (20 to 30 feet)
  • App displays last location on Google Map
  • App's Find wallet button turns on the wallet's alarm when nearby
  • Device battery lasts 3 to 6 months and is user replaceable
  • Bluetooth technology with Android & Apple apps
  • Fits into left or right quick swipe card slot (custom cutout)
  • Device can also fit into standard credit card slot in regular wallets

Details and Dimensions

  • Each slot and pocket holds more than just a single card
  • Lightweight 1.8 ounces (51 grams)
  • Minimal size 3.25 x 4.25 inches (8.25 x 11 cm) when folded 
  • No bulge 1/4 Inch (7 mm) thick when folded (empty)
  • Thin as 3 credit cards
  • Holds up to 8 credit cards and ID's 

Who is Wallgers?

Wallgers is part of the as it is USA group.  We started out in 2015 as a new line of fashionable and functional wallets, and have gotten to the point where we can be an independent entity.  Wallgers has already delivered 2 previous campaigns on time.   We also have the Vbag 5-in-1 Convertible Backpack System In Demand with $16,473 on Indiegogo right now. 

For $38 Secret Perk Vbag, click here.



The first Wallgers had a built-in phone charger for Android and Apple devices.


It was in the Best Wallet Guide

 

Like the original Wallgers, the MiNi T is a high quality handcrafted leather wallet that combines fashion and function. 

What RFID Wallets Do

All credit cards and most ID cards will have embedded RFID chips which store your personal information. Unfortunately they are easy to steal by thieves walking around with scanners. MiNi T wallets have lightweight German designed RFID firewalls to keep your information shielded and protected.

Our philosophy is to use the best materials and hire the best shops to produce (not manufacture) accessories that look good, perform better, and last longer. For quality assurance, all MiNi T wallets will be inspected in the USA before shipping. Should your MiNi T wallet need repair or replacement within the first year, it will be taken care of at no charge. 

What we will use the funds for 

The Wallgers MiNi T leather wallets will be handcrafted and hand fitted with RFID shields for us by a small shop in Asia. We have already completed the design process and have two actual testing samples.  The funds raised here will go straight into materials and production costs, along with the shipping to backers.

Risks and challenges

Wallgers is focused on handcrafted fashion accessories with the best materials and craftsmanship. Our lines of designer fashion bags can be found in premier boutiques in Asia, Europe, USA; even the Hong Kong Airport! They are also online at opensky.com and our own website.

Wallgers is our new line of fashionable and functional wallets and will have the same detail and focus on craftsmanship, design, and quality materials. Having worked with artisans in Asia to make the original Wallgers, we have no problems sourcing and delivering the MiNi T wallets ON TIME.

The goal is $1600 because we believe in quality over quantity. Of course, should you Indiegogo members want more, we are capable of making as many as needed without sacrificing quality control.
