Wallets with trackers: no special cut out slots, not premium leather or handcrafted, dull styles, tracker inside wallet = muffled alert sound, tracker is not removeable for use in other wallets








fits inside to reduce bulk when the MiNi T is closed

alarm sound is not muffled
reception is not blocked by RFID shields




can be switched for left or right hand use
battery can be replaced easily
can be used in other wallets




Handcrafted with premium scratch resistant leather (magnified on right) used in high end $200 Bally or MCM wallets to last for years of use.



This MiNi T wallet has been used for over 6 months and still looks new!


RFID shields protect credit / ID cards from electronic theft  

Sporty - quick swipe card slots for 1 handed card access

Smart tracking device fits inside either left or right quick swipe card slot to reduce bulk







Minimal size and bulk

Expandable - 4 card slots + 2 hidden pockets for up to 8 cards / ID and cash




The smart tracking device fits into both quick swipe slots to stay thin.
Smart tracking device and app (Android & iOS)




Phone and wallet both alarm when separated (20 to 30 feet)

App displays last location on Google Map

App's Find wallet button turns on the wallet's alarm when nearby

Device battery lasts 3 to 6 months and is user replaceable
Bluetooth technology with Android & Apple apps
Fits into left or right quick swipe card slot (custom cutout)
Device can also fit into standard credit card slot in regular wallets





Details and Dimensions



Each slot and pocket holds more than just a single card


Lightweight 1.8 ounces (51 grams)


Minimal size 3.25 x 4.25 inches (8.25 x 11 cm) when folded 


No bulge 1/4 Inch (7 mm) thick when folded (empty)


Thin as 3 credit cards


Holds up to 8 credit cards and ID's 






Who is Wallgers?Wallgers is part of the as it is USA group.  We started out in 2015 as a new line of fashionable and functional wallets, and have gotten to the point where we can be an independent entity.  Wallgers has already delivered 2 previous campaigns on time.   We also have the Vbag 5-in-1 Convertible Backpack System In Demand with $16,473 on Indiegogo right now.  For $38 Secret Perk Vbag, click here.


The first Wallgers had a built-in phone charger for Android and Apple devices.



It was in the Best Wallet Guide
 

Like the original Wallgers, the MiNi T is a high quality handcrafted leather wallet that combines fashion and function. What RFID Wallets DoAll credit cards and most ID cards will have embedded RFID chips which store your personal information. Unfortunately they are easy to steal by thieves walking around with scanners. MiNi T wallets have lightweight German designed RFID firewalls to keep your information shielded and protected.Our philosophy is to use the best materials and hire the best shops to produce (not manufacture) accessories that look good, perform better, and last longer. For quality assurance, all MiNi T wallets will be inspected in the USA before shipping. Should your MiNi T wallet need repair or replacement within the first year, it will be taken care of at no charge. What we will use the funds for The Wallgers MiNi T leather wallets will be handcrafted and hand fitted with RFID shields for us by a small shop in Asia. We have already completed the design process and have two actual testing samples.  The funds raised here will go straight into materials and production costs, along with the shipping to backers.Risks and challengesWallgers is focused on handcrafted fashion accessories with the best materials and craftsmanship. Our lines of designer fashion bags can be found in premier boutiques in Asia, Europe, USA; even the Hong Kong Airport! They are also online at opensky.com and our own website.Wallgers is our new line of fashionable and functional wallets and will have the same detail and focus on craftsmanship, design, and quality materials. Having worked with artisans in Asia to make the original Wallgers, we have no problems sourcing and delivering the MiNi T wallets ON TIME.The goal is $1600 because we believe in quality over quantity. Of course, should you Indiegogo members want more, we are capable of making as many as needed without sacrificing quality control.

story:
Untitled Document


INTRO

Hi there! We’re Tiemen and Joey and we are Berserkers.
Be-WHAT? Berserkers!
We have developed a clothing and lifestyle brand inspired by the Nordic mythology of ancient warriors. With a modern twist of course.

It all started with a trip Tiemen took to Iceland. When hiking over there he got inspired by the tales of the elite Nordic warriors called “Berserkers”. They would run into battle wearing nothing but warpaint and bear skins.

Hearing their heroic stories made him create a unique fitness/health guide. A guide that will help people maximize their inner strength. The guide consists of a series of training schedules based solely on a person’s body weight. With exercises that can be done at home, or anywhere you want, at any given time. You don’t need expensive equipment or year long gym memberships. Neat, huh?

Now. What to wear when working out? Or after the work out, when preparing for a party? Not bearskins obviously. Hell no!
How about an exclusive Berserkers t-shirt? Hell yes!
Our tees can be worn both for working out and going out. They will make you look and feel your very best.


OUR COLLECTION

See anything you like?
Want one from the
- A series --> Check out the Loki & Odin Packs
- B series --> Check out the Freyja & Thor Packs


OUR PHILOSOPHY

Berserkers were brave Norse warriors. Allegedly, they were highly skilled, strong, gifted men who fearlessly went into battle with no armor other than animal skins. Hence their name. The word “Berserker” literally translates into “bear-shirt”. They were enthusiastic, over-confident fighters prone to heroic sacrifices. And, more importantly, they never, ever retreated.

We are the modern Berserkers, proud descendants of our fierce forefathers. We want to revive the legend and awake your inner warrior.

We live life to the fullest. We know what we want and are not afraid to go after it.
We’re healthy. We work out. We take pride in how we look and the way we live our lives.

We love life. We know how to enjoy life. We don’t dwell on the past, nor worry about the future. We live now.

We’re in fashion. We’re sophisticated, yet a little rough around the edges.
When we go out the door, we always do it in style.

We are not crazy. We’re dead serious. 
We are who you want to be.

Let us help shape your life story.
Do you have what it takes?

Be A Berserker – Live like you mean it




WHAT ARE WE OFFERING?

Collection: Spring 2014
Sizes: XS - S - M - L - XL 
Fabrics: Organic cotton - Cotton - Polyester 
Washing Instructions: 30°C Machine Wash

Size charts

Men

Continental 21
Continental 23
Stanley Leads

Women

Stella Parades
Stella Whistles
Stella Desires
Stella Flies
Stella Dreams
Stella Loves
Stella Loves Vintage

When pledging to our project you do not only help our business come to life, you get our merchandise at a lower price than the recommended retail price.

A pledge of:

€ 10 = signed postcard + e-fitness guide preview + sticker
€ 25 = 1 standard tee (= from the A series)
€ 35 = 1 premium tee (= from the B series)
€ 45 = 2 standard tees (= from the A series)
€ 65 = 2 premium tees (= from the B series)

Special business pack - € 990

4 tee types = 2 standard ones + 2 premium ones
15 tees per type = 60 tees in total
Size choice is free.

Don't forget to send us an e-mail at hello@berserkers.be to tell us your name, the tee number(s) and the size(s) you'd like.

Shipping costs are not included. Please add € 6 for Belgium and € 9 for Europe and the rest of the world.

Timeline

Production starts: March 2014
Shipping: May 2014


WHY WE NEED YOUR HELP

100 % of Indiegogo funds will cover all the startup costs which include, but are not limited to:

+ First purchase orders of all blanks.
+ Production of all items.
+ Shipping of the items to customers/backers .
+ Further development of www.berserkers.be. All future purchases will take place on a new version of this website.
+ Marketing our brand.


I'VE NEVER HEARD OF INDIEGOGO.
WHAT IS IT?

Indiegogo is a platform for companies to offer rewards in return for pledges (investments) into new/existing products. It works really well when companies such as ourselves are launching a clothing collection.


WHY IS BERSERKERS USING INDIEGOGO?


We are using Indiegogo to fund the release of our first ever t-shirt collection and be able to produce it in Belgium. We are looking for your support and investment in return for this collection at a lower price than the recommended retail price in euros.


RISKS AND CHALLENGES

EXPERIENCE

We’ve got years of experience in the fitness world and are therefore very confident when it comes to our fitness guide.
We’ve also designed t-shirts before, but this is our most ambitious and largest clothing project yet. We are convinced, however, that our endless passion and creativity will take us right where we want to be.

MASSIVE DEMAND

There is a chance that we have much more demand than we expected. This is good, because it'll help drive down costs and allow us to offer the stock at lower cost, but many Indiegogo campaigns in the past have struggled to keep up with responses. We have a commitment to reply to our supporters within 24 hours. Accordingly, the team has committed to investing all the time necessary to make this happen.


PAYMENT OPTIONS

No Paypal? No problem!
You can click the Paypal option and pay using your credit card (VISA/MasterCard), without having a Paypal account.If you're still having trouble paying, then contact us at hello@berserkers.be.
I'm sure we'll be able to work something out.

story:
Be a huge part of the RedRum Zombie history!

We are RedRum Zombie Clothing, a clothing company from Mexico and this is a part of our history:

This brand was born on october of 2012, with us expecting to launch the first designs that same month, unfortunately due to some economic issues, we couldn't make it until august of 2013.

Since then, we've been not as busy as we wanted but we've had received orders from the United States, Brazil, Australia and of course Mexico, most of our orders have been placed thanks to our good friend and model Raziel Corangues, thank you so much buddy! And also we've been working for this new season, but, again, we've been struggling to release this new stuff but money is kind of a bitch and doesn't want to be with us haha. that's why we're making this campaign, we want YOU to help us fund our new season, we have some cool packages for you, so, feel free to check them out and grab what you like!

This campaign means a LOT to us, since clothing and design is our passion and we want to give that to people, also this campaign will help us big time to properly construct the future of RedRum Zombie Clothing.


You can follow us here:

Facebook: RedRum Zombie Clothing

Twitter: RedRumZombie

Instagram: Instagram


Other Ways You Can Help

  • Tell your friends about our campaign, share the link to our Indiegogo page!
  • Share on twitter, Facebook and Instagram!


FAQs

  • What sizes are available for the shirts & where do I pick?
    Standard sizes of S-XL will be available. Prior to shipment we'll send you an email and you'll be able to choose your size.
  • When will my stuff ship?
    • It really depends, if we reach our goal, the shipment will be within the next month after the end of the campaign because we'll receive the money within 15 business days, if we don't reach it, you'll be notified when the items are ready.
  • How do I pay for the international or extra shipping?
    After clicking "Contribute Now" and selecting your package you can increase the contribution amount in the field above by $10 or more.
  • I forgot to pay $10 or more for the international or extra shipping!
    No problem, just click "Contribute Now"  on the SHIPPING package. Please make sure you make this contribution under the same email address as the original.

Thank you all very much, each and everyone one of you are amazing!


- César Pérez (CEO - Founder) and the RedRum Zombie Clothing team.

story:
Bonjour,

Pour les femmes qui perdent leurs cheveux suite aux traitement chimio

Une belle perruque, confortable et en vrais cheveux, faite à la main, comme les perruques de cinéma et à un prix abordable, voilà ce à quoi j'ai travaillé pendant 4 ans.

Aujourd'hui , la phase de mise en marché demande des moyens que je n'ai plus.

je sollicite l'aide....

Ghislaine Sant, founder, 45 years of hairdressing experience. 10 of which, on film sets. I wanted to develop an ideal wig for women who have lost their hair due to chemo-therapy.

je m'appelle Ghislaine Sant. J'ai 45 ans d'expérience dans la coiffure dont 10 ans sur des plateaux de cinéma , à Montréal. j'ai voulu développer une perruque idéale pour les femmes qui ont perdu leurs cheveux suite aux traitements de chimiothérapie. 

 Based on techniques used to make cinema wigs. It is a 2 peice set, entirely hand made (100% real hair).

j'ai utilisé les techniques de fabrications des perruques de cinéma. Sa particularité, elle est faite en deux morceaux. Et dans le cas ou le cuir cheveulu, dessus de tête , est douloureux, un seul morceau peut être porté avec toute sortes de chapeaux, bonnets ou casquettes. (100% vrais cheveux de haute qualité, fin et ondulés, faciles a coiffer.)

Elle est très stable, très aérée, particulièrement confortable et simple à entretenir.

La Rosalie n'est pas une perruque de fantaisie, elle est spécialement faite pour les têtes sans cheveux et réponds a tous les points de confort nécessaires au port de cette perruque durant de longues heures (expérince de 18h par une de nos modèles. Nos modèles sont des personnes concernées)

Very stable, light and airy, easy to style, comfortable to wear, easy to maintain.

 

 

My goal is to make this luxury product accesible to all bugets rather than a chosen few.The cost being a fraction of what is available on the market.

Mon objectif est de mettre ce produit de luxe a la porté de plus de femmes, en réduisant le coût au maximum.

 

The development of thIs product is complete. It is made in Canada.  We are ready to begin the marketing phase. The product has been tried and tested for the last year with success.. Production is in place. done in part in Québec to assure quality, and in Asia, to be cost efficiant. Copyright is in place. What we need is the funds to market this unique product. We estimate  our needs at 30,000 $.

le développement du produit est complété, il est fait au Québec, canada, pour la partie la plus technique. Nous sommes prêt a démarrer la mise en marché. Les Rosalie ont été testées avec succès. les copyright sont en place.

Nous devons trouver les fonds pour cette mise en marché et nous estimons notre besoin a 30 000 $

 

Self-Image, is very important and even more so when going through an ordeal such as chemo-therapy. Hair loss can be a traumatic experience. A comfortable and beautiful wig can contribute to the well being and self-esteem.

Notre image est importante, et la perte des cheveux est un traumatisme. Une perruque confortable et belle peut aider a passer cette terrible épreuve.

 

Cancer does not discriminate. Everyone's mother, sister, wife, girlfriend, friend is at risk. This product can improve the life of people going through this ordeal. Spreading the word of our product can be helpful.

Chacun de nous avons eu ou avons  encore dans notre entourage une femmes, sœur, amie, mère, ...etc. que le cancer a touché. Nous sommes convaincue que Rosalie peut être une aide pour passer cette période de vie douloureuse.

Merci.

thank you

story:
IGo™ Eyewear

Always. eVolVe.

IGo is a premium eyewear company on a mission. Our mission is to create a fashionable brand of eco-friendly sunglasses while improving the quality of life for underpriviliged children in developing countries. So far, we have provided free eye care to over 40 children in Nigeria. But as we grow, we plan to expand our mission to all corners of the world where there is need.

Childhood visual impairment and blindness continue to be an enormous burden in developing nations. According to the World Health Organization, a child in the third world goes blind in both eyes every minute. 60% of these children go on to lose their lives within a year of losing their sight. Currently, children from low-income families in Sub-Saharan Africa experience the highest prevalence of childhood blindness in the world.


As the brainchild of Adey, a Nigerian-born engineer turned entrepreneur, IGo was founded as a new line of premium and fashionable eyewear. And with the help of his cousin Taiwo, a Yale-educated scientist and educator, these two entrepreneurs are seeking to redefine "cool" while creating a socially and environmentally responsible product with the potential for a truly global impact.


IGo is set apart in the eyewear market by its attention to environmental sustainability. All of our glasses are made from the most renewable and sturdy woods and the plastics we use are 100% recycled, meaning they can avoid piling up in a landfill or polluting our oceans. 



Through partnerships with organizations such as A Ray of Hope UNESCO, and the African Center for Innovation and Leadership Development (ACILD), our "buy one, give one" approach to business ensures that a purchase of IGo Eyewear helps a child in the developing world get the eye care and/or prescription glasses that he or she needs. We are committed to providing funding to support our partners on the the ground as they address the needs of children around the world.


Vision & Education Initiative Maiden Edition - December 2015

Monday, Dec 21st 2015  marked the beginning of making good on their promise, as IGo collaborated with TINY & GREAT Creche & Nursery and the African Center for Innovation and Leadership Development (ACILD) in a united effort to support children’s vision in Ogbomoso, Nigeria. The event was hosted to: conduct eye test for the students of the school, and to provide medications and prescription glasses to students determined to be in need of them. Over forty students were carefully examined and tested by the ophthalmologist, Dr. Adepoju. While over 90% of the children tested checked out as having good vision, Dr. Adepoju highlighted the importance of such routine eye examination, especially for children, who may not be able to adequately express their need for vision correction. She remarked that compared to adults, the lifelong impact of visual impairment on children is prodigious due to longer period or years of disability, which come with emotional, social, and economic costs to the child, the family, and society as a whole. She admonished IGo to not limit their efforts and support to just prescription glasses as children of this age-group would benefit from supplements such as vitamin A, which could help prevent vision impairment.




Our Collection

Spring Collection: 

Lewa :

A beauty to behold; Lewa is stylish and versatile without any form of pretension. This artistic marriage of recycled plastic and sustainable wood was inspired by an easy breezy day at the beach. Spring break trip anyone?


Color variation


Classic Collection

"Kakaki" :  
Music was the first muse of fashion so it made sense that this fluid and harmoniously designed frame be named KAKAKI; after the metal trumpet played only in the presence of African Royals. Take this pair with you when you need inspiration to do something special.



Bwiza:
Named after a Rwandan princess who lived in the 1700’s and was known for her extreme beauty, fearlessness and intelligence. These three traits are admirable and embody the perspective of IGo. Explore your inner beauty and strength with Bwiza.


Oriki:
The Yòrùbá language and culture is quite enduring and deep. Oríkì is praise poetry of ancestry and history; specific to each lineage and a cultural phenomenon among its indigenous people. We’d recommend you wear this pair to express your identity and your journey. Where you’ve been is just as important as where you’re going.


Uzuri :

This classic is just as it seems; Organic, natural and beautiful in its element. Let this Swahili inspired pair set the tone for an easy breezy day.




Signature Collection

Sneh: 
Designed and crafted with uniqueness and mystery in mind, Sneh is the pair to call on when the day holds any number of opportunities.


Alueeth :
"Alueeth" means "Adorn" to the Dinka people in the East African region. Make this foldable and versatile pair the highlight of your outfit; it’s guaranteed to make all the right waves.


Rx Collection

Efiko :
Efiko! Smart! This trendy streetwise pair will do everything to elevate your perception and position. Efiko will give you a sense of purpose and drive without compromising your sense of fashion. The world is your oyster!



Woju :

Woju! What do you see when you look at me? This pair elevates your confidence with a bit of an edge that sets you apart from the crowd. Your perception is your reality. Stay confident.


Help Make This Project & Mission a Success

So what can you do to make our dream and mission a reality? Your donations will go towards helping us build our inventory, executing our marketing plans and transforming the eyewear industry into an eco-conscious and socially responsible haven.

Please support our project by checking out the perks section to see the perks we are offering as a thank you. And whether you support or not, don't forget to share this Indiegogo Campaign  with your friends and family on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and all other social media platforms!

Thank you for your support

Pouch 

Handmade Așǫ-Oké pouch. 

Așǫ-Oké (pronounced ah-SHAW-okay) fabric: A superb textile material hand-woven on looms and symbolically worn throughout history by members of high society in western Nigeria.


Risks and challenges

Manufacturing Delays: While we anticipate no manufacturing issues, there is always a chance of delays for various reasons. If such a delay were to occur, you would still receive your pair of IGo™ Eyewear and all that has been pledged: Some of our collection just a little bit later than expected.
story_txt:
IGo™ Eyewear
Always. eVolVe.
IGo is a premium eyewear company on a mission. Our mission is to create a fashionable brand of eco-friendly sunglasses while improving the quality of life for underpriviliged children in developing countries. So far, we have provided free eye care to over 40 children in Nigeria. But as we grow, we plan to expand our mission to all corners of the world where there is need.

Childhood visual impairment and blindness continue to be an enormous burden in developing nations. According to the World Health Organization, a child in the third world goes blind in both eyes every minute. 60% of these children go on to lose their lives within a year of losing their sight. Currently, children from low-income families in Sub-Saharan Africa experience the highest prevalence of childhood blindness in the world.

As the brainchild of Adey, a Nigerian-born engineer turned entrepreneur, IGo was founded as a new line of premium and fashionable eyewear. And with the help of his cousin Taiwo, a Yale-educated scientist and educator, these two entrepreneurs are seeking to redefine "cool" while creating a socially and environmentally responsible product with the potential for a truly global impact.

IGo is set apart in the eyewear market by its attention to environmental sustainability. All of our glasses are made from the most renewable and sturdy woods and the plastics we use are 100% recycled, meaning they can avoid piling up in a landfill or polluting our oceans. 







Through partnerships with organizations such as A Ray of Hope UNESCO, and the African Center for Innovation and Leadership Development (ACILD), our "buy one, give one" approach to business ensures that a purchase of IGo Eyewear helps a child in the developing world get the eye care and/or prescription glasses that he or she needs. We are committed to providing funding to support our partners on the the ground as they address the needs of children around the world.

  




Vision & Education Initiative Maiden Edition - December 2015

Monday, Dec 21st 2015  marked the beginning of making good on their promise, as IGo collaborated with TINY & GREAT Creche & Nursery and the African Center for Innovation and Leadership Development (ACILD) in a united effort to support children’s vision in Ogbomoso, Nigeria. The event was hosted to: conduct eye test for the students of the school, and to provide medications and prescription glasses to students determined to be in need of them. Over forty students were carefully examined and tested by the ophthalmologist, Dr. Adepoju. While over 90% of the children tested checked out as having good vision, Dr. Adepoju highlighted the importance of such routine eye examination, especially for children, who may not be able to adequately express their need for vision correction. She remarked that compared to adults, the lifelong impact of visual impairment on children is prodigious due to longer period or years of disability, which come with emotional, social, and economic costs to the child, the family, and society as a whole. She admonished IGo to not limit their efforts and support to just prescription glasses as children of this age-group would benefit from supplements such as vitamin A, which could help prevent vision impairment.



Our Collection
Spring Collection: 
Lewa :

A beauty to behold; Lewa is stylish and versatile without
any form of pretension. This artistic marriage of recycled plastic and
sustainable wood was inspired by an easy breezy day at the beach. Spring break
trip anyone?

story:
Dolica On-Demand Heated Gloves

At Dolica, we are constantly looking for new ideas that will make life a little better. Even though we live in sunny southern california we like a little snow up in Big Bear and Mammoth. And us Angelenos are prone to freezing if temperatures go below 70 degrees. So in the mountains we need a little help to keep our hands warm. A regular snow glove works but somethings its not enough. That when necessity is the mother of invention. We came up with a lithium ion powered heated gloves.

The Dolica On-Demand Heat Gloves heats your hands in seconds after activated

Basically these gloves are thinsulate gloves with a layer of carbon fiber heating elements integrated in them. Once these heating elements are activated with a lithion-ion battery pack, you hands will feel the warm sensation within seconds. There are 3 heating modes you can choose and depending on which intensity you choose the Dolica On-Demand Heated Gloves can last up to 8 hours on charge. 

Once your done with using the gloves, you can easily recharge the Lithium-Ion battery pack by connecting it to mini-usb charging source. After a few hours of recharging you will be good to go. Other convenient features include an adjustable wrist strap of the gloves as well as an elastic wrist cuff. With your contribution, we can help bring the Dolica On-Demand Heated Gloves to the masses.

Lithium Ion Battery Pack Settings:

Specifications:

  • Battery compatible with any powered USB 2.0 or 3.0 ports
  • Lithium-ion rechargeable battery –  2200mah 
  • Red led 2-3 hours 47-60 celcius, Pink Led 3-4 Hours 45-55 celcius, Blue led 6-8 hours 40-50 celcius
  • New carbon fiber nano-heating technology
  • Fire retardant fabric
  • Chargeable time 3-4 hours
  • Imput voltage 3.7v, 350mA
  • Output Voltage 3.7, 1.8A
  • Battery last 4-6 hours
  • FCC/ CE certification

On Demand Heated Gloves Sizing Chart

  • Current Sizes offered - Large and XL



Prototype and Technology behind the Glove


The On Demand Heated Gloves are made with a special heat conductive carbon fiber film that lines the palms and fingers. 


 The concept came from heat seats in cars. Heated seats also need a flexible heat material that can flex and move with the seat. We basically took from that concept and applied it to gloves. The result is a flexible material with the conductive film lined throughout the palm and fingers. 


 The secret sauce of our product is this flexible heat conductive carbon fiber. Once you add the connector cable and Lithium Ion battery you have a On Demand Heated Glove that will heat your hands in seconds once its activated.

Lithium Ion Battery with Logic Board and LED and Plastic Housing

from hand to glove. the special heat conductive fabric heats every party of your hand

in prototyping the glove we changed the design of the pocket that holds the Li-Ion battery for ease of storage

Risks and challenges

We currently have finished the prototype phase and are ready for production. We are working with special  glove factory to produce our gloves. We have a successful product a line camera accessories that source the best factories so we are fully capable of completing the Dolica On-Demand Heated Gloves on time. Now we just need your support.


Shipping included in United States. For Canada please add an extra $20 for shipping. Anywhere else in the world please add $30 to the total.

story:
Pledge > Pick (Email) > Patience

  1. Pledge for the number of shirts you want (any design, any size)
  2. We will email you shortly after to confirm your order and address
  3. Stand patiently by your mailbox starting the first week of December! (**International orders may take longer to arrive)

The Cause!

All proceeds will go directly to Young Adult Cancer Canada : www.youngadultcancer.ca


YACC’s Mission is to build a community of young adults diagnosed with cancer that provides information, support, skills and opportunity.

In 2003 I was diagnosed with Non-Hodgkins Lymphoma. I went through a year of chemotherapy and radiation, yet my 'healing journey' never truly began until I sought out people like me who had been through what I had experienced as a young adult with cancer. The friends family I have met through YACC have been invaluable to me and my path back to enjoying life after Cancer. I want to help them continue to bring other people like me together from all over Canada so they can join us in our collective experiences.

You can help raise money and spread the word on the good that YACC does every time someone goes "Hey yeah, Cancer DOES Suck! Nice shirt [insert your name here]"

The Shirts!

All shirts are going to be printed on Gildan Ultra Cotton 5000. It's a nice high-quality cotton shirt that holds ink really well and lasts for hundreds of washes. These are two levels of quality above the typical shirts you get at a concert or t-shirt shop. That cheap cotton never lasts! You're going to love the heavy cotton.

Sizes Available : XS - S - M - L - XL - XXL - XXXL

Ladies Fits Available for Most Designs!

I can get MOST of the shirt colours in the Ladies' Fit! I will let you can decide if you want a Men's shirt in the preferred colour, or the Ladies' fit in the "alternate" colour.

Bundle up and Save!

1 Shirt: $20 
2 Shirts: $35 ($17.50 per shirt)
3 Shirts: $50 ($16.66 per shirt)
6 Shirts: $90 ($15.00 per shirt)
All 12 Shirts: $150.00! (that's only $12.50 per shirt!)

Note: You do NOT have to order the same size. You can order any design in any size, so please collect a small fund amongst your friends and family and make a big order! 

The Shipping 

Canadian Shipping is included in the Pledge. US and International orders must add extra funds.

Shipping will be via Canada Post Lettermail in a secure, bubble-wrapped envelope. Orders of 12 or more shirts will be shipped via Canada Post Parcel in a nice sturdy box!

Canada: Shipping is included ($4 per shirt)
US: Add $2.00 per shirt extra ($6 per shirt)
International (including Non-Continental US): Add $4.00 ($8 per shirt)


Shirt #01: Blue and White on a Yellow Shirt

Shirt #02: White on a Black Shirt

Shirt #03: Black, Green and Red on a White Shirt

Shirt #04: White and Orange on a Black Shirt

Shirt #05: Gold Ink on a Black Shirt

Shirt #06: Black, Orange and Yellow on a Brown Shirt


Ladies' Fit will be "Blackberry" (dark dark purple) (Click here to view Shirt)

Shirt #07: Pink, Purple and White on a Black Shirt

Shirt #08: White and Orange on a Purple Shirt

Shirt #09: Gold Ink on a Maroon Shirt


Ladies' Fit available in Red/Gold (Click here to view shirt)

Shirt #10: White, Yellow and Orange on a Black Shirt

Shirt #11: Black and White ink on a Green Shirt

Shirt #12: Orange and Red on a Beige Shirt


Ladies' Fit will be Pink (Click here to view shirt)

The Numbers!

To be worthwhile, I have to print a minimum of two dozen of each design. So each design printed costs me $308.49 whether I sell 1 or all 24. To print all 12 designs means I have to pay almost $3700 up front, just to find out if this is a good idea. So can I just say HOORAY for crowdfunding? 

Using my minimum goal numbers, the production cost will be roughly $12.85 per shirt. Indiegogo takes 4%, plus 3% for a transaction fee. A good envelope for .75 cents and you have $5.00 for YACC for each $20 pledge! Yay MATH! 

The great thing about this campaign is that the more shirts I can pre-sell, the cheaper I can produce them, and the MORE can go to YACC!

---------

"Hey...haven't I seen something that looks like that somewhere before? This wouldn't be IP INFRINGEMENT WOULD IT?!?!"

No, I created every design myself from scratch, using legally licensed fonts and everything. As for the Intellectual Property rights, these are clearly Parody, which is protected by Fair Use (and several precedents in the US; see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fair_use#Fair_use_and_parody). Plus, with all the existing parody logos out there...at least I'm raising money for charity!

story:
I want to start giving immediately!! If I reach my goal I will support anti-bullying education by donating $300 to the Amanda Todd Legacy Society. For more information on the Amanda Todd Legacy Society please see below.

Growing up I was considered different and faced much rejection. Being bullied was a common occurrence. 

My dream is that my jewelry be a symbol of unity, love and harmony all over the world.

Silver Streak Jewelry represents the four elements earth, air, fire and water which can be seen and felt everywhere and together they are united. They connect us all.

My goal is to have my jewelry on the shopping channels all over the world so I can reach all of you and I've confirmed meetings with major shopping channels in the US and Canada. This is why I need your support.

There's a great deal of expenses coming up; I need to get packaging, some inventory, travel to meet buyers, and develop my website. 

With your support I can get my jewelry in front of millions of people and partial proceeds from the sales will go to support Bullying programs. 

I know your time is valuable and I thank you for taking the time to consider your support and for those who choose to support my campaign thank you. Together we can make jewelry a symbol of unity and stop bullying. 

      suman bakshi

Suman is a visionary, marketing whiz, humanitarian, a bit of a tree hugger and the modest persona behind this chic 3D collection. With a knack for creative business, she is a Generation X'er with some Y and Z characteristics, which keeps her young at heart.

With two diplomas (graphic design and marketing), an associate certificate in venture development, and keeping her pulse on professional development she's finally learned not to take life so seriously, to let her light shine and to be fearless in the face of the unknown. 

Suman's business background reaching from advertising to producing some of the largest fundraisers in Vancouver. Suman never set her sights on being a jewelry designer and after working as the Operations Director for a custom jeweler her passion for jewelry was ignited. 

It is my dream that one day all people will be united in love and harmony and my jewelry to be a symbol of it. With your support I can get my jewelry in front of millions of people and partial proceeds from the sales will go to support Bullying programs. 

The name Silver Streak Jewelry was inspired by my natural grey streak, inherited from my dad's side of the family.  Even though sometimes people have said it makes me look old I wanted to stay true to nature, so it's no surprise the collection is based on the four elements -- earth, air, fire and water. 

The elements can be seen and felt everywhere and together they are united. They connect us all.

I've been working on developing  all aspects of the business with my own funds for the past 2 years and now need your help to get my collection in front of retail buyers. 

I'm happy to say that I've confirmed meeting with the Home Shopping Network (HSN), ShopHQ (formally ShopNBC) and The Shopping Channel Canada (TSC). 

Now I need your help to make these meetings successful. You are the decision makers and future financiers and I greatly appreciate your consideration and support.

Your generous contribution will go towards funding: 

$300 | Donation  { Gratitude for reaching our goal! }

$3200 | Traveling 

     { Meet with Buyers ~ HSN in Florida, TSC in Toronto, ShopHQ in Minneapolis      and buyers at the Jewelry Convention in Vegas }

     { Sourcing and Securing Distribution Partner } 

$4000   | Manufacturing

     { samples and inventory }

     { eco-friendly reusable pouches }

$1500   | Website { design, e-commerce, seo, photography }

$1000   | Website { photography }

= $10,000

Campaign funds raised in excess of the initial $10,000 will be used towards a social media campaign.  

$10,000 | Social Media



Carol Todd is the mother of two and an advocate to many. Carol's daughter Amanda Todd brought to the world's attention the concequences of cyberbullying, and the need to address bullying in general among our youth. Carol continues the spread Amanda's message and carry on her dream of helping kids. The Amanda Todd Legacy was created by Carol to help others in need with resources and assistance for anti-bullying, mental health and cyber safety.

If you would like to support this initiative, look for the perk that allows you support us in our mission.

My success or lack of directly impacts how much I can support the causes that are near and dear to me and many others.

Like most people I support causes that impact me. Sadly Bullying is a growing problem due to social media and many other sites that most tech-savvy parents don't know about, such as ask.fm. Amanda Todd lived in Vancouver (Canada) and was 15 year old when she killed herself. It took two years to catch the cyber-bully who was arrested in Europe, the Netherlands, earlier this year. 

As the saying goes, it takes a village. Please join use & become a part of the vision.

1. Contribute to my campaign and help spread the word if you believe in supporting jewelry with a purpose to end bullying. A direct email is the most powerful way to get this message out.

2. Send everyone you know the link to this campaign page http://www.igg.me/at/silverstreak.

3. Post a link of my campaign page on your Facebook, Twitter, Google Plus, website, blog and any other social networking sites that you're most familiar with. And please don't forget to follow my progress and the difference you help me make on Facebook!

Share your story, create a dialogue and help stop bullying. Your family, friends and followers will love you for it and so will I! Thank you!  

   www.silverstreakjewelry.com

visionary, marketing whiz, humanitarian, a bit of a tree hugger and the modest persona
behind this chic 3D collection. With a knack for creative business, she is a
Generation X'er with some Y and Z characteristics, which keeps her young at
heart. 
With two
diplomas (graphic design and marketing), an associate certificate in venture development, and
keeping her pulse on professional development she's finally learned not to take
life so seriously, to let her light shine and to be fearless in the face of the
unknown. Suman's business background reaching from advertising to producing some of the largest fundraisers in Vancouver. Suman never set her sights on being a jewelry
designer and after working as the Operations Director for a custom jeweler her passion for jewelry was ignited. It is my dream that one day all people will be united in love and harmony and my jewelry to be a symbol of it. With your support I can get my jewelry in front of millions of people and partial proceeds from the sales will go to support Bullying programs. The name Silver Streak Jewelry was inspired by my natural grey streak, inherited from my dad's side of the family.  Even though sometimes people have said it makes me look old I wanted to stay true to nature, so it's no surprise the collection is based on the four elements -- earth, air, fire and water. The elements can be seen and felt everywhere and together they are united. They connect us all.I've been working on developing  all aspects of the business with my own funds for the past 2 years and now need your help to get my collection in front of retail buyers. 
I'm happy to say that I've confirmed meeting with the Home Shopping
Network (HSN), ShopHQ (formally ShopNBC) and The Shopping Channel Canada (TSC). Now I need your help to make these meetings successful. You are the decision makers and future financiers and I greatly appreciate your consideration and support.Your generous contribution will go towards funding: 
$300 | Donation  { Gratitude for reaching our goal! }$3200 | Traveling      { Meet with Buyers ~ HSN in Florida, TSC in Toronto, ShopHQ in Minneapolis      and buyers at the Jewelry Convention in Vegas }     { Sourcing and Securing Distribution Partner } 
$4000   | Manufacturing     { samples and inventory }     { eco-friendly reusable pouches }
$1500   | Website { design, e-commerce, seo, photography }$1000   | Website { photography }
= $10,000Campaign funds
raised in excess of the initial $10,000 will be used towards a social media campaign.  $10,000 | Social MediaCarol Todd is the mother of two and an advocate to many. Carol's daughter Amanda Todd brought to the world's attention the concequences of cyberbullying, and the need to address bullying in general among our youth. Carol continues the spread Amanda's message and carry on her dream of helping kids. The Amanda Todd Legacy was created by Carol to help others in need with resources and assistance for anti-bullying, mental health and cyber safety.If you would like to support this initiative, look for the perk that allows you support us in our mission.My success or lack of directly impacts how much I can support the causes that are near and dear to me and many others.Like most people I support causes that impact me. Sadly Bullying is a growing problem due to social media and many other sites that most tech-savvy parents don't know about, such as ask.fm. Amanda Todd lived in Vancouver (Canada) and was 15 year old when she killed herself. It took two years to catch the cyber-bully who was arrested in Europe, the Netherlands, earlier this year. As the saying goes, it takes a village. Please join use & become a part of the vision.1. Contribute to my campaign and help spread the word if you believe in supporting jewelry with a purpose to end bullying. A direct email is the most powerful way to get this message out.2. Send everyone you know the link to this campaign page http://www.igg.me/at/silverstreak.3. Post a link of my campaign page on your Facebook, Twitter, Google Plus, website, blog and any other social networking sites that you're most familiar with. And please don't forget to follow my progress and the difference you help me make on Facebook!Share your story, create a dialogue and help stop bullying. Your family, friends and followers will love you for it and so will I! Thank you!     www.silverstreakjewelry.com

story:
What is ClosetRiot: ClosetRiot is a brand with a social aim. The logo of ClosetRiot is a pierced heart (shown in the pictures below) that symbolizes the discontent of the gay community with the current development on gay rights in Russia.We want to spread this social word by producing T-shirts and sweaters depicting this logo.

Practical aim: Gathering enough money to produce a first collection of men’s and women’s T-shirts and sweaters. 

Ideological aim: To create more awareness for the current developments in Russia on gay and transgender rights. Especially with the upcoming winter Olympics in Sochi it is a good moment to show the world that we do not accept the way the Russian government treats LGBT people. Because we want to support the people who fight for better gay rights, 25% of the profit of each item will be donated to the pridefund http://www.amnesty.nl/pridefonds. This fund is a collaboration between Amnesty International and the COC (a Dutch gay association). The remaining profit will be used to increase our production.

The products: For women we will produce one grey speckled T-shirt (100 pieces) and a women’s sweater (50 pieces). For men we will produce grey T-shirt (100 pieces) and also a men’s sweater (50 pieces). We will also produce a canvas bag (100 pieces), all items are depicted in the pics below. We buy our shirts at a company that is known for its use of organic cotton and ethical trade and justice for workers. Products will be sold via Etsy (http://www.etsy.com/) and DaWanda (http://nl.dawanda.com/). If we don't reach our goal we will just produce less shirts.

The costs: The money will be spent on buying the T-shirts, developing costs of the print and the printing of the logo itself. The profit will be spent on the pridefund and on more production, we aim to be able to at least produce one new item for each item sold.

Contact: closetriot@gmail.com

PS if you are using an Internet Explorer browser you might not be able to make a contribution due to disapearance of the "continue" button. So please use Chrome or Firefox.

story:
Handmade, fashionable, high quality Men's and Ladies sunglasses with a unique cultural aesthetic!


WHY JEMBERE EYEWEAR?

The sunglass market is overflowing with outrageously priced sunglasses, so Jembere Eyewear was created to offer an amazing product at a reasonable price. After spending many years working in the Eyewear Industry I have been able to gain experience in all facets of the sunglass world from product development, merchandising, sales and brand management. I always refused to spend the $400, $500 or more on brand name sunglasses while knowing I could offer something just as great, if not better at a much more affordable price! So I introduce Jembere Eyewear to you! 

Jembere Eyewear is a fashionable, high quality, handmade sunglass collection with a unique cultural aesthetic. I wanted to incorporate the rich culture of Ethiopia while creating this collection. Growing up around such beautiful clothing and jewelry, I knew there was a way to blend these into the brand. As you have seen in the video, taking something that is usually a basic addition to your sunglass purchase like a cleaning cloth and adding such an artisan touch to it. These hand woven pieces are gorgeously handmade by true artisans of Ethiopia. 

The sunglasses are made using some of the best materials from Italy, Germany and Hong Kong. All of the glasses are handmade using acetate, 5 panel hinges for durability and CR39 lenses. Each glass will come with a snap case, hand woven cleaning cloth and inside the Jembere Eyewear box. My First collection consists of three styles. Two unisex and one ladies style.


THE COLLECTION

This frame looks great on all faces! Just take a look at the images below! Adorned with a gold Meskel, an ancient Ethiopian Cross, you are sure to love this glass!

Available Colors: Black w/Gold Meskel OR Brown Tortoise w/Gold Meskel 

This beautiful cateye is a TWO in ONE glass ladies! Two chains hang on both sides, but can easily be removed and worn as simply a beautiful cateye. 

Available Colors: Black w/Gold Chains OR Brown Tortoise w/Gold Chains

This classic aviator shape is for everyone! Adding a fashionable twist with the acetate top bar and unique logo placement on the inner frame. 

Available Colors: Black on Black OR Gold w/Black and Gold mirror lens

                                                                       





Why Jembere Eyewear Needs YOU! 

I have been able to get through the development stage and have my pre production samples. Now it's time to place my official production order. I am offering the Jembere Eyewear Collection at a discounted price for all my IGG supporters! I have also designed a t-shirt and hoodie so please take a look at the rewards I have put together for you and click on the one that best suits you! 

JEMBERE TSHIRTS: Make your selection of color and size 

White Logo Tee w/Gold Foil 

Black Logo Tee w/Gold Foil

Jembere Hoodie also available! 

Black w/Gold Foil


LAST BUT NOT LEAST!



OTHER WAYS TO HELP!

Like us on our Facebook page: Facebook.com/JembereEyewear

Follow us on twitter and Instagram: @JembereEyewear

Tell all your friends and family about Jembere Eyewear and our IGG campaign!


Thank you for your support and for checking out Jembere Eyewear!

Haven't answered all your questions? 

email: info@jembereeyewear.com and we will be sure to answer as soon as we can!

story:
Welcome to ZeluStream!

I'm Drew Jankowski, 2013 Venture For America (VFA) Fellow, and over the past year and a half, I've lived and worked in Providence, RI. I graduated from Dartmouth College with a Major in Engineering and Studio Art, and a minor in Computer Science. At Dartmouth I played on the Men's Golf team and the Men's Club Hockey Team.

My Vision

Fueled by my love for sports, my experience in technology and product management, and my desire to build useful services, I started ZeluStream.  Today, sports fans can only watch games at the whims and mercy of their cable provider. Other fans can unplug using online, on-demand services like Hulu and Netflix. Sports fans attach themselves to their cable box and their sports package. ZeluStream aims to provide a viable alternative to traditional cable subscriptions and packaged sports content, while also allowing fans to watch wherever they can connect to the internet.

How Do We Get There?

ZeluStream can't attack the big US markets without first proving that the business model and the economics work for smaller audiences. This means targeting a sport with a smaller following in the US. Initially, ZeluStream will focus on Rugby, Cycling, and Cricket. ZeluStream will work with College, Professional and International organizations to record and live stream their games and races. We will market to fans of each sport, giving them a single place to view their favorite events.


With your help, ZeluStream will hit the ground running. We'll build our website, and begin collecting signups from fans who want to help test our service. We'll begin discussions with organizations and existing content providers to find the best possible solution for you, the fans. Finally, we'll build the service itself, so fans can watch all their favorite events using ZeluStream.

What We Need

To launch, ZeluStream needs your help to raise $1000. With your generous contributions, we plan to:

  • Build ZeluStream website and launch our brand: Buy domain name, build website, buy hosting, Design ZeluStream logo, and launch Facebook and Twitter accounts.
  • Incorporate ZeluStream: File associated paperwork.
  • Discuss Partnerships: Travel costs.
  • Build ZeluStream: Buy app hosting, development costs.
Don't worry, if ZeluStream doesn't reach its goal, your contribution won't go to waste. We still plan to build our website and our brand, and we'll continue to solicit feedback and ideas from our audience.

Risks & Challenges

ZeluStream's largest risks and challenges arise from the nature of the sports entertainment industry as structured today:

  • Networks sign large, exclusive, multi-year deals with sports leagues and special events.
  • Potential partners may not see the benefits of our model.
  • Networks and cable providers build out similar services.

ZeluStream will challenge this status quo by going after smaller, non-exclusive deals, as well as reseller deals from the networks themselves. We'll start by targeting a niche audience in the US, such as soccer fans, rugby fans, or cricket fans. This will allow ZeluStream to build an audience, and prove to other sports leagues and networks that this model can work.

My passion for sports and sports fans, combined with my experience building products for technology companies, puts me in a unique position to address these risks. I still have a lot of learning to do about the ins and outs of the sports entertainment business, but I know from my Product Management skills that I can work with league and network executives to identify the win-win situations. To address the risk of competition from other services, ZeluStream will stay small in order to better listen to its fans and respond more quickly than large networks can.

Other Ways You Can Help

Don't worry! Even if you can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help. Help get the word out and make some noise about ZeluStream by using the Indiegogo share tools!

Thanks!

The ZeluStream Team

PS-What does ZeluStream even mean?

For those who are curious, Zelus is the Greek god of rivalry, brother of Nike (victory), Kratos (strength) and Bia (force). As such, he represents the excitement that we want to provide to our fans with a streaming service.

story:
In 2007 Sulimon Balogun transformed a Brooklyn restaurant’s basement into an exhibition space, naming it Gallery La La; here we managed and sold work by local visual artists. After the restaurant closed down we continued to use the name Gallery La La for popup events, which represented a select group of independent fashion designers as well as visual artists. By 2013 we had acquired a storefront building in New York’s SoHo neighborhood. After recognizing the industry shift to digital experiences and online shopping we closed down our physical store and we are now putting all our efforts into our next explosive chapter.

Our next chapter is to relaunch Gallery La La online, as a curated marketplace, so we may continue to support our community of talented designers and artists by giving them a platform where consumers may shop for their unique and exceptional products.

Gallery La La will be featured on Worldwide Business with kathy ireland on the Fox Business Network as sponsored content on Sunday, December 2, 2018 at 5:30pm EST and Bloomberg International on Saturday, December 1, 2018 at 7:00pm GMT and Sunday, December 2, 2018 at 10:00am D.F. and 2:30pm HKT.

READ OUR PRESS RELEASE

The difference between us and renowned platform’s, such as Etsy (1.4 million sellers) and Saatchi Art (65,000 sellers), is that we will continue to meticulously select who we represent and what of theirs we represent.  We will do in-person quality control checks to ensure that the products we select are consistently extraordinary.

We intend on keeping our community of designers and artists small so that we may intensely focus our efforts on providing exquisite products to consumers. Unlike our competitors we will continuously invest in promoting each item that we represent through digital and physical marketing. Our target is to provide the opportunity, for those selected to work with us, to make a good living from the hard work they put into their creations.

Your donations are going towards the costs involved in building and operating a platform that will compete with the market leaders in our industry. After much research to find the right company to help us with this transition, Smartsites, an industry leader in digital marketing, is the company we have chosen to spearhead the design of our marketplace and to run our digital marketing.

Smartsites' Client List 

Smartsites' Case Studies 

Here's what Smartsites has to say:

Brilliant Website Design & Development - Your website is a digital storefront to your business. Website design has evolved from just words and pictures to also include meaningful user experience, interactive features, fast load speed, search friendly structure, and much more. A website is one of a company’s most valuable assets. We build high performance websites that are proven to work and convert. If your website is dated or non-existent, you could be missing a large part of your potential market.

Effective Search Engine Optimization - Search engine optimization (SEO) is the application of various strategies to improve the organic search rankings of a website. These strategies range from site user experience to quality link building. SEO is an important piece of any online marketing plan. SEO is an investment into your company’s future. Organic traffic has a much higher ROI and click volume than paid search traffic. If your website is not on page one for your top keywords, you are missing out on a large piece of your online potential.

In order to continue and expand our mission, we are asking you to help us with Gallery La La’s transition into an online curated marketplace. Your donations, and/or sharing our campaign, will enable us to reach our goal.

Perks: Serena Van Rensselaer, a jewelry designer, has kindly teamed up with us by offering her latest collection “Willow and Wheat” as perks for our campaign. Her collection is available in both 14k gold or sterling silver and consist of eye-catching timeless pieces that were inspired by her love for nature.

Thank you for your support!

story:
OUR STORY 

Climate-Benefiting Luxury Handbags and Wallets. 

Certified Animal Welfare Approved Leather CGC works closely with A Greener World’s Animal Welfare Approved (AWA) program to achieve our animal welfare goals. It’s the highest animal welfare standard available, and we’re proud to say that our leather is among the first to be certified.

Because Soil Matters

The soil is vital to the health of the Earth. That’s why CGC works closely with shepherds to provide education on regenerative farming. By performing soil analyses on our farms, we’re able to ensure that nutrients are cycled back to build soil organic matter. Improving the soil allows our pastures to naturally capture atmospheric carbon and put it back into the soil where it belongs. In short, our leather helps to balance our carbon cycle and ultimately, heal the Earth.

Making Positive Change, Locally 

 Part of our motivation comes from making a difference locally. By creating a regenerative business, we’re able to effectively elicit positive change locally. We only purchase from regional farmers and U.S. factories, thus doing our part to help shrink the wage gap.

The MEG in olive

 

Dimensions 
- Bag: 10 1/4" (L) x 5" (W) x 11 1/4" (H)
- Strap: 18 3/4" long and 1 1/4" wide
- Flat top should strap with an 11" drop

Details
- Available in caramel, olive, and espresso 
- Available in full leather or leather and suede
- 2 interior pockets for phone and small items
- Interior zipper pocket  
- Organic cotton lining 
- Metal feet
- YKK Excella zipper

the MEG in Espresso with leather front/back and suede side panels

The Beauty Of Our Leather 

CGC has partnered with an experienced family-owned artisan tannery in the US that prides itself on preserving tradition and history. In this era of mass production, artisanal methods of tanning are rare and our tannery uses old world techniques.

Our leather is beautiful, soft and natural and will develop a rich patina over time.

Full-grain leather means that the surface has not been buffed or sanded to remove "imperfections". This allows the leather to retain its natural grain, freckles, and scars. These natural imperfections of the leather make our bags beautiful and unique.

Wallet in Olive with White Stitching

It is also the best quality and the most durable leather available. It is often seen as the most authentic type of leather because it maintains all of the texture from the original lamb hide. Each leather piece will truly be one-of-a-kind.

Our leather is dyed natural, earthy colors using a technique called aniline dying. Aniline leather is dyed with soluble dyes that don’t cover up the surface of the skin. 

This handcrafted technique makes aniline leather one of the most precious finishes for leather. In addition, we put a thin protective coating on the leather to protect it from damage. However, over time natural oils will replace the wax and a unique and beautiful patina will develop that will make the leather more durable.

Our U.S. handbag factory is family-owned, as well, and supplies some of the top luxury brands in the world. You’ll see the high-quality craftsmanship in the clean finished edges and the precision in every detail.

CGC's focus is on utilizing the whole animal and leveraging regenerative business to heal our soil.

Thanks to a closed-loop production process, your CGC leather handbag is traceable all the way back to the farm, connecting you to the soil.

Certified Animal Welfare Approved Leather

We combined our regenerative farming expertise with amazing artisan’s to make the most beautiful handbags you’ve ever seen and the most sustainable handbag you’ll ever wear.  

 

Small Leather Goods Collection

Bifold Wallets

 

Bifold in Espresso with Espresso stitching

Wallet in Olive with White Stitching

Dimensions
- 4 1/8" (L) x 3" (W) x 1/4" (H)

Details 
- Available in caramel, olive, and espresso 
- Stitching available in white, caramel, olive and espresso 
- 6 interior pockets for cards- top money slot for cash
- Leather and suede interior 

Card Holder

Card Holder in Olive with Olive stitching

Backside in Olive with Olive Stitching

Dimensions
- 4" (L) x 2 1/2" (W)

Details 
- Available in caramel, olive, and espresso 
- Stitching available in white, caramel, olive, and espresso
- 4 pockets for cards and cash
- Leather and suede sides

Funding our Project

The Farm-to-fashion revolution is only as strong as the people behind it. That’s where you come in. CGC handbags aren’t possible without backers like you. We’re looking to create a truly regenerative business model that pays farmers premiums, through our revenue-sharing program, for high animal welfare and ecological standards and we need your help to do so. 

With your backing, we’ll be able to begin tanning and manufacturing the first batch of completely traceable leather handbags, and in a few months, we’ll have them delivered directly to you. 

Pioneering Regenerative Business

 

Conscious fashion is changing the clothing industry. By purchasing, gifting or supporting CGC’s leather handbags, you, too, can help grow the climate-benefiting fashion revolution.

Risks and challenges

Thankfully, we have been envisioning this dream for a few years, so while we were conducting all of the research and development for our leather goods, we were also curing all of our hides from our food business.

We have successfully saved more than enough hides to satisfy our crowdfunding demand. This gives us a foot up because we own most of the materials needed to manufacture our leather goods.

Once our crowdfunding closes we will send the cured skins to our tannery and then off to the factory.

Like in all manufacturing, there is a risk that production takes longer than expected, which would cause the delivery of our handbags and leather goods to be delayed.

In order to alleviate delivery delays, we have built strong relationships with our tannery and factory. We have chosen very professional and organized companies that have demonstrated good and open communication with us over the past 2.5 years. We trust them to help us coordinate timelines as accurately as possible and we've added some buffers to our lead times, just in case.

Duty/VAT charges: If you live outside of the US, you will be responsible for any applicable duty/VAT charges. 
Customs: Some countries are known for being very slow with customs, and you probably know if you live in one. We're sorry that we can't put a magic stamp on our packages to help them get through faster.

We'll update you frequently on our progress, and if there are any blips along the way, we'll let you know!
story_txt: OUR STORY Climate-Benefiting Luxury Handbags and Wallets. Certified Animal Welfare Approved Leather CGC works closely with A Greener World’s Animal Welfare Approved (AWA) program to achieve our animal welfare goals. It’s the highest animal welfare standard available, and we’re proud to say that our leather is among the first to be certified.Because Soil MattersThe soil is vital to the health of the Earth. That’s why CGC works closely with shepherds to provide education on regenerative farming. By performing soil analyses on our farms, we’re able to ensure that nutrients are cycled back to build soil organic matter. Improving the soil allows our pastures to naturally capture atmospheric carbon and put it back into the soil where it belongs. In short, our leather helps to balance our carbon cycle and ultimately, heal the Earth.Making Positive Change, Locally  Part of our motivation comes from making a difference locally. By creating a regenerative business, we’re able to effectively elicit positive change locally. We only purchase from regional farmers and U.S. factories, thus doing our part to help shrink the wage gap.The MEG in olive Dimensions - Bag: 10 1/4" (L) x 5" (W) x 11 1/4" (H)- Strap: 18 3/4" long and 1 1/4" wide- Flat top should strap with an 11" dropDetails- Available in caramel, olive, and espresso - Available in full leather or leather and suede- 2 interior pockets for phone and small items- Interior zipper pocket  - Organic cotton lining - Metal feet- YKK Excella zipperthe MEG in Espresso with leather front/back and suede side panelsThe Beauty Of Our Leather CGC has partnered with an experienced family-owned artisan tannery in the US that prides itself on preserving tradition and history. story:
Time for a Change

Jewelry has remained largely the same since its conception thousands of years ago. We appreciate the art of modern pieces in the space but no one has taken the time to advance the engineering for the next generation of jewelry. 

Things change now. 

inRing is the next generation of jewelry and is a combination of art and engineering. The inRing offers the ability to change faces for any day, or any occasion. Express yourself further by wearing your faces on a chain. 

Our inRing is timeless, and is crafted with Fine Italian Silver, locally right here in the United States. We've engineered inRing to last a lifetime.

You're not just a Customer... You're a Celebrity!

 

 

 

130+ Possible Combinations

Imagine having over 130 possible combinations of expression every morning with only a ring and a necklace! inRing's unique technology allows you to have that exact choice. With 12 unique faces (10 of which are crowdfunding exclusives), not only will you have more choices to create your own style, but you will be able choose what you want to wear quicker. Everyday will feel like an experience.

  

Can my SO wear this? 

YES! inRing makes the perfect gift whether it is your anniversary, Valentine's Day, a birthday, or any time if you're like us and believe every day is Valentines Day. We absolutely encourage this to be a shared experience, if possible, with your SO, friends, or family. 

What if you or your loved one doesn't wear a ring? No problem! inRing doesn't lock you into wearing a ring or necklace exclusively. If your SO looks stunning with fine Italian silver around their neck, we offered an option for just the necklace!

You can also swap faces with a loved one, which makes getting ready to go out feel like a unique experience.

 

 

Outside the Box

Our standard kit provides everything you need in order to start experimenting with your "outside-the-box" style - no strings attached! In addition, we will be providing a 10% Promotional Voucher (redeemable after the campaign ends for an inRing retail value product) for one future purchase because we are confident that you will want to share this!

 

Sizing

If the ring doesn't fit perfectly on your finger, each set comes with a Silicone Fitting Band . Our standard size is 7'' and our large size is 9''. The silicone fitting band allows anyone to wear the ring from a size 4 to a size 9!

 

 

How it Works

 

Step 1: Unscrew the thread and remove your face.

Step 2: Place your second face into the inRing and tighten the thread.

Step 3:  Pull out the Bail and put your first face onto the chain.

Step 4: Rock it!

 

Timeline and Expectations

The creation of inRing has been nothing but exciting. We've been at this for quite some time and are excited to see this come to reality. This would have been IMPOSSIBLE without you! Thank you for your support (seriously!)

We expect that everything will be performed on time and will be posting WEEKLY updates to keep you up to date on progress. 

Full transparency is our motto that we stand strongly by!

What Lies in the Future

There are many options for where inRing can go in the future. The most obvious and immediate one is to start designing more faces once funding has been reached. With 10 out of 12 of our faces being exclusives for backers, we will focus our energy on designing new faces, with the same quality passion, for those that are late to the party.

In addition to this our jewelry designer Nolan will be offering custom face inquiries after successful completion of this campaign.

 

Local is Better

inRing is timeless, and is crafted with fine Italian Silver, locally right here in the United States.  When customers purchase products made locally, they're directly contributing to economic growth and supporting small American manufacturers. By creating awareness we hope more companies on Indiegogo support this industry

 

CSWE Certified

We have seen over the course of thousands of years that rings have remained rings and pendants have remained pendants. For such expressive pieces, very little innovation has been made since then. Our in-house CSWE (SolidWorks Certified Expert) was able to overcome these design challenges and, quite literally, reinvented the way people look at jewelry. 

A CSWE is a certification that only 0.02% of ALL SolidWorks users have, which amounts to about 3200 people worldwide.  The CSWE ensures design quality for your investment with us!

 

The Collaboration

inRing is the collaboration baby of KingCAD Solutions and N.Murray. KingCAD Solutions is a Professional Engineering Design Services company.

N.Murray is the LLC established by our jewelry designer, Nolan, who made a name for himself in NYC's diamond district.

https://ndotmurray.com/

story:
Specifications & Summary

Materials

  • Leather Type: Full Grain 
  • Sourced From: Florence, Italy
  • Tanning Process: Vegetable Tanned
  • Inner Lining: Black RFID-Proof Fabric

RFID Contactless Protection

  • How it works: RFID signals are emitted to read your card details every time you scan your contactless card at the supermarket, metro, bar, etc.
  • You're protected: The entire contents of the wallet are protected from RFID signals - which means they can't be scanned while inside your wallet.

Main Features (maximum capacity)

  • Cash Drawer: 30 bills
  • Vertical Slot: 4 cards 
  • Horizontal: 3 cards
  • Pull Tab Pocket: 3 cards
  • Business Card Pocket: 4 cards
  • Coin Pouch: 10 coins 

Colour Options

  • Tan – Florentine Vegetable Tanned Leather
  • Black - Florentine Vegetable Tanned Leather

Dimensions

  • Open Length: 17 cm
  • Open Height: 10.5cm
  • Closed Length: 9cm
  • Closed Height: 10.5cm

Frequently Asked Questions

  • Q: Are these the only colours offered?
  • A: Should demand rise, there is potential for a stretch reward colour to be introduced.
  • Q: What are the dimensions? How big is this feature?
  • A: Please see the specifications above for a detailed breakdown of the features and dimensions.
  • Q: How much does shipping cost to my country?
  • A: We provide free tracked shipping to all countries in the world. We will offer express shipping as an add-on once the campaign ends.
  • Q: How much will I have to pay in duties? 
  • A: Nothing - £0 - We are aware this is an expensive wallet and our shipping carrier covers duties into your country and you won't be charged.
  • Q: Will I be able to track my package?
  • A: Yes, shortly after shipping you will receive an email with a direct tracking link to your specific package. The link will become active after 3 working days.
  • Q: I have another question that isn't answered here, how can I contact you?
  • A: You may contact us via the following channels and we will do our best to reply to you within the hour:
  • The Indiegogo messaging system
  • Through the Indiegogo comments - if you’re a backer
  • By email at: CS (at) FilippoMorato (dot) com

Risks and Challenges

This will be our third Crowdfunding venture, with our first two being a huge success's where we navigated through all the stages, R&D right through to shipment happening without any hitches.

In order to ensure the best possible outcome, the product you see on the campaign is the final production sample - made by the very same technique that your wallets will be.

There have been over 12 months of prototyping to fit all the features into one spectacular wallet, and now we've finalised the entire production line, all the way through to the packing and shipping.

We understand that crowdfunding can bring up unexpected hiccups, but we've been preparing ourselves for every eventuality - including going over our goal. We have two backups for every step of the way - manufacturers, packers, shippers - so that we'll definitely deliver on time.

We will keep an open channel with you, our backers, by conveying our thoughts to you every step of the way through Indiegogo updates and comments to ensure you're always in the loop.

story:
Short Summary

  • I was shopping for clothes for my husband and wondered why men's clothing sizes are based off of their body measurements, yet women, who are much shapelier than men, are stuck to sizes that don’t correlate to anyone’s measurements. All the way from a size 0 to a 22 there are really only 11 or 12 different sizes for us to choose from! So our clothes either don’t fit, or we wear baggy clothes, or buy super stretchy clothes so that it doesn’t matter what our measurements are, and even then they don’t always fit us right. And it can destroy a woman's confidence. Trying on outfit after outfit without anything fitting makes us feel like there's something wrong with our bodies! But what's wrong is the out of date sizing system we're forced to shop from. We see something online or at the store that we love but then we try it on and hate it. It's not because we suddenly hate the dress. It's because the dress doesn't fit like it's supposed to!
  • Instead of making you look at a chart to decide which size is closest to your measurements, we sew every piece to our customers' exact measurements so they actually fit. This includes widths and heights so that every part of the dress will fit how it is supposed to. We don't have to have "plus-size" or "petite" or "curvy" or "average" - we just have your real measurements. So everyone gets to order any of our designs that they want. 
  • All of the background work of this company has already been done. We have spent the past year creating patterns, trying them on friends and family, and perfecting the patterns so that everyone's individual measurements come out perfectly in these custom clothes. This fundraiser will serve as pre-orders to allow us to purchase the necessary equipment to manufacture the clothes with the highest quality and on a larger scale. 

What We Need & What You Get

  • To make some necessary upgrades to our equipment, we need to raise $8,500. We currently use home sewing machines which can't handle the amount of sewing we put them through, not to mention the cost of upkeep on a home machine gets very expensive when they get used commercially because the machines aren't made to keep up with that much wear and tear. This upgrade will also increase the quality of our garments.
  • Donations will be rewarded with gift cards in the amounts of the donation, so that the funds work more as pre-purchases instead of just donations. The gift cards will be electronically sent to the e-mail used to make the donation. Cards will not be sent until the goal is met and the campaign has ended. Dresses will average between $100-200. 
  • We expect to be up and running 2-3 months after the last day of the campaign. At this time, everyone will receive an e-mail update to let them know they can use their gift cards!

 

Risks & Challenges

Obviously with custom clothing measurements are very important. As an online company we are providing resources in the forms of instructional videos and kits to help our customers send in correct measurements.

Even with these precautions we do realize there will still be circumstances that someone's measurements are not quite right, and for this reason we allow for one free minor alteration (i.e. taking something in, shortening sleeves or hems, etc)

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone can help out with monetary donations, so if our cause is something that matters to you, here's how you can help!

  • Help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!
