This upgrade will also increase the quality of our garments.
Donations will be rewarded with gift cards in the amounts of the donation, so that the funds work more as pre-purchases instead of just donations. The gift cards will be electronically sent to the e-mail used to make the donation. Cards will not be sent until the goal is met and the campaign has ended. Dresses will average between $100-200. 
We expect to be up and running 2-3 months after the last day of the campaign. At this time, everyone will receive an e-mail update to let them know they can use their gift cards!

 
Risks & Challenges
Obviously with custom clothing measurements are very important. As an online company we are providing resources in the forms of instructional videos and kits to help our customers send in correct measurements.
Even with these precautions we do realize there will still be circumstances that someone's measurements are not quite right, and for this reason we allow for one free minor alteration (i.e. taking something in, shortening sleeves or hems, etc)

Other Ways You Can Help
We understand that not everyone can help out with monetary donations, so if our cause is something that matters to you, here's how you can help!

Help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
ENGLISH AND GERMAN TEXT

What we do...

The Members of 8cht-mal-8cht e.V (8cross8- charity organization) trying to help children who are homeless, grown up in violence or have a difficult vocational integration.
Please help, we need YOUR support!

A lot of youth people have not the opportunity to grow up harmoniously and healthy.
Our volunteers, among them german martial arts experts giving martial arts-seminars and support them.
Our main goal is to show the youth people how to organize a social and proper life and be self-confident.
Furthermore we donate clothes- like jackets and trousers for the wintertime-to them and buying them food for a healthy meal. Once a year we go sportsfishing in Denmark.

We need the money for the vacation and its new material!(fishing-set,etc.)
The group size for the next vacation will be about 5 volunteers and 15 young people.
During the holiday we teach the young people in martial arts, fishing and "how to" preparing for a job interview.
For the most of the young people it is the first vacation- so please help us to fulfill their dreams!

THANK YOU!

 ----

Was wir machen...

Die Mitglieder des 8cht-mal-8cht e.V versuchen Kindern und Jugendlichen die kein eigenes Zuhause haben (oder Elternlos sind), in gewaltvollen oder zerütteten Familien aufgewachsen sind oder wenig bis keine Möglichkeiten haben, sich in einem positiven und vernünftigen Arbeitsleben wiederzufinden.

Bitte helfen Sie uns, wir brauchen IHRE Hilfe!


Auch in Deutschland gibt es viele Jugendliche die NICHT die Möglichkeit haben, in Harmonie und vor allem gesund aufzuwachsen.
(Kein geregeltes Essen, keine Vorbild-Funktion der Eltern uvm.)

Unsere ehrenamtlichen Unterstützer, unter Ihnen deutsche Kampfkunst Experten und Trainer, helfen Ihnen mit Kampfkunst Seminaren und/ oder Aufbaukursen (Sport,Ernährung,Disziplin,Verantwortung) ein eigenes, stabiles Leben aufzubauen.

Unser Hauptziel ist es, den Kindern und Jugendlichen zu vermitteln wie sie Ihr Leben mit vernunft und organisation in die eigenen Händen nehmen können. Wir helfen Ihnen selbstbewusst zu werden, sich an Gesetze zu halten und auch ein positives soziales Umfeld zu schaffen.


Des Weiteren versorgen wir Sie mit wichtigen Dingen wie, Kleidung, Spielzeug,Sport-Equipment. Ebenfalls dazu gehört die gesunde und ausreichende Verpflegung.

Einmal im Jahr veranstaltet der Vorstand des 8cht-mal-8cht e.V. eine Sport-Angel-Reise nach Dänemark.

Wir brauchen IHRE Spenden für diese Reise und das neue Material. (Kleidung,Angel-Material,Verpflegung,Übernachtung, etc.)

Gleichzeitig finden während der Reise auch "Fortbildungsmöglichkeiten" wie Kampfkunst-Training, Angel und Outdoor-Workshops und ein Workshop zum Thema "Wie bewerbe ich mich richtig" statt.

Die nächste Reise wird mit ca. 5-8 ehrenamtlichen Helfern(Sie werden nicht bezahlt und tragen alle Ihre Kosten selber) und ca. 15 Jugendlichen stattfinden.

Die 500,-€ wären ein Teil der Kosten für diese Reise!


Für die meisten Kinder ist dies Ihr erster "Urlaub" - bitte helfen Sie uns und erfüllen Ihnen diesen einen Traum!

 

DANKE!

story:
Stoggles are the first goggles designed to look and feel like classic eyewear frames while helping to protect eyes from grimy fingers. With premium blue light blocking and anti-fog lenses, stoggles are made for all-day, everyday comfort.

Top Features

  •     Transparent Side + Top Shields
  •     Anti-Fog Coated Lenses
  •     Blue Light Blocking Lenses
  •     Light Responsive Lenses
  •     Rx Lens Options
  •     Impact Resistant Polycarbonate
  •     ANSI Z87.1 Certified
  •     All-day Comfort

 

Integrated side & top shields flow seamlessly from the front of the frame creating a force field for your eyeballs.

The clear or lightly tinted shields create an open and airy feeling, while bathing your peripheral vision in bright summery hues.

Polycarbonate is a fully recyclable material that is both lightweight, flexible, shatterproof and impact resistant. This material has crisp optical clarity and blocks nearly 100% of UV rays, so you’ll be protected by both the lenses and the frame.

Stoggles weigh only 18 grams and feature an anatomical temple design for a comfy, yet secure fit that feels great all day long.

 

Order (2) Pairs of Stoggles Now — 56% Off
 With FREE Shipping to the US

 

Unlike your average lenses, our stoggles won’t fog up. If properly cared for, the anti-fog coating should last up to 2 years.

Smartphones, TV’s, computer screens, & LED’s emit blue light that can cause eye strain, headaches, and negatively effect sleep. Our standard lenses block blue light to make your everyday life a bit more comfortable.

Our light responsive lenses are crystal clear when worn indoors and automatically darken to become sunglasses when exposed to sunlight.

Read our lens options section below for more details on prescription lenses.

 

Order (2) Pairs of Stoggles Now — 56% Off
 With FREE Shipping to the US
 
 

The stoggles square exudes classic elegance with its defined form and keyhole bridge, making for a beautiful fit on almost any face shape.

The stoggles round is playful, yet smart. This timeless silhouette is effortlessly cool and always in style.

Stoggles were designed to fit the widest range of face shapes and sizes. We’ve achieved this through flexible, anatomically formed temples. Our scientific approach to fit testing included 3D printing small, medium, and large heads that were developed during a 2003 study by averaging the anthropometric data of nearly 4000 test participants.

These refreshing hues will transport you to a tropical oasis, where days are filled with warm sand, cool drinks, and not a care in the world.

NOTE: you’ll be asked to choose your shapes and colors after you select your perk, but we’ll send you a survey after the campaign to either confirm or change your selection, so no worries if you change your mind!

standard lenses: The best option for everyday use. The anti-fog coating ensures that your lenses won’t fog up. The blue light filter blocks 40% of blue light, helping to reduce eye strain from screens.

Stoggles are ANSI Z87.1 certified for impact resistance, chemical and radiation resistance, and shield coverage.

how to order: You don't have to do anything now! We'll send you more info and confirm your choice on the survey that we will email you at the end of the campaign.

Light Responsive Lenses: Stoggles help protect you when you’re wearing them, and with light responsive lenses you’ll never need to take off. These lenses are clear when worn indoors, and become grey sun lenses when you go outside. Our light responsive lenses have an anti-fog coating and block more blue light than traditional clear lenses.

how to order:
Step 1) Add the “light responsive" lens add-on to your order at the bottom of the checkout page.

Step 2) We'll send you more info and confirm your choice on the survey that we will email you at the end of the campaign.

 

how to order: Rx lens selection and payment will be done separately after the campaign. For now, you don't have to do anything. We’ll send you an email after the campaign with more information about the options and how to order.

*Note that the prices listed above do not include the stoggles frame.

Regular cleaning of your stoggles is recommended to keep them squeaky clean. Rinse your stoggles for 20 seconds with dish soap and warm water, and then wipe them dry with a microfiber cloth.

At the Roav design lab, we love solving challenging eyewear problems. On May 15th, we came across a good one. Eye protection is more important than ever, but the current options are bulky, uncomfortable, and far from aesthetically pleasing. We wondered if we could create a goggle, with style. Time was of the essence, and in a furious blaze of nonstop design, stoggles were born. We’ve poured every ounce of our experience and passion into this product, and we’re so excited to share it with the world.

 

 

Shipping Details
Stoggles are shipping worldwide. Depending on your country, you may be responsible for paying for customs, duties, taxes or other applicable fees before you can receive your package. These policies are set locally, so please check with the relevant sources where you live for the most accurate information. If the customs/duties are not paid and the shipment is returned to us, you will be refunded, minus the shipping cost.
Our team has years of experience manufacturing premium eyewear with very strict quality control inspections. In the unlikely event of a manufacturing defect, we will be more than happy to replace the unit. Stoggles are thoroughly cleaned and sealed prior to packaging, so we are not able to re-sell pairs after the package has been opened. For this reason, we are unable to offer refunds once the pairs have been opened. In the event that you do have a defect or other concern about your order, please email us at hello@wearstoggles.com.

Press Inquiries
please contact hello@wearstoggles.com

Add Ons:

Please note: Add Ons on mobile devices are not supported by Apple and Google Pay. Use another payment or use a desktop browser. Add Ons are visible below the "Checkout button. See our FAQ for more details.

 

Order (2) Pairs of Stoggles Now — 56% Off
 With FREE Shipping to the US

story:
You've found the perfect iPhone purse.

You've been there. You've got your cutest outfit on and you're ready to go out for the evening. Just grab your ID and iPhone and put it...where?

 

A simple, elegant bag

The bag is beautifully designed with soft leather front & back. The sides are beaded and hand-crocheted. Inside is a fabric lining and small side pocket to hold one or two cards. Your iPhone fits easily but snugly and is well protected by the soft leather wrapped around it and a double layer of leather along the bottom edge to protect it when you set the bag down.

To match the light weight minimal elegance of the bag, the strap is just a simple matching ribbon. Perfect because it won't take away from your outfit and its simlicity matches with almost anything.

A wrap up bracelet to match

The matching bracelet is made with the same technique as the sides of the bag and braided cotton to tie. It's beaded and hand-crocheted into subtle but striking patterns. Beautiful!

Eco friendly

Designers working with leather produce a lot of scraps of beautiful soft leather. Because this bag is small, I'm able to use some of those scraps and prevent them from going to waste.

About Eliza

Eliza has been designing jewelry in Toronto for several years and is becoming a well known local designer. She's appeared in a variety of Canadian and International magazines. Check out her website!

The Back Story

This spring I was frustrated with constantly digging through my big purse for my phone. I needed something small and pretty but functional that could also keep my hands free in between texts. After a bit of experimenting, I came up with this simple design and I love it! A few weeks later when a friend's sister gave me cash on the spot to make her one, I realized that maybe I wasn't the only one who needed this. After a bit of looking around I was amazed to see that there is nothing like this on the market. So here we are!

Details

Height: 4.5" (11.5 cm)

Width: 3" (7.5 cm)

Thickness: 0.4" (1 cm)

Strap 50.5" (128 cm)

Genuine leather

Crocheted with soft organic cotton

Glass, crystal and hematite beads

Fits all iPhones and standard sized Android or Windows phones as well as most recent Blackberries.

Will fit even if the phone is in a small case.

Card pocket fits 2 standard sized cards.

The strap can be tied off for a more snug fit.

Shipping

All prices include shipping to anywhere. The delivery dates are estimates and I hope to ship substantially earlier. I'll be shipping a couple of times a week as they are produced!

Other Ways You Can Help

Twitter, Tumblr, Facebook, blogs, YouTube, magazine articles, TV spots! If you you like my work, please help me get the word out. I'd love to make this just the first of many neat projects so I'm really hoping that this will be a big success. If you're interested in talking to me about this project, please do get in touch.

Photos by CALOPE and Joseph Saraceno.

story:
Who We Are

We are a couple of videogame-ware developers, with numerous hardware and software innovations under our belts.  We came up with the PeanutBuddy out of sheer frustration with the mess that regular packing peanuts caused in our warehouse and on the environment.

What Is The PeanutBuddy?

The PeanutBuddy is a Patent Pending Peanut Bag Dispenser System that transforms the standard 7 to 30 Cubic Ft. plastic peanuts' packaging bag, into an overhead peanut dispenser in less than 60 seconds!

Why Choose The PeanutBuddy?

Current peanut dispensers are too large for small to mid-sized shippers, and are not practical. Furthermore, they have an average cost of over $200, which is not ideal in today's economy.  The PeanutBuddy is easier to use, has a much lower cost of entry, and simply works better!

Check out how to transform the shipping peanuts’ bag into an overhead dispensing system in a few easy steps…

 

Where We Are Today

We’ve been working on the PeanutBuddy for many months now, and we have filed multiple patents to cover every aspect of the entire system. The PeanutBuddy that you see in the video is a real, working prototype.

With your support, we can bring the PeanutBuddy to shipping centers worldwide. While we're close to entering production, your contribution will help fund:

- Production tooling
- Large production run

 

Bud-Nutz - Eco-Friendly, Organic Packing Peanuts

We're protecting the environment, one peanut at a time! We care about the planet, and know the harm that traditional polystyrene shipping peanuts can cause. That's why we created Bud-Nutz! Bud-Nutz biodegradable packing peanuts eliminate the negative environmental impact of polystyrene peanuts.  Made with organic starch, they decompose in water and leave no toxic waste!

*Each bag of Bud-Nutz comes with a free donut-collar and suspension strap to easily convert into an overhead dispensing system with your PeanutBuddy!

 

Designs

Design 1

 

Design 2 - 

  • STRETCH GOAL: $25K - UPGRADE  ALL CHUTES TO SCISSOR RELEASE VALVE

 

STRETCH GOAL

$25K - SCISSOR RELEASE VALVE UPGRADE

The PeanutBuddy design using the scissor-release valve is an improvement over the first, single-flap release valve design. Because of the additional costs required to convert the current tooling, the upgrade has been slated for a later release date. By achieving our stretch goal of $25K, we will be able to implement the improvements early, and upgrade the first production run to the new, improved design. 

Your Role

You play a very important role in helping us bring the PeanutBuddy to market, and literally helping millions of small shippers, just like us, solve a major problem.

We are seeking  $10,00 in Pre-orders for the first production run.  In return for your support, you will receive one of the many rewards, that we have thoughtfully prepared and listed.

Rewards

  • Peanut Buddy Starter Kit: Each kit includes 1 PeanutBuddy Chute, 10 adhesive suspension straps, 10 reinforcement (donut) collars, and 1 wall/ceiling hook, and 1 Buddy-Face Sticker.  (Additional donut collars and suspension straps are available from the PeanutBuddy website.) 

  • *Special Reward Level - Beta Testers:  Be the first to own and use the PeanutBuddy, and help us beta test the system.  As a beta tester, you will work closely with us and participate directly in our strategic communications, providing feedback and recommendations on the current PeanutBuddy as well future improvements. We'll give you a Free bag of the eco-friendly Bud-Nutz as a token of our appreciaton.

A Huge Thank You

We sincerely appreciate your support, and look forward to the day when every shipper, large and small, is lucky enough (because of you) to hang a PeanutBuddy and bag of Bud-Nutz in their offices, garages, or warehouses.  Let the Peanut Revolution begin!

Please share with any friends or businesses that ship their own products with packing peanuts and want to make a positive impact on the environment.

Bud-Nutz - Eco-Friendly, Organic Packing Peanuts


We're protecting the environment, one peanut at a time! We care about the planet, and know the harm that traditional polystyrene shipping peanuts can cause. That's why we created Bud-Nutz! Bud-Nutz biodegradable packing peanuts eliminate the negative environmental impact of polystyrene peanuts.  Made with organic starch, they decompose in water and leave no toxic waste!
*Each bag of Bud-Nutz comes with a free donut-collar and suspension strap to easily convert into an overhead dispensing system with your PeanutBuddy!
 
Designs
Design 1


 
Design 2 - 

STRETCH GOAL: $25K - UPGRADE  ALL CHUTES TO SCISSOR RELEASE VALVE


 
STRETCH GOAL

$25K - SCISSOR RELEASE VALVE UPGRADE

The PeanutBuddy design using the scissor-release valve is an improvement over the first, single-flap release valve design. Because of the additional costs required to convert the current tooling, the upgrade has been slated for a later release date. By achieving our stretch goal of $25K, we will be able to implement the improvements early, and upgrade the first production run to the new, improved design. 
Your Role
You play a very important role in helping us bring the PeanutBuddy to market, and literally helping millions of small shippers, just like us, solve a major problem.
We are seeking  $10,00 in Pre-orders for the first production run.  In return for your support, you will receive one of the many rewards, that we have thoughtfully prepared and listed.
Rewards


Peanut Buddy Starter Kit: Each kit includes 1 PeanutBuddy Chute, 10 adhesive suspension straps, 10 reinforcement (donut) collars, and 1 wall/ceiling hook, and 1 Buddy-Face Sticker.  (Additional donut collars and suspension straps are available from the PeanutBuddy website.) 


*Special Reward Level - Beta Testers:  Be the first to own and use the PeanutBuddy, and help us beta test the system.  As a beta tester, you will work closely with us and participate directly in our strategic communications, providing feedback and recommendations on the current PeanutBuddy as well future improvements. We'll give you a Free bag of the eco-friendly Bud-Nutz as a token of our appreciaton.

A Huge Thank You

We sincerely appreciate your support, and look forward to the day when every shipper, large and small, is lucky enough (because of you) to hang a PeanutBuddy and bag of Bud-Nutz in their offices, garages, or warehouses.  Let the Peanut Revolution begin!
Please share with any friends or businesses that ship their own products with packing peanuts and want to make a positive impact on the environment.

story: Hey everyone my name is Luis Gonzalez and I attend the Kansas City Art Institute and I am majoring in Fiber. I was born and raised in Miami, Florida in a Cuban household. I studied art at the New World School of the Arts for high school and now I'm about to finish my last semester of college where I will be showing my four years of studies in a fashion show with a really good friend of mine Myles Thompson. We will be working together to create a streetwear line and presenting in a gallery. To make this happen all I'm asking for you guys to donate anything you can to help me make this show possible. I want to give thanks to anyone who helps make my dreams come true. THANKS!!!

story:
Laura Elizabeth Jewelry was started 9 years ago and it's been a phenomenal success thus far.  So much so it's time to take it to the next level.


This campaign is important to me, because I'm expanding my eco-friendly/sustainable line.  I'm being creative in supporting Mother Nature, while making pretty jewelry that is classic, timeless and stylish.  I am also supporting my fellow women by donating 5% to GirlRising.com, a global campaign focused on empowering girls through education in developing countries.

I cannot do any of this without YOU. I want to help others, and I need your help to do it.  And, at the end, you get a yummy Laura Elizabeth jewelry at a discount!


We need donations, what do you get?:

  • We need $20,000.  This will go towards a new (all sustainable) line, revamping our site (shopify), getting a sales rep (to increase our wholesale), and participating in a trade show (Designers & Agents). 
  • You get PERKS: 

    ·  $5 you get a “thank you” email

    ·  $25 you get a spiral (adjustable) knuckle ring (offered in silver & gold) debuting on Indiegogo  – normal retail $45

    ·  $56 you get the new Amber - Amber Liu (pineapple) Necklace (offered silver & gold) – debuting on Indiegogo – normal retail $77

    ·  $61 you get the Dawn (large circle) Necklace (offered in silver or gold) – normal retail $88 & $99

    ·  $99 you get the Courtenay (leaf) Cuff (offered in silver & gold) – normal retail $165

    ·  $299 you get all of the above, plus the new Aloha (palm tree) Necklace - Value $456

    ·  $2500 you and I will co-design you a one-of-a-kind Laura Elizabeth piece - only offered here

  • If I don't reach our goal, I intend to use the raised funds towards designing a smaller line and updating the website.


You make a HUGE difference.  

1.  You receive the PERK of Laura Elizabeth Jewelry for as little as $25. See details of all the PERKS  above.

2.  You will help me fulfill the dream of taking Laura Elizabeth to the next level.  This includes designing 7-10 new eco-friendly pieces, getting a sales rep, revamping the website, and participating in a trade show.

3.  Making a donation to Girl Rising, a global campaign focused on empowering girls through education in developing countries.

Laura Elizabeth is a developed brand and company.  We've last over 9 years.  Your support is going towards a company that is only growing!




I gotta be honest, there are always risks and obstacles one faces on her way to achieving her goal.  I am sure you are asking yourself, "What if Laura Elizabeth doesn't reach her goal, will I still get my PERK?"  ABSOLUTELY!   

  • I have chosen a "flexible funding" campaign.  Therefore, if I raise only a fraction of our goal, I still receive the funds.  Therefore, I can easily make and ship your PERK off to you by no later than December 1st, 2015.  Just in time for the holidays!
  • I have high quality, reliable, sustainable manufacturers whom we have worked with for over 6 years.  I guarantee you, you and your PERK are in good hands. :) 

How else can you contribute to this campaign other than financial donations?:

  • Please, get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.  Social media is a perfect way to spread the word.  Share links via Facebook, Twitter or Instagram.  Use Indiegogo's share tools! http://igg.me/at/LauraElizabeth

story:
TickTalk 3 is now available to preorder on www.myticktalk.com, guaranteed to ship before Christmas!

 

Most parents are not willing to take on the expense and responsibility of giving their child a smartphone. The TickTalk 3 is the most innovative 4G kids smart watch phone that combines video calling, voice calling, Wi-Fi calling, messaging, and location-tracking capabilities into one simple device. We want all families to keep connected with the ones you love in a fun and safe way!

 

 

 

 

 

Life can get very hectic and finding time to connect with your child during the day is sometimes impossible. Either you are stuck in meetings or they are running from school to their extracurricular activities and you never seem to find the time to check in with them throughout the day. With the TickTalk you are able to send a quick hello text from the App, find a moment to give them a call so they can hear your voice, and even listen in to what is going on around your child with the Super Hearing function.

A parents greatest fear is losing their child while out at the mall, airport, parks or even down the street. A child can go missing in a blink of an eye. One minute they are right by your side and the next they may have wandered off. The creators here at TickTalk understand just how scary this scenario can be so our expert engineers included a location tracker into the watch so you can quickly help locate your child.

Here at TickTalk our main goal is to be able to provide a reliable and secure method for parents to know how their child is doing at any time throughout the day. We have our customer support team standing by to assist you with any tech support issues you may have. We continually research and include the latest state-of-the-art technology available to ensure our products are top of the line. The TickTalk 3.0 also receives over-the-air APP and firmware updates that add new features and enhance existing functions, ensuring that your child’s smart phone watch always has the latest technology. 

You talked and we listened! We cannot think of everything, so we reached out to the experts, our customers to get the most innovative and fresh ideas. We value our customers and we want to thank you for all that you have brought and contributed to this project. 

TickTalk is dedicated to build a kid-friendly smartwatch that is reliable and easy to use. We look forward to all of the future scientists, lawyers or presidents who will have a safer and more convenient communication tool to use while they navigate through their young lives.

 

The TickTalk 3 APP is compatible with both IOS and Android system. It will allow parents to preset the Contacts, Things To Do Reminders,  Locate, Make a Voice call, Wi-Fi call or FaceTalk video call, send instant texts, voices, emojis and pictures to your child, plus more. Easily get connected with your child all the time. All features are simple and intuitive to use, making it much more user-friendly. 

 

 

"OMG! The call quality is awesome! My sons voice is really clear and I've tested the sound on the watch and it's really clear too. Be careful not to get too close to the watch when you call it otherwise your phone will pick up the sound from the watch and cause an echo (I did this when doing a test call). None the less the call quality is great!"

                                                                                                                                         -- Darte from Miami, FL 

"I purchased this locator with function for voice call to help protect my family, especially little kids. They are fragile but most important in life.

I like these of this product:

1. Easy to control and use.

2 Touchscreen is perfect.

3 Battery is great, to last quite long. Charge time is relativeley short.

4 Calling quality is great, loud and clear. Overall I find.this perfect for my use. I rate it 5+ stars."

                                                                                                                                --Lovely X from Seattle, WA

"My daughter has been calling every day when she is on her way back to home. She gives me a head up whether she will be late or not. The watch is also important to remind her about her violin lesson at school. She used to complain she can’t read the regular clock, now with this digital clock, no excuse, no late class any more!"

                                                                                                                                    --Kristin L from Dallas, TX

 

There are so many moving parts involved in the research and design of this product that we understood that the testing phase was going to make a huge difference in creating a valuable product that lived up to the past generations of the TickTalk  smart watch phone.

We tested the hardware, operating system, APP's, and the servers extensively to ensure the TickTalk 3 functioned properly. We used our first working prototype to test reception with different SIM cards from different carriers.

Here is a glimpse into a working TickTalk 3 in testing phase. Hours of work from our engineers have been spent making sure that the TickTalk 3 will work as advertised! With video and phone call features, text messaging with emojis, and much more!

The TickTalk 3 is much more than just a watch. It has all the components of any smartphone on the market today. The technology packed into this mighty watch will blow you away!

Before our products are released, we put in hours of testing for every single aspect of the hardware. We understand that the internal functions of the watch are the most important part of making sure the TickTalk 3 will work! The many little wrists and parents that rely on the TickTalk 3 to communicate will not be disappointed!

We brought the TickTalk 3 to the great outdoors. The antenna reception is 1 bar less than the iPhone X. We were excited to discover that the 2-way voice calls are clear and loud. We will optimize the antenna and RF before mass production. Due to the 4G reception, the locating feature is much faster and more accurate than before. We tested several dead spots where our current TickTalk 2 does not have service, and all works well! The new TickTalk 3 App still has some bugs right now. We will be fixing these bugs while we continue to do our testing, hoping to make everyone more satisfied with the new model. 

 

The TickTalk 3 will come in two colors, Vanilla White or Space Black. You can customize your TickTalk 3 by purchasing one of our other 7 different styles of bands. This will be made available on our website after the campaign is over.

Our team in China has worked in the consumer electronics sector for over 12 years.  Our existing suppliers have consistently good quality control. They make and assemble regular cell phones for big brands. The do the watch assembly and QC for us. On the other hand, we have our own team in China. They work tightly with all of our suppliers to rigorously monitor the production schedule, quality control and mass production. We know the latest technology which can be used in our current watch and future generations.  

 

Risks & Challenges

Since this is the 3rd generation of the TickTalk, backing this campaign will be a low risk endeavor. We have already started the mass production of the TickTalk 3.0 and we plan on delivering the first batch in December to this Indiegogo community. We have taken the time to tediously work through the research and design phase, testing phase and we have an established manufacturing, shipping, and supply chain management processes to minimize the risks and challenges.

In order to ensure our product quality, we have reduced our production capacity to add more testing. So we can only deliver a limited quantity to our Super Early Bird customers before Christmas. The second batch will be delivered in January 2019. We will ensure that we are able to get your TickTalk 3 into your hands in the least amount of time! 

We guarantee that we are able to fulfill all pre-orders by the dates mentioned above. If some unforeseen complications arise and we are unable to manufacture the TickTalk 3 in time we will return all monies to every backer.

story:
Why did you start DIOP?

As a first-generation American, you exist between two worlds. To fit in, you do your best to walk, talk, and act like everybody else. The one thing I couldn’t do was look like everybody else.

Whenever my mom would travel to Nigeria, she would return with Ankara, a boldly colored and patterned fabric. Then she would work with a tailor in Harlem to make lightweight shirts with superior quality and comfort. They were higher quality with a richer look and feel than any fast fashion or box brand. These shirts are a product of my experience between two worlds, and over time, more and more people asked how they could get one.

I'd say they weren't ready but the volume only got louder. 

DIOP is for those who believe that fitting out is better than fitting in.


What's up with these bandanas? 

Mhm.

....and best believe we'll have the wildest IG in the game

The team behind DIOP

 

Risks & Challenges

We have created prototypes and are market-ready. Our preparation should allow for a smooth production and fulfillment process. We are finalizing our products with a local manufacturer to deliver our initial run.

As a backer, you can be assured that we will do the best we can to fulfil your orders in a timely manner. And because we believe in transparency in everything we do, expect frequent updates on our campaign.

story:
What's the first thing you do when you get home? If you're anything like us, you'll drop your keys, sunglasses, wallet and other accessories right on the kitchen table or desk and things can get messy very quickly. We knew there had to be a better way.
 

Meet HUB: A minimal, magnetic ecosystem to keep everything in one place.

 

 

Designed and engineered for those that want a cleaner, more efficient space.

The HUB is a magnetic modular ecosystem that allows you to stay effortlessly organized at home or on the go - and helps you get out the door faster.

 

SAVE TIME AND SPACE

 

It's a better way to carry your keys and other everyday items. The slim form factor of the HUB ModPanel holds everything together and takes up almost no space. Its sleek and modern design will look great in your apartment/house wall or your work desk. It's the ideal solution to never losing your keys again!

 

Forget about looking for your keys, wallet and other accessories right before you have to leave home or the office. Walk out the door in seconds and be on your way to your destination.

 
 
 

 

Past Performance

 

Past Press Coverage

 

 

1. Keep everything in one convenient & organized place

Simply attach your magnetic Mods to the low-profile HUB ModPanel and keep your keys and essentials organized.

Fits anywhere.

 

No more unsightly keychain hooks, messy tabletops or missing keys. Out of sight, out of mind.

 
 

2. Minimal Design

Slim & sleek design to maximize your space.

Low-profile, sleek design.

 

 
 

3. Grab & Go

It's a time saver. Get out the door faster. Grab the mods off the HUB ModPanel in a second and get going. No more searching for your items. Simply grab them off the ModPanel attach them to the magnetic HUB Clip.

 
 

4. Magnetic Magic

You'll love the magnetic HUB's fun and easy to use Fidlock magnetic attachments.

 

 

5. Endless Modularity

It starts with your keys, an item you never leave home without. But it doesn't end there. The HUB Cardholder & Sanitizer Holder Mods are valuable additions to your collection and we'll be releasing several useful mods in the near future.

 

Compatible with our existing modular accessories.

Existing Modular Range.

 

6. On the go access

Get instant access when you attach the HUB Clip to any piece of fabric or loop.

Versatile.

 

7. An ecosystem for your life

Whether at home or on the go, the HUB is an ecosystem of mods that connects to your life & makes it easier for you to stay organized so you can focus on what matters most.

 

 

Attach the 3M adhesive to a flat surface (wall or desk). The HUB ModPanel is ready for use.

 

Take one of the Mods and attach it to the ModPanel when at home or in the office.

 

When on the go, attach the HUB Clip to any fabric or loop & and then attach any of the Mods to it.

 

 

HUB Reviews

See what some of our friends in the EDC community think about the HUB 

 

 

 

The HUB ecosystem consists of 3 HUB Mods and 2 HUB ModPanels to connect all the mods.

 

HUB ModPanel

 

The HUB ModPanel is what connects everything together and it comes in two sizes.

The Max: You can attach up to six modular items (mods) to this low-profile rail.

 

 

 

 

 

The Mini: This is the smaller version and is best suited for tight spaces like a desk. You can attach up to three mods.

 

 

 

 

 

 

HUB Keychain

 

Integrated with a secure magnetic Fidlock quick-release system. 

 

Comes with a clip you can attach to any fabric for added versatility. 

 

Easy-to-use open D-ring.

 

Fits up to 8 keys. 

 

HUB Cardholder

 

Front: Metro Card or ID card sleeve

 

Back: Cardholder

 

Converts from a Cardholder Mod to a standalone cardholder.

 

Comes with a clip you can attach to any fabric for added versatility.

Attach the clip anywhere.

 

The front of the Cardholder is for a MetroCard or ID tag and the back has 2 laser-cut slots that hold up to 4 cards.

 

NEW Add-On: USB-C Lanyard 

It’s a versatile USB-C Cable that doubles as a lanyard. Comes with an integrated cable organizer and is perfect for the HUB Cardholder.

Made with Dyneema® fiber, which is 15x stronger than steel at the same weight. Dyneema® is also high in cut and abrasion resistance, plus it's resistant to chemicals and UV.

Keep it nice and tidy.

 

Doubles as a magnetic lanyard and a USB-C Cable

 

HUB Sanitizer Holder

 

 

Doubles as a Metro Cardholder.

 

 

The HUB range is not only compatible with our next generation of modular items, it's also compatible with our existing modular accessories.

 

 

 

 

Our designs are focused on three things:

 

  • Any product we make *needs* to be functional
  • It also needs to look good
  • Has to be high-quality and durable

 

We spent the last nine months working on this project and this is the solution we've engineered to keep your life organized at home or on the go.

 

The HUB has gone through rigorous testing to make sure it stands the test of time.

 

 

We believe a clean and organized space is a productive space. We've spent the last 4 years producing functional, durable gear with clean aesthetics.

 

 

The crowdfunding community has given us so much throughout the years and we're forever grateful to have the opportunity to keep bringing you modern, innovative products that enhance your life. ALPAKA was born in Melbourne, Australia, but we’re a diverse global team of internationals that share a common passion for design and travel.
story_txt:

 Meet HUB: A minimal, magnetic ecosystem to keep everything in one place.  Designed and engineered for those that want a cleaner, more efficient space.The HUB is a magnetic modular ecosystem that allows you to stay effortlessly organized at home or on the go - and helps you get out the door faster. SAVE TIME AND SPACE It's a better way to carry your keys and other everyday items. The slim form factor of the HUB ModPanel holds everything together and takes up almost no space. Its sleek and modern design will look great in your apartment/house wall or your work desk. It's the ideal solution to never losing your keys again! Forget about looking for your keys, wallet and other accessories right before you have to leave home or the office. story:
100% Premium Cotton: Fabric woven from the finest Two-ply Pima Cotton yarns infused with our nanotechnology at a molecular level, which generates the ultimate softness, durability and breathability.

 

Prevents Stains:  The nanotechnology-infused fabrics works as a second skin barrier by preventing the absorption of spills – like coffee, wine or ranch dressing.

 

Prevents Sweat Stains: Prevents sweat induced stains and reduces a significant amount of odour-producing bacteria.

 

Controls Absorption of Odours: Like tobacco and frying oil smokes – and controls the circulation of perspiration and moisture keeping them away from the body so that you can stay fresh for longer.

 

Perfectly Fitted: A classic and timeless fit, so you can always trust our anatomy and elegant style with 2 fits (Slim and Modern Fit) each with 12 standard size options (37-50).

 

Perfectly Handcrafted: By being 100% Designed and handcrafted in Portugal by designers and manufacturers of the world’s top luxury brands and by using the finest trimmings (like our Mother of pearl buttons).

 

Saves Water: Contributes to water savings, since that fewer stains and bacteria will naturally result in fewer washes.

 

Increases Garment Life: The Shirt and Polo fabrics allow the garments to be cleaner, fresher, coloured and dependable all day long.

 

Eco-friendly: Ensuring the protection of the environment and complying with the human ecology requirements. Fabrics are also tested for non-toxic substances.

 

Are your correct measurements one of your concerns? Do not worry!


We guarantee you the best fit experience. In the survey sent to you at the end of the campaign, we developed an innovative solution to make sure you have your perfect shirt fitted to your body and taste.


In the meantime, if you have questions please contact us. We will be glad to answer you.

 

The Pique Polo is a high quality casual version that is also developed with the same nanotechnology. Provides the Ultimate Comfort, Durability and Breathability!

100% Premium Cotton: The finest pique knit made from the extra-long staple pure American-grown Pima cotton that enhances shape retention and prevents shrinking, fading and pilling.

 

Prevents absorption of Stains & Odours: Our nanotechnology is infused at a molecular level into cotton yarns. It prevents the absorption of spills and stains and controls the absorption of bad odours.

So that you can have an elegant day at work and be odourless when playing tennis or golf.

 

Are your correct measurements one of your concerns? Do not worry!


We guarantee you the best fit experience. In the survey sent to you at the end of the campaign, we developed an innovative solution to sure you have your perfect polo fitted to your body and taste.


In the meantime, if you have questions, please contact us. We will be glad to answer you.

 

 

 

 

The package includes: the garment(s) you have chosen, personal gift with message and a premium reusable packaging box.

“We believe that looking our best leads us to be our best and to be an Ambassador of our own personal brand."

Rita Dinis - Founder

A special thanks to all the partners that believed in us and helped Ambassador to give its first steps. Thank you all for your support!

NOTE: Prices are not inclusive of VAT and Duties. (Duty-Free in the EU).

story:
Smokes and Stitches

Hey guys! Welcome to our Indiegogo page. We are a new clothing brand made by 2 best friends based out of Asbury Park, NJ.

 

We are trying to reach a goal of $900 to put towards shirts, printing, supplies, etc. Help us get our business off the ground!  

Share our website. www.smokesandstitches.com like us on facebook, follow us on instagram -  Smokesandstitches or follow us on twitter - smokes_stitches spread the word!

story:
My Story

As I sat in the oversized reclining vinyl hospital chair, waiting for my turn, I reached into my bag. A single tear formed in my eye as I pulled out “black jeep liberty” and “red voltsy beetle”, the two dinkies that my two year old had tucked into my bag as I left that morning for another round of chemotherapy.

  

Everyone has a story to tell, and this is part of mine. It’s weird how the scariest of events sometimes bring us to the most exciting. If someone had told me nine and a half years ago that I would be on my way to launching my own business, I would have thought they were off their rocker!

I joined yoga to regain my strength, both mentally and physically, as I worked myself back to health and wellbeing. However, when I went looking for something appropriate to wear, it was very difficult to find anything suitable. So, I designed a line of yoga sport tops with hidden attached pocket bra for women with mastectomies, like myself. I wanted to create tops that were hip, comfortable, hid the ‘love handles’ and fashionable enough that they could be worn with an outfit to work, then on to yoga class. The neat thing is, that even though they were designed with a mastectomy client in mind, any woman can wear them!

I have been working with highly skilled individuals over the past two years, both on the business side of things and in the fashion industry to put forth a line that I am super excited about!

My mission is to empower this community of women to look good and feel good on their journey back to health and wellness, and perhaps even give yoga a whirl!

I have decided to dedicate my project to the women in my life that mean the most to me, starting with my mom.  My son Dell nicknamed her “Nee” when he was little (instead of Nana), and hence the name of the collection.  The tops are named after my best friends who were so supportive when I had cancer (Lorna, Kelly, Ange & Donna) and my yoga instructor and mentor (Faye).  The scarves and headband are named after my 3 cousins who have also had breast cancer (Moe, Pam & Zina).

Once a seed gets planted in my head, something that I get excited about, I have a hard time letting it go.  Not all seeds are such big endeavours, but this one struck a chord.  If it’s a total flop, or it flourishes, I won’t know until I try, and if I don’t try, I will always regret it.

So... here goes!

What We Need

You, the contributor, are so important!!  This Indigogo platform is a way for me to increase capital and lower my initial debt, which is huge!  When small businesses need to borrow significant funds to start up, it is far more difficult to break even.  All these pledges (yes, every single dollar!) allow for a healthy cash flow right from the start, and increase chances for that small business to thrive and last.

The Impact

$10 K will allow me to place my first (minimum) order.  $30 K will allow me to launch the business entirely, including the set up of a user friendly e-commerce website and utilizing a strategic marketing campaign.  Any amounts up to, and past, these monetary amounts will go towards these exact goals that I have mentioned. One dollar from every sale of an I Kare Yoga Wear top will be donated to  grassroots patient focused organizations such as Breast Cancer Action - Nova Scotia 

Risks & Challenges

One of the risks involved with my business might be reaching the primary target market, which are breast cancer survivors who have had mastectomies.  Today though, there are not just a few of us women kicking around, there are millions.  However, it is important to me that I hit that target.  That’s where an in depth marketing plan will come in handy.  It’s also hugely beneficial to my business that women without mastectomies understand that they can wear my products as well, that just increases my buying market, and improves my business’s chances of survival.

Our competition is relatively small with only 2 other companies offering a limited selection of sportswear mastectomy clothing (2-3 styles).  I Kare Yoga wear offers several styles all with fashion, comfort and versatility in mind along with matching accessories.  

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you are unable to contribute, you can still help out!  The more people that know about my campaign, the better.  So I encourage you to use the Indigogo share tools located below, send emails with the link to this page, or even tell friends by word of mouth.  Thank you, thank you, everyone!


Recent News Coverage: 

http://atlantic.ctvnews.ca/video?clipId=478136&binId=1.1145729&playlistPageNum=2

story:
The problem is that many more stores want my beautiful Donna Bella Designs handbags to sell but I can’t supply them. It takes a lot more capital than I have to expand my business and expand our operations.

Banks are not lending to small businesses right now. So crowd-funding and friends is the only place I can go to raise funds to grow my business.

WOMEN WHO NEED JOBS

Expanding my business means I will be able to hire more people and help them have a better life. Employing women whom can't find work could change their lives, and reduce the unemployment rate.

With $22,000, I can finally fill the orders we currently have. I could even go national and have my Donna Bella Designs handbags in hundreds of stores across the U.S., something I’ve dreamed of since I started my business years ago.

 

____________________________________________________________________

My wife Deyse and I are giving 10% of our profit to 3 women’s charities

Your support will help us support homeless and disadvantaged women. 

  • THE ROAD HOME
    An organization that helps battered and homeless women and children.

_______________________________________________________________________
  • SAFE PASSAGE IN CALIFORNIA
    Helps displaced women and families. 

______________________________________________________________________
  • YWCA (Young Women’s Christian Association)
    Provides support and programs for girls, and women.    

________________________________________________________

Rewards:

To thank you for your support we have several wonderful rewards you cannot get anywhere else, ever. These are items especially made for the supporters of this campaign.  Feel good about your donation because 10% will go to charity.   

  Your Name Embossed Inside Your Personalized Handbag

 

When you support our cause, we want to give you a unique gift that we have never given anyone before. Every person who contributes to the $45 level or higher will get an exclusive item or Donna Bella Italian handbag that is personalized with your name embossed onto leather inside the bag. ~See All the Perks Below~
***Please add $40.00 Shipping to anything to be shipped outside the United States. And $10 to order shipped to Alaska & Hawaii.

$35 Leather iPhone 5 Case -

First Time Offer, Your Name On Front

Never lose your phone again. Your name embossed on it. This very cool iPhone 5 phone cover is very unique, because it's made just for you. Be the first to have your name embossed into quality weathered saddle leather, and special hand stitching. A Retail Value of $79. Feel good about your donation because 10% goes to charity! ***Please add $30 to orders shipped outside the United States and $5 to orders shipped to Alaska & Hawaii. Thanks.

___________________________________________________________________

$35 Snake Embossed Leather Women’s Clutch Wallet- 

Chic Modern Wallet Clutch

Keep your organization hassle-free with this beautiful Donna Bella clutch wallet. The reptilian embossed leather is stunning. Leather lined interior  with zippered currency compartment, slip pockets, 2 ID windows, and credit card slots. You will love this accessory. Chain is gold-tone. 100% Leather. A Retail Value of $95. Feel good about your donation because 10% will go to charity.  *** Please add $30 to order shipped outside the United States and $5 to orders shipped to Alaska and Hawaii. Thanks!                                                                     


 ______________________________________________________________________ 

$65 Italian Leather Cross Body Bag- 

Only 75: Will never be sold in stores, your name embossed

When they're gone they're gone. Picture your name embossed in leather in this adjustable emerald green or red crossbody bag. Soft pebbled leather crossbody with top zip closure. Adjustable crossbody strap, with silk interior lining, back wall zip pocket and two slip pockets. 100% Italian Leather. A Retail Value of $199. Feel good about your donation because 10% will go to charity. ***Please add $50 to orders shipped outside the United States and $10 to orders orders shipped to Alaska & Hawaii. Thanks!

_____________________________________________________________________

$65 Men's Leather Crossbody Bag-

Only 50 Available: Will never be sold in stores, your name embossed

This small messenger bag is made for today’s modern hipster man. Sturdy adjustable cross-the-body shoulder strap for ease comfort, for the man on the go. Comes embossed with your name on the inside. 100% Italian Leather. A Retail Value of $149.  Feel good about your donation because 10% will go to charity. ***Please add $50 to orders to be shipped outside the United States and $10 to order shipped to Alaska & Hawaii. Thanks!

_______________________________________________________________________

$99 Italian Leather Hobo-

Only 50 Available: Not sold in stores-Your name embossed

This very cool Skull Hobo Bag  is studded with small trend setting skulls around the front with a large flying skull below the leather fastener.This simple classic design is fully lined in a beautiful soft colored satin-like interior. It has plenty of pockets to keep you organized, flashy silver tone hardware, an extra strap that is long & adjustable, plus it's comfy handles. One zippered back pocket, two slop pockets with leather trim, one zippered middle divider pocket, and one back side wall zippered pocket. A Retail Value of $249. Feel good about your donation because 10% will go to charity. ***Please add $50 to order shipped outside the United States, and $10 for orders to Alaska & Hawaii. Thanks!




______________________________________________________________________

$120 Mykonos Blue Leather Satchel-

Only 50 Available: Your name embossed

Only 50 available at this price! This wardrobe staple of a handbag can be yours, and embossed with your name for only $150.00. Available in this exclusive & beautiful Mykonos Blue. Retails at $299.00, saving you 50%! 100% Italian Leather. Feel good about your donation because 10% will go to charity. 13.75" Inches Long/Wide X 8" High/Tall X 6" Inches Deep/Thick with 7" Inch Handle Drop. ***Please Add $50 to items shipped outside the United States. And $10 to Alaska & Hawaii. Thanks!


_____________________________________________________________________

$180 Large weekend get away bag-

Only 50 Available: Not sold in stores, Your name embossed

This sporty weekender bag is 100% Italian leather and has a simple and durable design.  Loads of pockets inside and out. Forward and rear zippered compartments keep items organized. Two interior pockets for cell phone & wallet, interior one side zippered pocket, one center zippered divider pocket. A Retail Value of $399. Feel good about your donation because 10% goes to charity! 21.5" Inches Wide/Long X 14.75" Inches High/Tall X 6" Inches Deep/Thick. ***Please add $50 to orders shipped outside the United States and $10 to orders shipped to Alaska & Hawaii. Thanks!


_______________________________________________________________________

$990 Partner With Donna Bella Designs

Only 5 Offers Available: Receive 15 assorted leather handbags

You'll receive a variety of 15 of our top selling Italian Leather Handbags at wholesale pricing to re-sale for your own profit. Or maybe you just want to buy the whole family a leather handbag for the Holidays! It's up to you! This is great opportunity not usually offered to the public, and only 5 offers available. All 100% Italian Leather. Feel good about your donation because 10% will go to charity. Shipping outside the United States will be discussed.

_______________________________________________________

Banks aren't loaning to small businesses like mine, but you can make my dream of being a national company come true. Here is what I will do with your money:
  • The materials needed to make the handbags, including the very best Italian leather
  • Handmade stitching and manufacturing
  • Materials needed to box and ship
  • Warehouse maintenance and expansion
  • A working forklift for the warehouse
  • Marketing to new stores
  • Warehousing and shipping to new stores
  • Additional labor must be hired in the USA, at our facility

Your support can do so much good in the world. You can be the answer to improving the lives of others. Please help us grow our business, create more badly needed jobs for single women, and support the YWCA, The Road Home, and Safe Passages. $22,000 is a lot of money, but I promise to use it wisely and to help other as well.

Thank you and God Bless America,

Frank D'Souza
story_txt:
The problem is that many more stores want my beautiful Donna Bella Designs handbags to sell but I can’t supply them. It takes a lot more capital than I have to expand my business and expand our operations.Banks are not lending to small businesses right now. So crowd-funding and friends is the only place I can go to raise funds to grow my business. 


WOMEN WHO NEED JOBS
Expanding my business means I will be able to hire more people and help them have a better life. Employing women whom can't find work could change their lives, and reduce the unemployment rate.With $22,000, I can finally fill the orders we currently have. I could even go national and have my Donna Bella Designs handbags in hundreds of stores across the U.S., something I’ve dreamed of since I started my business years ago. 

____________________________________________________________________
My wife Deyse and I are giving 10% of our profit to 3 women’s charities


Your support will help us support homeless and disadvantaged women. 



THE ROAD HOMEAn organization that helps battered and homeless women and children. 
_______________________________________________________________________
SAFE PASSAGE IN CALIFORNIAHelps displaced women and families.  
______________________________________________________________________

YWCA (Young Women’s Christian Association) Provides support and programs for girls, and women.    

________________________________________________________Rewards:
To thank you for your support we have several wonderful rewards you cannot get anywhere else, ever. These are items especially made for the supporters of this campaign.  Feel good about your donation because 10% will go to charity.   
  Your Name Embossed Inside Your Personalized Handbag

 

When you support our cause, we want to give you a unique gift that we have never given anyone before. Every person who contributes to the $45 level or higher will get an exclusive item or Donna Bella Italian handbag that is personalized with your name embossed onto leather inside the bag. ~See All the Perks Below~***Please add $40.00 Shipping to anything to be shipped outside the United States. And $10 to order shipped to Alaska & Hawaii.

$35 Leather iPhone 5 Case -
First Time Offer, Your Name On Front
Never lose your phone again. Your name embossed on it. This very cool iPhone 5 phone cover is very unique, because it's made just for you. Be the first to have your name embossed into quality weathered saddle leather, and special hand stitching. A Retail Value of $79. Feel good about your donation because 10% goes to charity! ***Please add $30 to orders shipped outside the United States and $5 to orders shipped to Alaska & Hawaii. Thanks.

Chic Modern Wallet Clutch
Keep your organization hassle-free with this beautiful Donna Bella clutch wallet. The reptilian embossed leather is stunning. Leather lined interior  with zippered currency compartment, slip pockets, 2 ID windows, and credit card slots. You will love this accessory. Chain is gold-tone. 100% Leather. A Retail Value of $95. Feel good about your donation because 10% will go to charity.  *** Please add $30 to order shipped outside the United States and $5 to orders shipped to Alaska and Hawaii. Thanks!                                                                      


 ______________________________________________________________________

Only 75: Will never be sold in stores, your name embossed
When they're gone they're gone. Picture your name embossed in leather in this adjustable emerald green or red crossbody bag. Soft pebbled leather crossbody with top zip closure. Adjustable crossbody strap, with silk interior lining, back wall zip pocket and two slip pockets. 100% Italian Leather. A Retail Value of $199. story:
Last Chance To Pre-Order!

PRODUCT (ANI ORIGINALS)

Style - Best looking shoes on the planet

Barefoot - 4 mm outsole, feels like you're not wearing a shoe.  As light and comfortable as it gets!

Eco-Friendly - 100% organic canvas and recycled/recyclable packaging (Box, Hang Tag, Tissue paper).

Vegan - No animal products

Philanthropy

Soles4Souls collects new shoes to give relief to the victims of abject suffering and collects used shoes to support micro-business efforts to eradicate poverty.

For every pair of ANI Shoes sold someone in need will get a pair of shoes!

AS NATURE INTENDED (ANI)

Our mission is to provide STYLISH, VEGAN, ECO-FRIENDLY BAREFOOT shoes to the world. 100% organic canvas and recycled packaging! We envision a world where everyone can move naturally and appear fashionable at the same time.

Society has deviated from nature, and conventional footwear is no exception. Most shoe brands obstruct the foot’s ability to adapt to the ground, forcing the foot to adjust to the shoes. Barefoot shoes allow the foot to function without the restraints imposed by conventional shoes.

ANI corrects the problems caused by conventional footwear. ANI returns us to our natural roots and enables us to be free, AS NATURE INTENDED!

Barefooting

Barefooting is the way nature intended us to move. Conventional footwear prevents our feet from functioning optimally, harming mobility and posture. Barefooting allows the body to readjust to its natural form.

Other company’s barefoot shoes are usually not truly barefoot shoes, ours are. Just because a shoe can bend easily does not mean it is barefoot. A lot of these other company’s barefoot shoes are way too thick and most of their foot beds are not flat due to unnecessary elevations and angles that put your feet in an unnatural position. In order for a shoe to be barefoot it must have a super thin outsole that bends easily while having a flat foot bed so your feet can be in a natural position as if you were barefoot. ANI does exactly this.

You can view our website at site.anishoes.com!

If you are interested in wholesale/distributing/carrying ANI Shoes in a store let us know!

team@ANIshoes.com

ANI In The News!

http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1217805219/ani-as-nature-intended-shoes-footwear?ref=users

http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1217805219/ani-as-nature-intended-best-shoes-footwear-on-the

http://www.defynewyork.com/2012/07/02/making-the-world-a-better-place-ani-as-nature-intended-originals-footwear-defy-new-york-interview/

http://www.laimyours.com/19831/ani-footwear/

http://www.envynde.com/2012/07/as-nature-intended-ani-stylish-barefoot.html#.UCbzgGNYv81

http://www.upstartprojects.net/2012/07/project-spotlight-ani-shoes.html

story:
Your shirt options suck.

Traditional shirts are tight, uncomfortable and impossible to wear when you need to be active. Performance shirts have amazing attributes, but they look like shiny gym shirts - and can’t (or shouldn't) be worn outside of the gym.

Can’t one dress shirt and one t-shirt do everything you need them to do?

These ones can.

 

 

 

Do these prices sound too good to be true? If other brands tried to do shirts like these, they would cost around 2x. That means $75+ for a t-shirt and $180+ for a button down.

We’re able to offer technically-infused premium apparel at a fraction of the price that you’d find elsewhere - while still developing top end fabrics, paying all of our workers fairly, and without cutting any corners. How?

By cutting out the middlemen. We only work with partner factories (who are invested in our business in some way) who sell directly to us, so we can sell directly to you.

 

 

 

 

A button down shirt is a wardrobe essential, but you have limited choices if you want to look good and move freely. 

People think dress shirts = uncomfortable, but that’s because other brands use fabrics that keep you hot and sweaty without any stretch. Since styles have gotten more tailored (ahem, slimmer), they’re even worse to wear. While there are some “technical” polyester button down shirts out there, they don’t breathe, feel scratchy and look shiny. 

Shirt technology hasn’t kept up with modern lives. But we have.

This proprietary fabric includes cotton for comfort, COOLMAX® to keep you cool and sweat free, and spandex so you can reach, run and bike (or whatever you do in a day). We even added anti-stink and anti-wrinkle treatments. 

 

Our designers reviewed the best of fashion brands, performance brands, and everything in between to develop the features that will make this the shirt for all your adventures. 

From reinforced stitching to utility pockets with headphone ports, performance hems and collar stands, this shirt moves with you - no matter how big your life gets.

 

 

 

 

 

 

There are tons of t-shirts out there. But they tend to be basic cotton tees with no performance attributes (they get wet and they stay wet) or polyester monstrosities that don’t breathe, smell bad and look worse.

Can’t a t-shirt give you the best of both worlds?

This one can. Dress it up, dress it down, wear it to the gym and out on the town.

 

 

This T-Shirt’s got your back. Cotton for classic cool. Lycra adds the stretch you love in workout tees, without the gym look. Plus Tencel®. Oooh, you’re going to love Tencel®. It's a magical, sustainable and super soft fiber derived from Eucalyptus trees that absorbs moisture. It's also naturally anti-bacterial, so your shirt will never stink. 

 

 

We live in t-shirts. Basic, but true. So we know what makes a good shirt. But we also bike, run and do yoga  - so we know sweaty, sticky situations.

These t-shirts marry the best of fashion AND function. Shifted seams avoid chafe points, reinforced stitching lends durability, heavier fabric weight avoids any accidental see-through, the length is perfect, the DUER gusset means you can move freely, and there’s extras like headphone ports. Boom.

 

 

 

 

 

 

DUER is a small company based in Vancouver, with a sales office in New York. We were born of the idea that you shouldn’t have to sacrifice performance OR style, and grew thanks to the support of Kickstarter.

We’ve launched every major innovation through this community - the world’s first performance denim, an update on sweatpants, and the best pants for hot weather. We’ve now established ourselves as experts in pants, but we need your help to move on - and move up (literally).

Our previous backers fell in love with our pants, and asked us to solve their dilemmas in tops. We listened. This is for you, Kickstarter. 

 

 

 

 

How to use this chart: This size chart is based on body measurements. To measure yourself, wear close fitting clothes and wrap a flexible measuring tape (or a string you'll measure later) around yourself, keeping the tape parallel to the floor and close to the body but not tight. 

* To measure your chest, measure one inch below your armpits. 
**  To measure your waist, measure the smallest part of your natural waist.
***   To measure your sleeve, place your hand on your hip with your arm bent at 90 degrees. Measure from the middle of the back of your neck, across shoulder and down your arm to the wrist.
**** To measure your shirt length, measure from shoulder (at neckline) straight down.

Care Instructions:

Machine wash cold with like colors. Tumble dry low. Do not use silicone softeners. Only use non-chlorine bleach when needed. Warm iron if preferred.

story:
Welcome to all you designers and boutique owners!

I am Bud Robinson, the former President of Levi's International, Catalina Swimwear, Aspen Skiwear, and Hang Ten Surfwear and Executive VP of The Gap Stores.

I was happily retired here in Los Angeles, until I met Dr. Peter Kilduff at Cal Poly Pomona this Spring and learned of how he is fostering a revolution in the way clothing will be made and sold! 

Peter is the Chair of Cal Poly's 4 year Apparel Merchandising and Management program (the ONLY one West of Chicago) and he asked me to serve on his faculty advisory board.

It was there that I met Bill Grier, a true genius and inventor from the new digital fabric printing industry. Bill has invented a totally disruptive digital fabric dying and printing process that will revolutionize the entire industry, bring lost apparel jobs back to the US, and save billions of gallons of fresh water every year!

We can help you get started toward your goals by making just 10 yards of high performance fabric (e.g. nylon/Lycra swimwear at import prices, printed with your custom artwork and there is NO LIMIT!

But we need your help to fund our pilot IMF and then knock the industry on its ears!

Please join the revolution!

sincerely,

Bud the chief sword rattler!

story:
Hi there.

Thanks for checking out Mirrogram. I'm Andrew. Former high school teacher, married in Yellow Croc's and now somehow find myself starting a fashion line!

It is my hope that this clothing reflects a creative advocate for social justice, a passionate educator and someone who isn't afraid of doing things differently. Oh, and speaking of reflects, each design reflects in the mirror to say something different! 

Giving up a stable wage and students I love teaching to start a social enterprise has been a hard slog. But my dream remains to "Change Fashion. For Good".

This is where you come in!

What is a Mirrogram?

A Mirrogram is a design that changes in the mirror to say something different, make a statement and create conversation.

Are you clever enough to work out the ones below? Shoot us a comment with your answers.

Generosi-tee

These clothes don't just change in the mirror. They change lives.

Generosi-tee is the only response you can have after many trips to India and Nepal. This is not a token gesture. I am not even waiting until we've made a profit. There are people in desperate need and your choice to support Mirrogram will help at least some of them out. The best thing is you get to choose the project you are most passionate about (midday meal, school supplies, opportunity and talks/workshops). Your selection empowers locals to work in their own communities, which I am convinced is the most effective way of aiding development.


What you get? (AKA: The Perks)

  • To create conversation.
  • To challenge assumptions and cause others to "Stop and Reflect".
  • To become a billboard for something that matters to you.
  • A great excuse if you get caught checking yourself out in the mirror.
  • Unique hand-made designs that say something different when reflected.
  • To help change the lives of some of the world's poorest people.
  • A great way to play a prank on one of your friends.

These completely unique designs are available on Premium quality Caps and Shirts, deliciously warm hoodies and the never seen before "Neck-Brace-Ring". We give you all you need to make a Necklace, Bracelet and Keyring and you get to choose what to make...speaking of choose, with every single one of these perks you get the choice of which development project to put $3 toward.

How else can I get involved?

Aside from taking advantage of the wonderful perks on offer you can help change fashion for good by sharing this on social media (it's as easy as clicking a button).


As I said in the film, running a social enterprise solo is tough work. I've become a writer, photographer, web designer, marketer, salesman, delivery driver, heck, I've even learnt to tie bracelets! We are currently looking for collaborators so if "changing fashion for good" is something you'd like to be a part of feel free to get in touch. Send an email to andrew@ontheflipside.org 

Frequently Asked Questions

How do I choose my size, colour and design? At the end of the campaign we will email you a form where you can choose your size, colour and design.

Will they shrink? No, all garments are pre-shrunk except the Australian made Organic shirts which will shrink around 1/2cm (1/5 in)

What will be done with the funds raised? Once we reach our goal we'll create your products and get them out to you as soon as possible. You'll also be sent a link where you can select which development project to send your $3 to. 

Once we have taken care of that, any additional funds will be used for continued production and expansion of our line. My hope is to be competitive enough to get into a retail chain or if things go really well, start a bricks and mortar store. Then we can really start changing fashion for good.

When do I get my stuff? Allowing 20 days to receive the funds we raised we can expect to have your order delivered to you within 3 months of the end of the campaign. Most orders will come a lot sooner than that.

What sizes do they come in? From Kids sizes to 5XL. I'm pretty sure we've got you covered.

What if I'm not satisfied? If for any reason you're not satisfied with your perk send an email to andrew@ontheflipside.org and we'll arrange for an exchange or full return. 

If you've worn any clothing our only request is that you wash it before sending it back. We don't want any smelly bacteria breeding on the way back to Australia. We have strict customs laws you know!! 

What if someone steals my clothes? It's more a matter of when. Significant others, friends, even your kids will volunteer to do the washing for the chance at snatching your Mirrogram clothing. To combat this we suggest either getting them their own or getting hold of the Legend-Loser, Cool-Dork or Cute-Ugly designs. The next time your culprit looks in the mirror they'll get a nice surprise!
